column3: <rs type=""work"">rgyan</rs> gi dgongs pa <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> las: mi slu ma shes don gsal 2
column5: rnam grangs pa'nag * smra
column7: (RT VIII.40b, gzhan gyis brtag ap dgag na)zhes gsung shing, de dgag pa yang: mtshan nyid 2 kyis 'jog * ni
column9: mtshon byed de yang 2 su 'gyur
column11: (VIII.41ab, agaisnt Lha dbang blo)mtshon bya gnyis su 'dod na yang
column13: spyi mtshan ** mi srid 'gyur
column15: (RT VIII.41cd, against rGyan mdzad pa)tha snyad pa dang don dam pa
column17: 2 ga la yang 2 po 'jug
column19: (different from VIII 42ab against Chos mchog, which reads: ma khyab gcod tshul 'dir mi 'thad
column21: gnyis su 'byed pa dgongs pa min )ces dang<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">bram ze</rs>'i bzhed pa la yang,mi dgos ma khyab mi srid 3
column23: bden pa'i don rtogs 'dod na yod
column25: (RT VIII.42cd, agaisnt Bram ze)ces so
column27: </seg>

<lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">gang gis gang la ji ltar mi slu </l>
</lg>

column1: ex45042024-08-2914-22,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22"" status=""unreviewed"">de ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje pa</rs>s (tshid) (bcadu) bsdebs pa ni: <l>don rig 2 dang rang rig dang
<l>rjes su dpag pa ran glas nges
<l>dang po pa dang yid ma gtad
<l>'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan las nges
column3: (RT VIII.64)</l>

column1: zhes gsungs shing,de nges byed kyi tshad ma yang
column2: <l>don byed pa dang goms pa <lb n=""5a5""/> can

ex45042024-08-2914-13-45,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-13-45"" status=""unreviewed"">gzhan yang de ltar 'dod pa de dpyod pa pa'i phyogs su brlan par rigs pas sun phyin gyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">mkhas pa chen po cha pa</rs> swo kyis kyang dpyod pa ba'i phyogs su <lb n=""6a2""/> bslan nas dgag pa mdzad pa yin no

column1: ex45042024-08-2914-22-30c,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-30c"" status=""unreviewed"">des na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos
<lb n=""N005""/>kyi rje</rs>s mngon ng po mdo'i lung
column2: byeg pa 3 rnam rig nyis
column3: zhes pa ltar legs par mngon yang ba mi bla mas ni bang ni skad pa dang don pi rnam bzhagnyis las dang po'i dbang du byas nas <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> nyid las kyang bag chag brtan dang mi brtan las
column4: bden dang sdun pi rnaM bzhag byed
column5: cesungs pas mngon dang po 2 kyang

column1: <lb n=""N006""/>bzhed la phyi ma'i dpang du byas nas seMs tsam gyi tshul la rnor mngon dang dang rim mngon 3 ngo na yin pas byeg pa 3 rnam rig nyis
column2: zhesungs pa yino
column3: </seg>

column1: gan yang byeg du sra ba yid kyi mngon mi 'dod pa yang ma yine
column2: byed du sra bas kyang rnor mngon yin pa yid des tob phral mul ba bzhen yir des nas

ex45042024-08-2914-22-281,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-281"" status=""unreviewed"">  'gig dbos la yul gyi rnaMs 'char ba phyil gyi don la los mi los 2 su byed <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>'i dongs par mngon

ex45042024-08-2914-22-30d,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-30d"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> gyi dongs pa yid mngon yin na 'das pa yin pas khyab cing 'das pa las 'das pa li skye ba'i phyir na yid mngon la rgyun med ces 'dod pa'i
<lb n=""N004""/>khyor su bshad nas dgag pa yin du mang pa mdzad pa ni lung de la skyon rjod pa dbyes pa tsam du zad kyi yung de la ni chunga kyang mi bgod
column2: </seg> skyon brjod pi gzhi khas mangs spyir te
column3: des na 'di ni ri dang kyi grib ma la ri dags bsams nas mtshon 'phon pa dang 'dra
column4: mtshon nyid la gnod pa tsam

ex45042024-08-2914-22-282,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-282"" status=""unreviewed"">
gan yang dpyad na shes pas yul 'dzin pa gtan migr ba tshungs
column2: de lta na
column3: don sa bas kyang chos thaMd rangin gyis stod pi stong pa nyid rtogs pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>gi tshad 'bras ni la me'i tshogs don

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>gzhalya du ba'i tang las de rtog pi rjegi tha skad 'brus
column2: du ba'i rtag las la mo'i don tshang gyi rnal pa shar nas de la gsang du mu ni shes pa tshad ma zhes yang na phyil gyi don bzhalya don gyi rnaM pa shar nas don la bsar du mu bi shes pa tshad pa don rtog tshad ma 'brus
column3: zhes pa des ba na rigi rjeg

column1: <lb n=""N008""/>pang mtshan nus gsung
column2: </seg>

column1: rang gi tshad 'bras ni ngosu bshang bya'o
column2: pa'bras rtog 3i rtog pa 3 las dang po mthad pi cha dan pa pa ni don ni 'brus 'jog pa mi rigs te phyis kyi don yod pa la skyon med cing zhes pir dang po ni de la blos kyis gyi don tos pa don

column1: ",2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml

ex45042024-08-2914-22-283,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-283"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje thaMd mkhyen pi</rs> zhal
<lb n=""N008""/>mnga' nas kyang de ltar grub mtha' 4 las slo+on phyil gyi don slon pi tshe med pa ltar mdzad la bye nang la 'jug pa na rnam zhal gyis bzhes zhesungs ci ste 'dir yang
column3: gang gis dngos rnam dpyad na
column4: zhes 1 dang du bral gyi gyi ba sungs mino zhe na gsungs mod kyi des ni dngos mtha' dag rangin mes

column1: <lb n=""N001""/>gtan la 'bebs pa ma yino
column2: </seg>

column1: 'o na tsi zhe na blo 'khrul pa la gzugsn sna chog sdu snang ba di snang ba ltar bo nang grub pa 'gog pa yin thog ni tshul bsgrub pi rigs pa las ne des na bu ma bden 3 gyi 'gre pa par yang lon phyog gus la tsaM par gsungsigs bu la gan gyis
",2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml
ex45042024-08-2914-22-284,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-284"" status=""unreviewed"">deg ni bzhung gi dongs
<lb n=""N003""/>pa sgrib par gyur pa tsam zhig du zod des na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje thaMd mkhyen pa</rs>s sa gsungs ltar
column2: blo das 1 gis gang rung 1 rtong na 1 shos kyang rtogs pas khyab pa ni ldig dmigs kyi don to
column3: </seg> degis sbyor pa'i don 3 ngos bzung nas 2 pa tshul sgrub pa la dngos phyogs ni rang ri mngon gyis 'grub la khyab pa'ang

ex45042024-08-2914-22-285,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-285"" status=""unreviewed"">2 pa ltar na de 2 la 'brel pa med pas ldig migs nges mid la
column2: 'brel pa yod kyang bo rdzas 1 gi pa dmigs pi rag mub pa yino
column3: thad pa 3 pa la 4 be
column4: snang zugs 2 po rdzas tha dad yine
column5: nye+en tha dad las skyes pir
column6: 'on kyang seMn kyi blo la ltos nas

column1: <lb n=""N005""/>dmyings pa yin pir
column2: snang bas sreg chang gi gi rgya mthong ba'i gags sbyed yir
column3: dper na snang 1 mtshan rgyu dang
column5: de las bdan pa'i dbangos dan
column6: zugs mthong ba dang yi thun dang
column8: 'thun pa tar byed pa 4n

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs> sgrib pa med pa'i spyan dang ldan pas
column2: zugs dang snang ba ni

column1: <lb n=""N006""/>rugs dmigs pa snang pa la logs pa'i srob chang la las dmigs pa na rdzas tha dad ma yin
column2: lcags bsreg pa 4n
column3: snang ba la mos pa byi ba log pa la ldig dmigs med
column4: snang ba med kyang zugs dang
column5: rgyas med kyang snang ba dmigs pir
column6: lags dang me tha dad par dmigs pa 4n
column7: zhesung ngos ngos byun pi rnaM bzhan dang

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>rdzas 1 dang rdzas tha dad ni sngar dpyad pa las shes
column2: </seg> yang snor snang dbes cho
column3: khyod khyod dang la snang pa'i sngon 3 lig dmig pa min pa
column4: khyad la snang ba'i sngon migs kyang khyad ma dmigs pa yod pir
column5: lub na de'i khor du byung ba'i chor ba chon de dmig la de la snang pi sngon dmigs yir mub ni deng spyi

ex45042024-08-2914-22-286,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-286"" status=""unreviewed"">'di'i lan la mtha' rnams bska ba ga sungs nas 'chos gzhi dang ni
column2: gzhan dang ni tshon gyi chos zhes spyod pa la brtens bsgrub bya'i chen kho na pa mi yod te dpe'i chon 3 po la dang po yir te shon gyi sa bon pa yis de des pa dang

column1: <lb n=""N001""/>rjes pa dpag byas pa yod ces brjod pa la brtens kyang cho rjes su pag bya kha na la mi po ste <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s dud pa ba dang shad don rjes su pa bya lang po pir rjes su pa bya'i sa byang b kyi zhe na dang rjes su dang bya la yod ces brjod pa la bsten pa nyes pa dpa' bo de chon kho na la gog pa yin gyi
<lb n=""N002""/>sgras byag mo ba'i rgyun gnas skabs kyi nges pa yod pir phyogs kyi 'brel pa gtan la 'babs pa'i gnas skabsu phogs kyi sgro de bsgrub ba'i chon kho na la 'jug pir
column2: </seg>

column1: 'o na 'dis yang chen gyi chon zhes brjod pa la brtens sku bya'i chon kho na lasog pa yin phyos kyi 'brel pa gtan la 'bs
",2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml
ex45042024-08-2914-22-287,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-287"" status=""unreviewed"">gle chon gyi chos zhes brjod pa 'khrul gzhi yod la
column2: phyos zhes brjod na bskas ming du 'gro bas 2 ka ltar mi rjod phod gyi chos zhes dang ming gis rjod na go bde mod khar zan

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>'jug pa la lab pa bskyor ci dogs snyam na
column2: dngos ming de ltar rjod na lrub pa ci yang med mod kyi don kyang shed chon gyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s 'gro ldog pa zhes tshul 3 brjod pa yige mnyaM pas rjer mi bde ba dang
column3: phyogs 'thong pod medang
column5: zhes bya ba lasog pa'i tshog le'ur byas pa mi 'grib pas mkhas

column1: <lb n=""N008""/>pa rnams kyis bad pa mtshad yang star kyi de 'jug thos pa bzhugs kyi don go na stod pang nas pa yon pa yang ba'i yang hyir zhes dang gyi thin pa la zhus kyis den togs pang nyes pa brgyad pa ma yin mnyam pas bsgus kyang pa yong du spangs pa yino
column2: des na kyi skyed ni rtog kyang ba pa dang nas

column1: <lb n=""[73b8]""/>…<rs type=""work"">gtan tshigs thigs pa</rs> las : * kyis don go yang nye bar b* pa * yi ge mnyam pas bsgrub dka' ba yongs su spangs pa yin no

column1: ex10032024-09-1111-36-00,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10032024-09-1111-36-00"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""deity"">bde' bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byams<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> dri ma med pa'i gsal byed
column2: rmongs pa rnams kyi long khrid pa bla ma rnams kyi gsung gi rtogs pa'i myu gus (read gu'i?) rgyud brlan pa
column3: mtshan thos pa tsam gyis 'gro ba skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad spyod pa
column4: dpag du med pa'i don 'byung pa'i gzhi rgyal ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo rgyas 'bring gsum rtogs pa'i shes rab thun mong ma<anchor xml:id=""a5""/> yin pa dang ldan pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana="""">bla ma</rs>s
column5: dad pas rta la brtson 'grus<lb n=""158a8""/> kyi lcag gis bskyod pa'i (read: pas?) chos brgyad spangs pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gnang ba'i dus su
column6: gus pa dang dad pas gzhi bzung brtson 'grus dang shes rab kyis khyad par can gyi don la phyogs pa'i
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3863"">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu byang chub</rs> kyis legs par mnyan pas
column8: tshig dang don gyi rtogs pa phyin ci ma log pa mnyam pa med pa (read pas?
column9: or
column10: pa las) thob pa'i dge ba des skye bo kun yum la mos pa dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> nyid kyi rtogs pa brtan par 'byung par shog
column12: </seg>",1_010_03_F_C_NO_M_X or Jad_bstod pa.xml

column1: gal te sems can thams cad rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i don la 'dun pa la sogs pa dang 'gyur la des na mthar thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te

column2: gsung rab kyi de kho na nyid thugs su chung nas ¦ 'chad brtsod brtsom pa la snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">sde snod 'dzin pa nyi ma seng ge</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dpal gsang pa 'dus pa</rs> dang
column4: mtha' bral dbu ma chen po sogs ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> yab sras kyi gzhung lugs la gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus pa'i so**d pa dge ba can pa <lb n=""97a4""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">yong dbon po shAkya seng ge</rs> dang
column5: lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par smra zhing

column1: chos tshul 'dis la mi phyed pa'i dad pa can
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mdo stod pa sangs rgyas 'bum</rs><!--maybe dbus pa blo gsal db:4091--> laswo pas bskul nas

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4080"">shAkya'i dge slong skyabs mchog dpal bzang po</rs>s ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">dpal ldan zla ba grags pa</rs>'i 'grel ba bzhin du
column2: dbang <abbr>phyug gi</abbr> lo ¦ smin drug can gyi <lb n=""97a5""/>zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi tshes bcu gsum la sbyar ba'o
column4: <abbr>yi ge</abbr> pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6844"">lung dang rigs par smra ba ¦ seng ge rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis <abbr>bgyis so</abbr>

column1: 'di la <abbr>brten nas</abbr> <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dang dus dang gnas skabs <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnab par gyur cig

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re snang ba stong ba'i tshogs don de bsgrub <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""4a3""/> bya yin zhing
column2: snang ldog kun rdzob kyi bden pa stong ldog don dam pa'i bden pa bden 2 ngo bo 1 pa yin no zhe na

column1: snang ba dang ngo bo 1 pa'i stong nyid de <lb edRef=""inst:5593"" n=""tshe na""/> don dam  <lb edRef=""inst:5593"" n=""3a9""/> pa'i bden pa ma yin te
column2: skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir te
column3: snang ba skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir ro
column4: gzhan yang don dam bden pa skye 'gag byed par thal
column5: <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""4a4""/>snang pa skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir
column6: rtags tshad ma khyab pa med na bden gnyis ngo bo gcig pa nyams so

column1: 'dod na 'gag pa med pa skye med pa zhes so
column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column2: rang gzhung sems tsam du bshad pa dang 'gal lo
column4: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rtog pa'i mtshan nyid sgra don 'dzin pa yin zer ro

column1: ex45012023-03-0112-51-43,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0112-51-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re mtshan nyid tha snyad kyi mtshan nyid ni chos 3 tshang pa yin no
gsum pa gang zhe na
mtshan gzhi la grub pa dang
column2: rdzas su yod pa dang
column3: rigs mi <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13a2""/> mthun gyi spyi dang
column4: dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin no zhe na

column1: de ltar na mtshan nyid kyi rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin nam mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin
dang po ltar na bum pa mi rtag par mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe
column2: mtshan nyid <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13a3""/> skyon med du thal
column3: chos 3 po de thang pa'i phyir ro

column1: 2 pa ltar na dkar zal ba glang du mtshon pa la nog shal lasogs pa 'dus pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe mtshan nyid skyon med ma yin par thal
column2: mtshan nyid de mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun gyi spyi dang dngos 'gal ma yin pa'i phyir ro

column1: ma grub na nog shal lasogs 'dus pa <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13a4""/> de chon
column2: ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung gi ltago pa yin par thal
column3: ba lang gi tha snyad byar mi rung dang dngos 'gal yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung nyid bzhin no
column7: </seg>

column1: ",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml
ex45012023-03-0211-48-11,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-48-11"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad du mtshon pa la mtshon bya'i don ldog gzhi la grub mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13a5""/> mtshan nyid skyon med yin zer ro
column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0116-13-00,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0116-13-00"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bsdus pa smra ba</rs> la mkhas par grags pa yang khan 3 du 'khams ngan zhes lan 'debs par snang ngo
column3: <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13a9""/></seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0115-54-39,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0115-54-39"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs>
column2: mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de mtshan nyid ma yin pas nyes pa dang po med do
column4: chos 3 tshang pa de mtshan nyid tha snyad kyis rang ldog la brten par ma zhugs pas mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de rigs mi mthun yin yang khyab ches par thal ba'i skyon med do
column6: chos 3 tshang pa de mtshon ldan gyi <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13b8""/> gzhi la zhugs pas
column7: mtshon bya la mi srid par htla ba'i nyes pa med do
column9: zhes zer ro
column11: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0311-17-10,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0311-17-10"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

ldog pa la brten par mtshon pa'i tshe mtshon <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""14a5""/> bya de rten kyi rigs mi mthun dang bsal bya rigs mi mthun 2 su yod pa de khong du ma chud par rang gi mtshon bya rigs mi mthun du 'thad do zhes zer ba ni shes pa bas smra ba rings pa'i gtam yin no
column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0116-11-03,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0116-11-03"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3887"">'jam pa'i rdo rje</rs> na re
column2: rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni
column3: chos gang zhig mtshan gzhi la ji ltar bkod pa ltar grub cing don ldog kyang par ma grub <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""14b8""/> pa'o zhe na

column1: bum pa dngos po'i tha snyad ud mtshon pa la ba lang gi tha snyad mtahn nyid du bkod pa de rang ldog rzdas ma grub ma yin par thal
column2: gzhi la grub ma tshang pa'i phyir
column3: 'dod na rang ldog rdzas yod du thal lo
column5: des na rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni chos gang zhig don ldog kyang par ma grub <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""14b9""/> pa'o
column7: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0115-55-06,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0115-55-06"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs> gzhan gyi mtshon bya mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba yod pa yin te
column2: nog shal lasogs 'dus pa mtshon bya
column3: ba lang gi tha nsyad dang po de ba lang gi tha snyad 2 pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba bzhin no
column4: zhes zer ba ni </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0112-52-17,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0112-52-17"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos kyi seng ge na re</rs> byas pa'i tha snyad byas pa'i tha snyad du mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa de mtshon 'dod med nas mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi la <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""16a3""/> mi srid pa yin ste
column2: mtshan gzhi dang mtshon bya tha dad med pa'i phyir ro zhe na

column1: ba lang gi tha snyad tshad mas grub pa'i tshe nog shal lasogs 'dus pa de ba lang gi tha snyad la ltos te mtshan nyid skyon myed po ma yin par thal
column2: <lb edRef=""inst:5593"" n=""13a5""/> mtshon 'dod med pa'i phyir ro

column1: rtags tshad ma
column2: khyab pa med na mtshon 'dod med pa mtshan nyid kyi skyon <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""16a4""/> yin pa nyams so
column4: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0211-49-30,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-49-30"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brton 'grus seng ge</rs> na re
column2: sems can rtsam po la ba lang gi tha snyad khyab byed du mod (read: med) par mtshon <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""16b3""/> ************* mtshon par mi nus pas mtshan nyid kyi skyon can yin no
column4: de yang mtshon bya la ltos pa'i skyon ma yin ste mtshan nyid kyis mtshan gzhi la ma khyab pa'i skyon yin no zhe na

column1: rten rtsam du yod pa de gang zhes dri'o
column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0115-56-03,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0115-56-03"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
lnga pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs>
column2: dkar zal mtshan gzhi ba lang gi tha snyad dkar zal kho na la yod par mtshon
column3: nog shal laosgs 'dus pa dkar zla kho na la yod pa mtshan ynid du <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""17a4""/> ************* khyab ches nas mtshan gzhi ' dkar zla las gzhan nag sgyur la khyab ches pa yin zer ro
column5: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0112-46-46,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0112-46-46"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba na re</rs> mtshan nyid kyi skyon 3 du ma 'dus pa rnam bcad med pa zhes bya ba'i skyon gzhan bzhi pa yang yod do
column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0112-47-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0112-47-52"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

gnyis pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">rin chen grags</rs> na re [gangs pa zhe'u]<!-- (compl. Tshad bsdus p.90= mtshan nyid kyi skyon thams cad mtshon bya mtshon pa'i rgyu mtshan du mi srid par 'dus zer ro
column3: (cf. Tshad bsdus accepted position p. 91)--></seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0211-51-06,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-51-06"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re mtshon bya'i tha snyadkyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par bzhag bya gzhi la grub pa yin zer ro
column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0211-51-58,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-51-58"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5573"">bdag gi yongs su 'dzin pa</rs> na re rdzas chos ldog chos kyi mtshyd ni rim pa bzhin du rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos ma lus pa la khyab byed du rten pa dang
column2: rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos 'ga' zhig la rten yang 'ga' <lb edRef=""inst:5593"" n=""18b9""/> zhig la mi<lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""22b3""/> rten pa yin zer ro
column4: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0211-53-31,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-53-31"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
khas blangs brjod pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5573"">bgag gi yongs su 'dzin pa</rs> na re
column2: 'jig myed la byas yod bkag pa lta bu'i med dgag de rtags kyi bsgrub bya yin zhing rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin la
column3: 'jig myed byas yin la
column4: 'jig myed byas <lb edRef=""inst:5593"" n=""21b3""/> yod kyis stong pa'i tshogs don ma yin dgag de yang rtags kyi <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""25b4""/>bsgrub bya dang rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin lo
column6: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0112-46-28,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0112-46-28"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba chen po de na re</rs>
column2: ljon shing 'gror snang gi shes pa kha dog la tshad ma yin zer ro
column4: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0112-49-31,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0112-49-31"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
2 pa ltar na rjes dpag * rtog baral du thal
column2: rtog 31a3 pa'i ldog pa ma yin pa'i phyiro zhe na

column1: 'di'i len du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos kyi seng ge </rs>na re rang yul la ltos te rtog pa'i rdzas dang bral ba de yin zer ro
column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0115-56-24,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0115-56-24"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge </rs>rtog par mtshon pa'i mtshan gzhi ma yin pa de yin no zer
column2: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0211-57-56,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-57-56"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> mthun phyogs mi mthun phyogs kyi tshyad <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""43a2""/>  ni bsgrub bya chon dang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa dang mi mthun pa de yin no zhe na
column2: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0115-56-43,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0115-56-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub kyang phyogs 1 la ma grub pa ni sgra la <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b4""/> rtsol byung khyab byed du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'am
column2: sgra la rtsol byung rten rtsam du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'o
column4: zhes zer ro
column6: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0211-59-11,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-59-11"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshogs pa rtags su bkod pa'i tshe ya rgyal 1 chos can la brten yang ya gyal 1 chos can la mi rten na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin ste
column2: ya gyal khegs pas tshogs pa khegs pa'i phyir
column3: tshogs pa chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe
column4: rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la ma grub kyang rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub na <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b7""/> phyogs chos grub pas grub pa yin te
column5: <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>rigs kyi bye brag<?oxy_comment_end?> snang pa dang stong pa'i tshogs don chos can bsgrub pa'i tha snyad du byar rung ste
column6: bsgrub chos ma dor ba yin pa'i phyir zhes rtags su bkod pa'i tshe
column7: bsgrub chos ma dor ba de stong nyid la ma grub kyang snang pa la grub pas snang stong tshogs pa la brten pa'i phyogs chos grub pa bzhin no
column9: <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b8""/> spyi rtags su bkod pa'i tshe bye brag cig chos can la ma grub kyang bye brag 1 chos can la grub na phyogs chos grub pas khyab pa yin ste
column10: rigs kyi bye brag grub pas spyi 'grub pa'i phyir
column11: spyi chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe chos can gyi bye brag 1 la rtags grub kyang chos can gyi bye brag 1 'ang rtags ma grub na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin no
column13: zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos 46b9 kyi seng ge </rs>smra'o
column15: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0112-49-51,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0112-49-51"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re rtags kyi tshyad phyoos dang ldog pa'i khyab pa 2 yin zhing rjes 'gro yod kyang rtags kyi tshyad ma yin no zer ro
column3: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0116-22-19,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0116-22-19"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
khas blangs brjod pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kun gyi bshes gnyen</rs> na re
column3: go byed rtags kyi 'brel pa don la med de
column4: spyi 'brel don la med pa'i phyir te
column5: spyi don la med pa'i phyir dang
column6: chos 1 la <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""54b1""/> 'brel pa mi 'thad cing 'brel pa po 'brel yul gyi chos 2 tshogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro
column8: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex450120240625352,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex450120240625352"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3775"">'brel pa brtags pa</rs> las
column2: <quote source=""db:3775"" n=""v. 1"">de phyir dngos po thams cad kyi
column4: 'brel pa yang dag <abbr>nyid du</abbr> med</quote> ces so
column6: des na 48b5 'brel pa don la med pas bsgrub bya'i chos dang rtags kyang don la med ces grag go
column8: </seg>

column1: ",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml
ex45012023-03-0112-50-09,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0112-50-09"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos kyi seng ge na re </rs>thal 'gyur rang rgyud la mi 'khrul <lb edRef=""inst:5593"" n=""63a7""/> ba yin te
column2: de ('di) 2 rtogs pa gnad 1 pa'i phyir ro
column4: </seg> ",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0116-15-50,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0116-15-50"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4771"">gzhan gyi phyogs thamd las rnaM par rgyal ba</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong sing ha shri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4332"">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par brtsaMs te
column3: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5574"">dpal rtse dkar gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o
column5: rdzogs sho
column7: </seg>",2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml

column1: ex45012023-03-0116-15-51,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0116-15-51"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4771"">rigs pa'i de nyid gsal ba</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">rigs pas smra <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""77a5""/> ba'i dge' sbyong sing ha shri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4332"">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par brtsams te
column4: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5574"">dpal rtse dkar gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o
column6: bkra shis par gyur cig
column8: </seg>

column1: ",2_037_01 Blo gros rgyal mtshan_'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad nyi ma'i rgyan.xml

ex37012023-09-11-145230,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex37012023-09-11-145230""><lb n=""225a2""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4728"">'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad mdo'i nyi ma'i rgyan </rs>zhes <lb n=""225a3""/> bya ba di ni
column2: 'dul ba 'dzin pa stan 1 pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4311"">nam_mkha' rin chen</rs> dang
column3: lung riGS smra ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""> <!--grub pa seng ge ???-->grub pa seng ge</rs>
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--dpal ldan seng ge ???-->dka' bcu 'dzin pa dpal_ldan seng ge</rs>

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--byang chub dpal ???-->'dul ba 'dzin pa byang chub dpal</rs>_la <abbr>sogs pa</abbr> don du gnyer <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob ma rnams</rs> kyi bskul <abbr>ba'i</abbr> ngor: mkhyen rabs <lb n=""225a4""/> dang <abbr>thugs rje</abbr>'i mnga' bdag lhar bcas 'gro ba kun gyi gtsug_gi <abbr>nor bu</abbr> <abbr>mkhan chen</abbr> <abbr>rin po che'i</abbr> <abbr>byin gyis</abbr> brlabs shing 'dul ba 'buM sde'i mnga' bdag 'dul ba 'dzin pa<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4003""> dmar ston dpal_ldan rin chen <?oxy_comment_start comment=""P10033?""?><?oxy_comment_end?></rs> dang:  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4004"">'dul ba 'dzin pa nam_mkha' rgyal mtshan<?oxy_comment_start comment=""P71?""?><?oxy_comment_end?>gyi</rs> sku drin la [b]rten_nas: <rs type=""work"">'dul <lb n=""225a5""/> ba mdo rtsa ba</rs>'i tshig don la <abbr>blo gros kyi</abbr> snang ba <abbr>cung zad</abbr> 'chod pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4002""><abbr>dge slong blo gros rgyal mtshan</abbr></rs> gyis
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dpal_ldan bla ma</rs>s <abbr>byin gyis</abbr> brlabs <abbr>pa'i</abbr> gdan sa: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5748"">yol rin chen <abbr>gling gi</abbr> gtsug lag khang<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> </rs>du <hi rendition=""#Time"">lnga brgya phrag brgyad pa'i drug bcu re 3 pa: sa mo bya: zhi ba<anchor xml:id=""a2""/>'i lo <lb n=""225a6""/> dbyar zla ra ba<anchor xml:id=""a3""/>'i yar ngo'i tshes 3<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> </hi>la zin bris_su bkod pa'o
column3: <abbr>mkhan chen rin po che nas</abbr> 'dis pha mas gtso byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>sems can</abbr> <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyis <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen <abbr>pa'i</abbr> go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig
column4: yi_ge pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4729"">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros seng ge</rs>'o
column6: phyoGS dus gnas <lb n=""225a7""/> skabs <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du bkrashis par gyu[r] cig
column7: × <!--lantsa characters--> dge'o
column9: </seg>",2_037_01 Blo gros rgyal mtshan_'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad nyi ma'i rgyan.xml

column1: ex112_2023_05_08,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" ana=""corpusmd:the_tshom"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_08"" status=""reviewed"">des na don du myi 'gyur ba'i the tsoM 'jug pa'i <choice><corr>yan</corr><sic>yang</sic></choice> lag sngar yod pas don du 'gyur ba'i the tsoM nyid myi dgos pa dang
column2: don du myi 'gyur ba'i the tsoM ldog pa'i yan lag gzhan sngar gnas pa yang bzlog par myi nus pas dgos 'brel kyi ngag don myed do zhe na

column1: de ni bden te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag cag</rs> dgos 'brel kyi ngag 'jug pa'i yan lag du khas <abbr>len to</abbr>
column3: <pb n=""4a""/><lb n=""4a1""/> 'on kyang 'dir ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""> slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pa tsaM bkod pa yin la de'i 'dod pas kyang don du 'gyur ba'i the tsoM don la shas cher rtog pa la 'dod do
column5: de yang myi 'thad pa ni dngos po'i nyes pa yin bas 'di ci byar yod
column6: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex112_2023_05_082,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_082"" status=""reviewed"">de las <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3773"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos kyi <choice><corr>grags</corr><sic>drags</sic></choice> pa</rs>s 'bras <choice><corr>bus</corr><sic>bu</sic></choice>  nye bar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa de gtan la <lb n=""4a7""/> dbab par 'dod pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa'i tshig gi don 'chad pa ni <quote source=""db:3779"" n=""37b4"">myi slu bar byed pa'i shes pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa yin no</quote> zhes bya <choice><reg>ba'o</reg><orig>ba.do→ba'o</orig></choice>
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex112_2023_05_083,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_083"" ana=""corpusmd:yid_dpyod"" status=""reviewed""> yid dpyod rnaM pa bzhi po rgyu mtshan myed pa dang
column2: log pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang
column3: yang dag pa'i rgyu mtshan gtan la ma <lb n=""4b8""/> phebs pa dang
column4: phebs kyang brjed pa ni the tsoM du 'du la the tsom yang gnyi gar gyur ba myed pa'i yul 'jog pas log pa'i shes par du'o zhes <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> sems so
column6: </seg>",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

column1: ex1122023-07-1715-14-27,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-14-27"" ana=""corpusmd:blo_rigs"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag</rs> gis ni 'di ltar rig go
column3: shes pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste
column4: yang dag par rtogs pa dang
column5: ma rtogs pa dang
column6: log par rtogs pa dang
column7: the tsoM mo
column9: de la dang po ni tha snyad pa'i yang dag par rtogs pa kho na yin bas tshad ma'o
column11: gnyis pa ni tha snyad pa'i rtogs pa'i byed pa dang bral ba yin bas snang <choice><corr>la</corr><sic>pa</sic></choice> ma nges pa dang bcad pa'i yul can no
column13: gsuM pa ni myed pa'i don rtogs par <lb n=""5a2""/> byed pa la log pa'i shes pa mtha' dag go
column15: bzhi ba ni gang yang rnaM par myi gcod pas gang yang yongs su myi gcod pa'i phyir don <choice><corr>'jug</corr><sic>'jig</sic></choice>  pa'i nus pa myed pa'o
column17: yid dpyod mtha' dag ni log pa'i shes par 'du ste
column18: don myed par 'byung pas don myed pa'i rang bzhin dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro
column20: dper na du ba dang dus mnyaM du yod pa'i dngos po rnaMs ni me myed kyang 'byung pas mye'i 'bras bu ma yin ba'i rang bzhin dang ma bral <lb n=""5a3""/> ba bzhin no
column22: </seg>",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

column1: ex1122023-05-241713,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-241713"" ana=""corpusmd:tshad_ma"" status=""reviewed"">
mtshan nyid la log par rtogs pa spang pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5557"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5549"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shag kya blo</rs> phyi rol kyi nor bu'i 'od la nang gi nor bur sgro 'dogs pa tshad mar 'dod pa dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5534"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon dul ba'i lha</rs> ni phyed kyi dus su nyin bar bu 'ongs par mthong pa'i rmyi laM kyang shes pa tshad mar 'dod pa dang
column5: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3771"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po</rs>'i slob ma kha cig</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">mu stegs kha cig</rs> <choice><corr>dung</corr><sic>dang</sic></choice> <lb n=""5a4""/> dkar po la ser por 'khrul pa yang dkar po'i mdog dang dbyibs la tshad mar 'dod pa rnaMs spangs pa'o
column9: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex1122023-05-24.17.241,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.241"" status=""reviewed"">des na <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gis dor byar bsdus pa dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5534"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon <choice><corr>dul</corr><sic>du</sic></choice> ba'i lha</rs>s don gsuM par bshad pa gnyi ka 'khrul pa yin no
column4: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex1122023-07-1715-34-59,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-34-59"" status=""reviewed"">'di ltar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> mngon suM rang rig pa'i rang bzhin don daM par yod la
column2: rjes su dpag pa <choice><corr>rnam par rtog pa</corr><sic>rnaM par rtog par rtog pa</sic></choice> ni don daM par myed kyi <pb n=""7a""/><lb n=""7a1""/> kun rdzob du yod do zhes zer ba ni

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""I'""/>
myi rigs ste</seg> rang rig pa las ngo bo tha dad na
column2: [-› mi rigs te
column3: ] rnaM rtog dngos por yod ba la gnod byed myed pa dang
column4: tha snyad du yang bsgrub byed myed par thal pa dang
column5: dngos por yod pa'i bsgrub byed yod pa'i phyir ro
column7:
,1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml
ex1122023-05-24.17.282,<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.282"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3735"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon ka ma la shi la</rs> na re
column8: mtshan nyid ni grub pa yin te mtshon par byed pa yin ba'i phyir ro
column10: mtshon <choice><corr>bya ni</corr><sic>bya'i</sic></choice> ma <lb n=""7b8""/>grub pas bsgrub pa yin na mtshan nyid dang <choice><reg> </reg>

column1: <orig>{ma grub pa'i khyad par}</orig></choice>mtshon bya phyin ci log du <abbr>thal lo</abbr> zhes gsungs so
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex1122023-05-24.17.30,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.30"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> na re
column2: gnas skabs ni gnyis ste <choice><corr>mtshan nyid</corr><sic>mtshan</sic></choice>  gtan la 'bebs pa dang
column3: mtshan nyid kyis tha snyad du byed do
column5: </seg>",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

column1: ex1122023-07-1715-43-33,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-43-33"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5629"">slob dpon rab du zhi ba bzang po</rs> 'di skad ces
column2: mying dang mying can kyi 'brel pa ci zhig bsgrub par zad kyi
column3: mtshon bya grub pa la mtshan nyid bsgrubs pa'am
column4: mtshan <lb n=""8a3""/> nyid grub pas mtshon bya bsgrub pa ni ma yin te
column5: rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid la mgnon suM zhes 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba'i don la <choice><corr>bsdu</corr><sic>ba su ba</sic></choice> ni
column6: <quote source=""db:3779"" n=""40b1-2""> rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul ba nyid <choice><corr>ma grub pa</corr><sic>bsgrub pa</sic></choice> yin quote</quote> zhes bya ba'o
column8: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex1122023-05-24.17.31,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.31"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""3773"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon</rs> kyis 'khrul ba ni log par snang pa yin no zhes bshad pas de bral ba gzung yul la ma 'khrul ba grub po
column2: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex1122023-05-24.17.32,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.32"" status=""reviewed"">de bden <lb n=""9b5""/> te des na <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5594"">chos mchog chen po</rs>r <quote source=""db:5594"" n=""ad PVin 1 40,3"">grur zhugs pa'i 'khrugs pa lasogs pa</quote> zhes rgyu gsuM bshad do
column3: 'dir ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gis legs par ma brtags par nges so
column5: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex1122023-05-24.17.33,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.33"" status=""reviewed"">glan ka spang pa ni don gzhan myi 'dzin na bcad pa'i yul can du thal ba dang
column2: 'dzin na dbang po'i shes pa la myi ltos na
column3: 'on long myed pa dang
column4: ltos kyang don gzhan 'dzin bas 'on long myed par thal ba brjod pa las
column5: yul gzhan yin bas nyes pa dang po spangs so
column7: de'i rgyun <lb n=""10a5""/> 'dzin bas don gzhan myi 'dzin ba'i phyir 'on long myed pa'i nyes pa myed la
column8: de'i nyer len la ltos pas gtan tshigs myi ltos pa yang ma yin no
column10: zhes <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> dgongs so
column12: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

ex1122023-05-24.17.383,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.383"" ana=""corpusmd:mi_dmigs_pa"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> ltar na dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba ni bltar rung pa'o
column3: de ni myi dmyigs pa'i khyad par yin no
column5: myi dmyigs pa <lb n=""15a3""/>zhes bya ba ngo bo dang khyad par bltar rung pa 'gal ba ma <abbr>yin te</abbr>
column6: khyad par sgro btags pa'i phyir ro
column8: sgro gdags par bya ba ni rgyu mtshan yin la de yang sa phyogs kyi chos yod na buM pa snang par brtag par bya ba'o
column12: de'i rang bzhin yang buM par snang pa'i shes pa'i rgyu nus pa <choice><corr>thogs</corr><sic>thog</sic></choice> myed tshang pa'o
column14: sgro gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan de'i shes par byed pa yang shes pa cig la <choice><corr>'dre</corr><sic>'dra</sic></choice>  ba'i don gzhan snang pa'o zhes so
column16: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml

column3: smra ba rnams kyi dam pa bla ma la
column5: thos nas dam pa <lb n=""[6b2]""/> <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> thob bya'i phyir
column7: dam pa'i rtsod pa la mkhas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">ral gri</rs>s bkod
column8: </seg>",2_055_02_F_C_NO_LC_M_Ral gri_rtsod rigs bsdus don_etext.xml

column1: ex50222023-09-131,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50222023-09-131"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"">sher phyin gyi man ngag gi spyi khrigs laM gsal ba'i me tog </rs>ces bya ba zab pa'i don <pb n=""[6b4]""/> bstan pa rdzogs s+ho
column3: <!--TODO add name in APIS of gnyan--> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">gnyan </rs>gyi dpe la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">slob dpon chen po snar thang pa brgyad pa</rs><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">smon laM tshul khriMs</rs>r byon pas bris pa de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">btsun pa (<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">ze'u</rs>) chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis bris shing zhus te dag par byas pa'o
column5: </seg>",2_050_22 shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i man ngag.xml

column1: ex50222023-09-202,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50222023-09-202"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">snar thang gyi dben gnas</rs> su <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma</rs>'i phyag dpe la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyi [gyis] bris pa'o
column3: </seg>",2_050_22 shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i man ngag.xml

column1: ex22032023-09-181,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex22032023-09-181"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""[40b2]""/> <rs type=""work"">sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i bshad sbyar</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon ye shes zhabs</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Buddhajñānapāda""?><?oxy_comment_end?> kyi dgongs pa la 'khrul pa spang pa'i phyir
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5878"">shag kya'i rge [dge] slong ye shes rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis sbyar ba'o
column4: rdzogs so
column10: <lb n=""[40b3]""/> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5656"">rgyan dkar × phug<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> </rs>du bris so
column16: <rs type=""work"">shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa</rs>'i
column17: don la dmyigs shing 'khrul pa'i skyon rnams sel cing sku × 'khrungs pa'i
column18: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">dam pa shes rab 'bar</rs> zhes grags
column19: chu snod cig nas cig byo bzhin
column20: don dang tshig rnams rdzogs par yang'
column21: 'gro la phan phyir don rnams sgrogs <lb n=""[40b4]""/> gsregs? don<rs type=""person"" ana=""""> ye shes rgyal</rs> zhes grags
column22: skye* shis 'jigs nas chos rgyad bor
column24: don tsam snang yang bye brag rjed [=brjed?]
column25: dran pa bso phyir <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4335"">chos 'khor bsam yas</rs> dag du bris
column26: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">dge' bshes zhug ston</rs> zhes byar grags
column29: *thos mang sems <note type=""gloss"">dang</note> sims? kyi * me long lta
column31: <lb n=""[40b5]""/> <rs type=""person"" ana="""">shes rab thog po</rs> zhes su grags
column39: ItI
column43: </seg>",1_022_03_ Ye shes rgyal mtshan _ bsdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i bshad sbyar.xml

column1: ex1072023-02-1410-45-44,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1072023-02-1410-45-44"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5537""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3713""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3694"">bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po</rs> rgya cher bshad pa</rs> <choice><sic>'di</sic><corr>'i</corr></choice> don bsdus pa</rs> ni rnam pa bzhi ste
column2: ngag dang po'i don dang
column3: mdo'i lus rnam par gzhag ba dang
column4: yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang
column5: yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o
column7: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_07_rNgog_shes rab snying bshad don bsdus.xml
ex1072023-02-1410-46-47,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1072023-02-1410-46-47"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:dgos_brel"">
dgos 'brel du <choice><orig>b(k)od</orig><reg>bkod</reg></choice> pa'i dgos pa ni
column2: nges pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang
column3: don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gis 'jug pa dang
column4: gzhan gi log par rtogs pa spang ba gsum bzhag nas
column5: gzhung mdzes par bya ba yin no
column7: zhes <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5530"">skabs gzhan</rs> <choice><orig>‹du›</orig><reg>du</reg></choice> gtan la phab pa bzhin du shes par bya'o
column9: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_07_rNgog_shes rab snying bshad don bsdus.xml
ex1072023-02-1410-26-37,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1072023-02-1410-26-37"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><!-- ""slob dpon gzhan"" might be Indian or Tibetan-->
'on kyang <quote source=""db:3694"">'di skad bdag gis thos pa</quote> zhes bya bas gtsor brjod pa'i don ni phyin ci ma log pa <lb n=""2a7""/> dang dngos nyid du yin ba dang
column2: rtogs pa ma yin <choice><orig> ‹par›</orig><reg>par</reg> </choice><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon gzhan</rs> gis bshad pa bzhin blta ste
column3: 'dir ni cung zad nor par bshad pa yin no
column5: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_07_rNgog_shes rab snying bshad don bsdus.xml
ex1072023-02-2412-02-43,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1072023-02-2412-02-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><!--kha cig could be Indian or Tibetan-->

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha<choice><orig>ci‹g›</orig><reg>cig</reg> </choice> </rs> las las kyi bdud dang lngar gsungs ba der ni nyon mongs pa dang las gnyi gas phung po<choice><orig>lha‹g›</orig><reg>lhag</reg> </choice> ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i<choice><orig>‹ba›r</orig><reg>bar</reg> </choice> du gcod pa'i <lb n=""2b2""/> phyir ro
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_07_rNgog_shes rab snying bshad don bsdus.xml
