<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs> la don bzhi ste
[1] spyi'i don lus rnam par gzhag pa dang
column2: [2] 'bras bu dkon mchog gi don dang
column3: [3] de sgrub par byed pa'i rigs kyi don dang
column4: [4] bstan bcos yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o
column6: </seg>",1_007_04_D_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma bsdus don.xml

column1: ex70426-04-202313.40,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70426-04-202313.40"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4490""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs>'i bsdus pa'i don</rs> <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3831"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar ba'o
column5: </seg>",1_007_04_D_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma bsdus don.xml

column1: ex8032023-07-1011-42-55,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-42-55""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4207"">blo chung ngur gyur kyang mchog du rlom pa kha cig</rs> <!-- Tshad bsdus=me dig pa--> mi srid pa ni mtshon bya la ye med pa dang ma khyab pa phyogs cig la med pa dang khyab ches gzhan la'ang zhugs pa yin pas de gsum du nges te <lb n=""27'b3""/> mtshan nyid yin pa la de gsum dang bral dgos pa dang de gsum dang ma bral na mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column2: de gsum dang bral ba tsam gyis mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma nges so zhes zer ba

column1: de'i ltar na mtshan nyid kyi skyon mi srid pa dang khyab ches pa gnyis su nges te mtshan nyid yin pa la de gnyis dang bral dgos pa'i phyir dang de gnyis dang ma bral na mtshan nyid <lb n=""27'b4""/>  ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column2: </seg>

column1: ",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

ex8032023-07-1011-39-07,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-39-07"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786""><!--rngog lo-->blo ldan bzang po</rs>s gzung yul dang 'jug yul gang gis <lb n=""41b8""/> kyang khyad par du ma byas pa'i yul bden pa dang ldan pa dang rtog pa dang bral ba mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid du 'dod do
column2: </seg>",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

column1: ex8032023-07-1011-40-09,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-40-09""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo ldan bzang po</rs>s the tsom dang ldan pa'i gzhi la shes 'dod 'jug rung du brjod pa'ang phyir rgol bsgrub bya'i chos la log rtogs dang ldan pa dang yid dpyod kyi nges pa dang blo kha ma phyogs pa'i gzhi la ma khyab pa dang
column2: bsgrub bya'i chos la log <lb n=""44a9""/> rtogs med na thal ba'i rtags ma grub la log rtogs yod na rang rgyud la shes 'dod med par 'gyur bas bsgrub pa'i thal 'gyur rgyun chad par yang 'gyur ro
column4: </seg>

column1: ",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

ex8032023-07-2416-41-11,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-41-11"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma <lb n=""50b3""/> dag</rs> dpe la yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pa'i shugs la mnyan bya'i yod pa la 'ang mi rtag pas ma khyab pa'i dogs pa mtshan nyid nges pa'i tshul gyis chod pas rjes 'gro dang gzhi la bkag pa'i ldog pa gnyi ga bsgrub bya ma grub pa'i snga rol du nges su rung par gsung mod kyi
column2: </seg>",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

column1: ex8032023-07-2416-41-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-41-36"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma kha cig</rs> yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pas sgra'i yod pa la mi rtag pas khyab pa shugs la grub par smra te
column2: </seg>",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

column1: ex8032023-07-2416-42-31,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-42-31"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma dag</rs> bsgrub bya ni gnyis te
column2: rtags kyi nus pa'i yul gyi bsgrub bya dang
column3: skyon yon bsam pa'i bsgrub bya'o
column5: </seg>",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

column1: ex8032023-07-1011-41-02,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-41-02"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo ldan bzang po</rs>s rlom yul gyi bsgrub bya ba lang gi brda'i <lb n=""80b9""/> rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin la nog dang lkog shal la rlom yul gyi bsgrub byas khyab pa'ang 'dod pas spyod pa'i brda' lan cig zhugs pas nges pa yin no
column2: </seg>",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

column1: ex8032023-07-1011-35-29,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-35-29"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4503"">tshad ma yid kyi mun pa sel pa</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">blo gsal zhing rigs par smra bas rtog ge ngan pa'i gzhung 'jig pa brtul zhugs mchog la legs par gnas pa'i dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar ba
column3: rdzogs s.hO
column5: </seg>

column1: ",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

ex8032023-07-1011-35-30,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-35-30"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""96a4""/>mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas bsod nams dpal gyis brjid
column3: legs gsungs dgongs 'grel chos kyi rin chen mdzod
column5: dam pa'i 'phreng mdzes dge legs gang chen mtsho'
column7: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusm:named_reference"" ref=""db:4362"">bri'u las gtsug lag khang</rs> du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> gis bris
column9: dge zhing bkris
column11: </seg>",1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-51-15,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-51-15"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5517""> tshad ma rnam nges kyi 'grel bshad</rs><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5518""> bo dong 'jam dbyangs</rs> kyis mdzad pa bzhugs
column3: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2609-49-04,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-49-04"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">bram ze chen po</rs>'i rjes su 'brang ba [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> na re
column2: don bden pa rtogs pa chos gsum tshang ba yin la
column3: de yang don ni shes bya'i gnas lugs yin la
column4: bden pa ni ji ltar yin pa'am yod ltar gnas pa'o
column6: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-34-10,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-34-10"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
[]gsum pa yid dpyod ni rtags la ma brten par sngar ma rtogs pa'i lkog gyur dngos su rtogs pa yin no ce na
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column3: blo 'dod rgyal ba yin pas gnas skabs don dang mthun yang log pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te
column4: don med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir te
column5: dper na du ba dang dus mnyam du skyes pa'i rlangs pa ni me dang lhan cig yod kyang me'i 'bras bu ma yin te
column6: me dang ldog pa ma grub pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs so zhes zer ro
column8: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-21-55,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-21-55"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""5a5""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3892""> chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]</rs>zhal nas
column2: yid dpyod tshad mar thal te
column3: don bden pa gsar du nges pa'i phyir ro
column5: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-35-00,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-00"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pas the tshom ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis kar 'dzin pa yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin la
column2: rgyu mtshan med pa dang log pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang bden pa'i rgyu mtshan gtan la ma phebs pa can yang the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin no zhes grag go

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: de mi rigs te
column3: the tshom gyis gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yongs su ma bcad pa'i phyir dang
column4: log pa'i shes pa ni don de ma yin du yongs su <lb n=""5a7""/>gcod byed yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o
column6: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-23-13,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-23-13"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]/</rs>zhal nas
column2: the tshom de dang log pa'i shes pa gcig pa mi srid de
column3: the tshom ni [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed gnod byed gang gi yang mthar ma thug pa yin la
column4: log pa'i shes pa la ni gnod byed nges pa min pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-35-21,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-21"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: rnam pa gnyis zhes brjod pa ni
column3: gnyis su grangs nges par gzung ba'i don du ste
column4: de lta ma yin na
column5: re shig 'dir 'di tsam zhig brjod par zad kyi
column6: dbye ba gzhan yang srid do zhes dogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni mi bden te
column7: 'o zhes yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig gis mtha' gzhan du srid pa'i dgos pa bkag pa'i phyir ro
column9: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2610-23-13,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-23-13"">gzhan yang gzhal bya yul dus kyi mthar thug pa rang gi mtshan nyid de ma yin rnam par bcad pa spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis kho <lb n=""7a4""/>na rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
column3: []zhes <rs type=""work"">[\[]ti ka [;]ṭikka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">[\]]mkhan po [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> [\[]gsung [;]gsungs [\]]pa'ang legs so
column5: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-35-45,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-45"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: tha snyad pa'i rtags kyi bsgrub bya 'di ni tshad ma'i gzhal bya yin pas dngos po'i chos gcig yin la
column3: de'ang tshad mas grub zin pa de nyid ma yin gyi rang bzhin sems dpa'i blos dpyad na don de la sngar bkod pa'i brda'i rgyu mtshan gyis chos mi 'dra ba bkag pa mi slu ba'i yul gyi bsgrub bya'o
column5: rjes dpag gi zhen stangs dang sbyar na tha snyad du brda'i rgyu mtshan gyi chos su grub pa'i ma <lb n=""9a9""/>yin dgag go zhes gsung ngo
column7: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-36-26,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-36-26"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3735""> ka ma la shi la</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""> chos mchog</rs> ltar na
column3: mngon sum dang rtog bral ma 'khrul ba gnyis grub bde gcig gam mi gcig grang
column4: gcig na sgrub pa dang rjes su brjod pa'i don mi 'thad la
column5: mi gcig na mtshan nyid dang mtshon byar mi <lb n=""12b5""/>'thad do zhes thun mong du rtsod pa'i skyon med de
column6: mtshan mtshon don chos dag pa ma yin la
column7: blo ngor grub ma grub gnyis mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro
column9: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-24-19,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-24-19"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje pa</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: de lta na 'drer rung 'dzin pa zhes brjod na'ang dngos su 'dres pa 'dzin pa la ma khyab pas des na sgra dang don gnyis shes pa gcig gis 'dzin pa ni 'dres rung 'dzin pa'o
column4: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-24-48,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-24-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje paN Di ta</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column2: mngon sum tshad ma'i mtshan nyid rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid yin gyi gzhan mi dgos so zhes gsung ba'i don ni
column3: mtshon bya mngon sum dang tshad ma gnyis yod pa bzhin du der 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rigs gnyis te
column4: ma 'khrul ba dang tshogs pa'i rtog bral gyis mngon sum du 'jog la
column5: rtog bral dang tshogs pa'i ma 'khrul bas tshad mar 'jog pa la dgongs so
column7: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-38-34,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-38-34"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: khyab pa med de
column3: gal te yod na rjes dpag la gzhal bya'i rnam pa mi snang bar thal
column4: gzhal bya las dngos su ma skyes pa'i phyir gsung ba'i skyon med de
column5: gal te snang na rjes dpag snang bas 'jug pa'i tshad mar <lb n=""14b3""/>thal ba dang
column6: rjes dpag snang yul la ma 'khrul ba'i tshad mar yang 'gyur ro
column8: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-39-18,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-39-18"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
'di la'ang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra yod pa'ang ma yin
column2: sgra de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin yang des gzugs 'dzin ma bskyed du chug na'ang sgra tha dad ldan par yod pa gang gis 'gog
column3: de ma bkag par gzugs 'dzin sgra las ma skyes par mi 'grub po zer na
column4: skyon med de
column5: spyir de la sgra yod pa <lb n=""14b8""/>tsam 'gog pa ma yin gyi gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra tha dad ldan pa ltar rung ma rang ldog sgra yin pa 'gog pa yin la
column6: de ltar na ma dmigs pa khegs so
column8: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2609-51-11,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-51-11"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column2: gzhan <lb n=""15b5""/>yang don ni nyer sbyor la sogs thal 'gyur gyi dbang shes rtog bral du bsgrub par thal ste
column3: rtsa ba'i sbyor ba thal sbyor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa'i skyon med de dngos su thal ba brjod kyang
column4: dbang shes sgra don 'dre rung 'dzin pa 'gog pa la brda' dran sngon du ma song ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rgyu'am khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i don 'phen byed yin pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2609-52-49,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-52-49""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> de ni ma nges te
column2: a (rya?) gar bar <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la chos bzhi so sor 'dzin pa med kyang don <lb n=""16b2""/>sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa yin te
column3: bya ba gzhan btang nas gzhan len pa'i phyir zer na
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana="""" ref=""db:"">gnyal pa yab sras</rs><!--probably gNyal zhig db 3887-->  na re
column5: chos bzhi so sor 'dzin nus kyi stong ba rtags su 'god pas skyon med zer yang
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column7: ar gsar <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la ji srid chos bzhi so sor 'dzin par med pa de srid du de sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa'ang med par thal
column8: ji srid chos bzhi sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa de srid du chos bzhi so sor 'dzin <lb n=""16b3""/>pa yang yod ces gsung ba ni 'thad par mthong ngo
column10: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2609-55-16,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-55-16"">tshad mas ma mthong ba'i don lkog shal 'dus pa nye ba nyid kyis nang gi 'du byed brda' dran pa'i bag chags yin la
column2: de sad <lb n=""18b6""/>par byas pa des dran par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhe na
column3: []de'i lan la
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column5: ba lang gi sgra chos can
column6: ma mthong ba'i don nye ba las dran par 'gyur ba ma yin te ma mthong [\[]pa'i [;]ba'i [\]]don dang brda'i 'brel med par thal
column7: rang bzhin 'brel pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro gsung ba ltar na
column8: ba lang gtan nas ma mthong zhing ba men gyi steng du srog chags 'di 'dra ba'i ba lang zhes pa'i dud 'gro yod do ces brda' goms pa la brten nas phyis ba men mthong ba <lb n=""18b7""/>na ba lang gi sgra dran pa mi srid par thal lo
column10: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-25-19,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-25-19"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje paṇ ṭi ta</rs> ni mngon sum 'gros gsum pa yin te
column2: don gang zhig [\[23a2\]]'dzin pa na kha phyir bltas la dbang shes dang yid shes dus mnyam pa gnyis dang
column3: nang du de dag myong ba'i rang rig dang gsum mo
column5: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-39-43,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-39-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> ltar na
column2: tshad ma snga ma dbang shes chos can
column3: gzhan la nges kyi tshad ma kho nar thal
column4: rang yul la tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir
column5: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2609-56-24,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-56-24"">mdor na gzhal bya mngon gyur lkog gyur yin pa'i phyir sngon po dang skad cig ma bzhin no ce na
column2: []de dgag pa la
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column4: dpyad bya mngon gyur ma yin par thal ba dang
column5: dpyod byed shes pa'i khyad par tshad mas ma grub par thal ba gnyis las
column6: []dang po la
column7: thal ba chos gsum las
column8: dang po ni
column9: longs spyod byed kyi shes pa chos can
column10: longs spyad bya thams cad mngon gyur ma yin par thal
column11: longs spyod byed kyi shes pa mngon sum tshad mas <lb n=""30a4""/>ma grub pa'i phyir ro
column13: []gnyis pa gtan tshigs ni khas blangs khyab pa ma grub ste
column14: spyod byed shes pa mi gsal zhing rtag pa'i phyir mngon sum tshad mas ma grub kyang
column15: spyad bya gsal zhing mi rtag pa'i phyir mngon gyur yin no zhe na
column16: shes rig yul la longs spyod pa mi srid par thal ces pa yang gi sgras bstan no
column18: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-26-03,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-26-03"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892""> chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta</rs>'i [\]]zhal nas
column2: rnal 'byor mngon sum gang yin pa tshad ma yin te
column3: mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: hes gsung ba ltar rtogs par bya'o
column7: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-26-48,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-26-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
[]gnyis pa ma 'ongs pa bsgrub pa ni
column2: chos nyid yang dag pa'i don la rtse gcig tu gnas te bsgom pa chos can
column3: chos nyid yang dag pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du gsal bar snang ba gcig byung ste
column4: chos nyid yang <lb n=""32b7""/>dag pa'i don la goms par byed pa'i rten brtan zhing
column5: goms pa ngang gis khyad par du 'gyur ba bsgom pa'i phyir
column6: dper na chags yul goms pa bzhin
column7: de'i chos can ni rang rig gis grub la
column8: bsgrub bya'i chos ni 'byung rung mi bsgom pa la yang yod cing 'byung nges bsgom pa la yang med pas [\[]gags [;]gegs [\]]med cing bsgom pa'i yan lag dang ma bral na 'byung nges yin te
column9: rgyu tshogs pa grangs tshang gis [\[]gags [;]gegs [\]]med na 'bras bu 'byung nges dpag nus pa <lb n=""32b8""/>bzhin no
column11: zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s gsung ngo
column13: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2610-15-09,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-15-09"">gsum pa [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed kyi tshad ma ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras </rs> rtog bral dang ma 'khrul ba <lb n=""33b3""/>so sor 'chad mod
column3: 'on kyang 'dir yang dag pa'i don mthong ste goms pa mthar thug pa la brten nas yang dag pa'i don gsal bar snang bar grub pa na rtog bral dang ma 'khrul ba grub sde gcig pas
column4: 'dir dngos su rtog bral du bsgrub pa ni gzhung gi dgongs pa yin par mngon no
column6: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2609-56-59,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-56-59"">gnyis pa mngon sum ltar snang la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras</rs> rnams na re
column3: brtsod pa'i lan du
column4: yang dag gnyis su bstan
column5: yang dag gnyis yod pa'i phyir ltar snang gnyis su <lb n=""35a7""/>bstan
column6: ltar snang gnyis yod pa'i phyir 'khrul pa ltar snang gi rigs logs su dbye ba dang gsum zhes gsung ngo
column8: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2609-58-08,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-58-08"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column2: gzhal bya ni phyi rol gyi don bden pa yin la
column3: tshad ma ni 'dra ba chos gsum ste
column4: ngo bo myong rtogs kyi bdag nyid rnam pa'i khyad par myong bya'i rnam pa shar ba nus pa'i khyad par myong bya la <lb n=""36b""/> nges pa'i shes pa 'dren nus so
column6: []'bras bu ni gzhal bya phyi rol gyi don rtogs pa'o
column8: []zhes gsung ba ni
column9: mi 'thad de
column10: </seg> 'o na shes pa don dang 'dra ba chos can
column11: don rtogs kyi [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed ma yin par thal
column12: des don rtogs su 'jog par mi nus pa'i phyir
column13:
,X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml
exX0062023-05-2609-59-40,<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-59-40"">'di'i lan la
column14: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column15: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">kho bo cag</rs>  theg pa chen po pa yang tha snyad tshad 'bras kyi tshul 'di khyod mdo sde pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'dod pa yin no zhes gsung ba ni
column16: mi bden te
column17: rigs pas de kho na'i don yongs su tshol ba'i skabs su rigs pa dor nas grub mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba ni
column18: bya ba phal pa la chags pa zhes bya ba smad pa'i gnas su <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyis kyang gsungs shing
column19: gzhung na'ang
column20: gzung dang 'dzin pa rig <lb n=""40b2""/>pa rnams
column22: []ces theg pa chen po pas tha snyad tshad 'bras kyi rnam bzhag 'khrul pa'i shes pa la ji ltar snang bzhin du rnam par bzhag gi
column23: grub mtha'i rjes su zhugs nas bzhag pa ni ma yin no
column25: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2610-00-38,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-00-38"">gsum pa don snang gzhal byar bstan pa ni
column2: 'o na don rig <lb n=""42b6""/>tshad ma'i gzhal bya gang yin ce na
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column4: shes pa de mdo sde pa ltar du phyi rol gyi don de dang 'dra'am
column5: rnam rig pa ltar don snang gi bag chags dang 'dra yang rung zer ba ltar na
column6: don snang gi bag chags gzhal bya mngon gyur du thal
column7: don rig mngon sum gyi gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir
column8: []des na rnam bzhag de ni rigs pa'i ra ba las [\[]rgal [;]'gal [\]]ba yin no
column10: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2610-01-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-01-36"">'di ni bzung ba tsam bden pa bkag nas 'dzin pa'ang bden par grub pa 'gog pa'i gzhung yin pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column2: shu lo ka gcig po 'dis dbu ma'i lta ba bsgrubs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ni
column3: dbu ma'i lta ba la sbyar du <lb n=""43b3""/>mi rung [\[]pa [;]ba [\]]ma yin mod
column4: sems tsam rnam med pa'i gzung 'dzin dang rnam pa bden pa 'gog pa'i skabs yin par shin tu gsal te
column5: brtsod [\[-]pa [\]]spang na yang
column6: sems tsam rnam med pa'i grub mtha' la rtsod pa spangs kyi
column7: dbu ma pa la brtsod pa spang bar mi snang ba'i phyir ro
column9: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2610-15-55,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-15-55"">dbu ma la mos na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">'phags pa yab sras</rs> [\[]kyis [;]kyi [\]]gzhung la nges par byed pas der lta bar bya'o
column3: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2610-02-13,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-02-13"">gnyis pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column3: rtags kyi mtshan gzhi lhan cig dmigs nges ni tshad mas grub
column4: don dam par rang bzhin tha dad yod med dngos 'gal du nges
column5: don dam par rang bzhin tha dad la
column6: snga phyi ba dang dus mnyam pa gnyis las
column7: snga phyi ba la
column8: lhan cig tsam khegs pa na lhan cig dmigs nges khegs la
column9: <lb n=""44b3""/>dus mnyam pa la ni
column10: lhan cig dmigs nges 'gog pa la 'brel pa med pa rtags su 'god la
column11: [ \[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig ni dngos su 'brel pa med pa'i phyir zhes 'god to
column13: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-31-25,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-31-25"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
gnyis pa ni
column2: dgag rtags gang yin <lb n=""5""/>6a8\]]pa thams cad ltar rung mi dmigs par sdud de
column3: dpe la ltar rung du grub pa gcig 'gog pa'i phyir
column4: dgag rtags thams cad dpe gcig gi steng du gtan la dbab tu rung ba'i phyir ro zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">sa skya pa </rs>gsung ngo
column6: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-28-14,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-28-14"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
[]des na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje pa</rs>
column2: log [\[]rtogs [;]rtog [\]]gnyis kyi gnyen por rtags rnam pa gnyis gsungs so
column4: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-28-39,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-28-39"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje sa skya pa</rs>'i gsung las
column2: chos can brjod pa'i sgra ni bye brag go bar byed pa'i brda yin la
column3: chos brjod kyi sgra ni spyi go bar byed pa'i brda yin gsung ngo
column5: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX0062023-05-2610-16-57,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-16-57"">gnyis pa rang gi thal ba'i ngag la mtshungs pa spang ba la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs>  gzhan gyis khas blangs pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur na
column3: <rs type=""person"">phyogs kyi glang po yab sras</rs> kyis gzhan [\[]gyi [;]gyis [\]]khas blangs pa'i rtags kyis chos gzhan mi 'dod pa thal bar 'phen pa mi 'thad par 'gyur ro zhe na
column4: skyon med de
column5: de ni khyab bya'i chos gzhan gyi rtog pas kun nas brtags nas khas blangs <lb n=""93a4""/>pas khyab byed kyi chos mi 'dod pa thal bar sgrub pa ste 'phen pa yin te
column6: khyab bya ni khyab byed med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes ston pa
column7: dper na phyogs gcig la mtshon na
column8: bye brag pas ba glang gi spyi rdzas gcig yul dus rang bzhin tha dad kyi gsal ba ba lang du ma la dus cig char du 'brel bar don la yod ces dam bcas so
column10: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-215-29-09,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-215-29-09"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
[]thal sbyor la [\[]'thun [;]mthun [\]]pa nyid ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892""> chos rje paṇṭi ta</rs>
column3: ba lang gi spyi du mar thal
column4: zhes bkod nas ci'i phyir zhe <lb n=""93b6""/>na
column5: gang yul dus rang bzhin du ma la 'brel pa de du ma yin te
column6: dper na sor mo du ma la 'brel pa'i sen mo bzhin no
column8: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-29-45,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-29-45"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje ṇḍi ta</rs> ni
column2: dngos su 'gal ba brjod pa mi <lb n=""142a9""/>rtag pa rtag zhes brjod pa lta bu dang
column3: shugs la 'gal [\[-]ba [\]]brjod pa rtag pa byed pa po yin zhes brjod pa lta bu yin zhes gsung ngo
column5: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: exX062023-02-2315-43-12,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-43-12"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa shes rab 'bum</rs>  gyis sbyar ba las
column2: de nyid brjod bya'i don zab cing rgya che ba rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas de las khyad par du byar med kyang rjod byed kyi tshig brling zhing 'ga' zhig ngag don du mdzad de
column3: gzhung la ma sbyar ba dang phal cher rgya 'grel ltar sbyar ba mang bas las dang po ba rnams [\[]kyis [;]kyi [\]]blos <lb n=""153a2b""/>lang dka' bar gyur pa dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> de nyid kyang 'di la snon 'brid cung zad 'dra dang
column5: zhu dag cig dgos par 'dug ste
column6: zhes yang yang gsung ba rjes su dran pa dang
column7: gzhan yang sde snod 'dzin pa mang zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor 'jug pa bde zhing brjod bya'i don rnams ma tshang ba med par ston la
column8: [ \[]brjod [;]rjod [\]]byed kyi tshig zin pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde snod 'dzin <lb n=""153a3""/>pa ltar 'gyur ba 'di ni
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa yab sras</rs> kyi bka' drin la brten nas lung rigs man ngag gi gnad rnams phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing
column10: 'chad pa dang
column11: rtsod pa dang
column12: rtsom pa'i tshul la blo gros kyi snang ba yongs su rgyas pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5518"">bo dong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs sho re pa</rs>s
column13: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4369""> dpal ldan brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs><!--assumed to be the same as brag ram  mgon khang-->r <lb n=""153a4""/>nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig rdzogs sho
column15: </seg>",X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

column1: ex1022023-03-271212,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1022023-03-271212"" status=""reviewed"">
column3: <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4424"">rab tu gnas par byed pa don <choice><reg>gsal</reg><orig>{°}gsal</orig></choice></rs> bzhugs lags
column5: </seg>",1_001_02_D_Rinchen_rab gnas don gsal w.xml

column1: ex10221-02-20231350,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10221-02-20231350"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5624"">rab tu gnas <lb edRef=""inst:4423"" n=""2b3""/> pa'i rgyud</rs><note type=""editorial"" resp=""PH"">The identification as the Pratiṣṭhāvidhi is tentative.</note> dang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5625"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon kun dga' snying po </rs> las stsogs pas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos rnams <app><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">gcig</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">cig</rdg></app> na'ang <app><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">ma rdzogs</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">rdzogs</rdg></app> shing <app><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">gzhung</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">bzhung</rdg></app> mang du <app><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">mthor</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">'thor</rdg></app> ba'i phyir
column2: <lb edRef=""inst:4428"" n=""1b4""/>de dag cig tu lag tu blang pa ma <lb edRef=""inst:4423"" n=""2b4""/> 'ongs pa'i skye bo blo chung pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir
column3: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3784"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><app><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">shag kya'i dge bslong</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">sha°pa'i dge slong</rdg></app> rin chen bzang po</rs>s nye bar sbyar <app><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">ba'o</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">ba</rdg></app>
column5: rdzogs s+hyo

column1: </seg>",1_001_02_D_Rinchen_rab gnas don gsal w.xml
ex1022023-27-03-1236,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1022023-27-03-1236"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<lb edRef=""inst:4423"" n=""2b5""/><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4425"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge bar byed pa</rs>'i dpe' lags
column3: </seg> zhal gro
column5: dge'o

column1: ",1_001_02_D_Rinchen_rab gnas don gsal w.xml
ex10012024-07-31-15-03,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-03"">
yan lag gi rten la shes rab ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">jo bo 'buM</rs> <lb n=""2a2""/> pa ni <rs type=""school"">dbu ma sgyu ma lta bu</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""school"">rab du mi gnas pa</rs> gnyis kyi don shes pa ste

column1: dang po ni bden pa'i chos kyis stong ba yin la
column2: gnyis pa ni snang ba tsaM du yang mi gnas pa yin no
column4: </seg>",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

column1: ex10012024-07-31-15-04,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-04"">des na shes rab ni don ma shes pa
column2: don dam pa'i <rs type=""school"">rab du mi gnas pa</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""school"">sgyu ma lta bu</rs> ni 'o zhes 'chad pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">jo bo</rs>'i dgongs pa ma yin no
column5: <note type=""gloss"">……dbu ma nyid…..</note></seg>",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

column1: ex10012024-07-31-15-55,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-55""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">lo tsha ba</rs> ltar na khyod bshad par dam bcas nas bstan chos 'chad na
column2: bstan chos kyi brjod bya mngon par rtogs pa thaMd nyams su myong nas saM
column3: 'on te bla ma do pa'i bdang gag la brten nas 'chad
column4: </seg>

column1: ",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

ex10012024-07-31-15-29,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-29""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">khyung po</rs> na re seng ge bzang pos nges 'byed zag med chung ngur bshad pa'i rjes su <lb n=""130a5""/>'brangs nas
column2: de'i rigs thar pa'i ma 'thun yang zag med du yar sman nas 'chad do
column4: </seg> de ni mi rigs te
column5: spyir drod yan chad du dbang po'i ngo bo yin pa la 'di nas dbang po'i ngo bor ma gyur zhes zag med kyi khyab byed bkag pa dang
column6: yang brgyad stong ba las thos pa dang btsa pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa la 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur zhes bshad pas na hag med yin na bsko srung du rigs pa dang
column7: bstan pa la 'jug pa la spang las dang po pa yin pa dang
column8: mang pas dang po las pshegs chen pos phun ring pos rtogs pa'i sbyor ba snonM par bshad pa dang
column9: sbyor ba sgoM pa'i sngon du mtshan nyid shes pa 'gro la de'i yang sngon du 'di 'gro bar bshad pa gsuM gyis gnod pas so
column11: ",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

column1: ex10012024-07-31-15-14,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-14""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">'brom</rs> na re thar pa'i cha 'thun zag bcas yin pas de'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges 'byed kyang zag bcas su bshad pa yang seng ge bzang po'i 'dod pa ma yin te skyon 'og du ston no
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

ex10012024-07-31-15-24,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-24"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">mda'</rs> na re
column2: yang seng bsang la <lb n=""132a2""/>lugs gnyis pas
column3: dang po ltar na chos mchog man chad du mkhyen pa gsuM bsgoMs nas sa dang po nas dbu ba'i bar du rnaM kun sgoM yangs bcu pa la rtse mo sgo de'i smad la mthar gyis pa lasogs pa sgo pa yin no
column5: </seg>",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

column1: ex10012024-07-31-15-01,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-01"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">'broM</rs> na sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa gsuM gyi ye+es dang rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyi shes pa tha mi dad par bloMs nas snoM pa yin pas de'i bsaM pa dang sbyar nas nges 'byed la zag med chung rung bshad do
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

ex10012024-07-31-15-54,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-54"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">zangs kar</rs> na re pha rol du phyen pa drug dang
column2: rjes su dran pa drug ni so so ba <lb n=""153b7""/>dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ni bsdus pa'o zhes zer ro
column4: </seg>

column1: rha mkha' ni sbyor ba dang
column2: mthong pa dang
column3: sgoM la tso mo ni songso ba
column4: bar chad med pa'i the so ni bsdus pa'o zhes bchad do
column6: dgags po ni mngon par rtogs pa ni sog so ba
column7: snying po'i don ni bsdus pa'o zhes gsung te
column8: de rnas ya 'brel lo
column10: 'dir 'thul ni so so ba ni mkhyen pa gsuM yin la
column11: bsdus pa ni rnaM kun mon rogs la bya'o
column13: des na rtso ma yang bsdus par 'ong ste de ni mkhyar pa gasM myung la khyad pa med pas so
column15: de skad du yang zlos pa'i skyon spong nas
column16: mkhyen pa gsuM ni rnaM pa so sor nges pa'i yul can yin la
column17: rnaM kun mngon rzogs ni rnaM pa ma lus pa'i yul can yin no zhes bshad pa dang
column18: yang rna thun mngon rdzogs kyi dang por gzhi dang la dang rnaM pa ma lus pa'i yul can yin no zhes gsung ngo
column20: go rims bslags pa ni de ltar bshad pa'i don to
column22: kyes ces pa ni byed tshig yin pas
column23: de ltar yul bcu gsuM yod pas
column24: de ma sbyor ba la slob pa ni mthar gyis pa'i bya bar mdo las bzhed la des mthong la dang sgoM laM na de dag la stob pa ni bslab pa dang
column25: bsgrub par bzhed ces pa yang mtshon pa yin no
column27: de la sbyen pa'i mthar gyis pa ni
column28: bdag nyid sbyir pa la gnas shing gzhan de la 'god pa dang
column29: gzhan sbyin pa gtong ma de dag gi bsngags pa brjod ming mthun pas dga' bar spyod do
column31: sbyin pa des longs spyod kyi phung po thob nas
column32: ser snang med pa'i seMs kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa la de dang de gto zhing sbyen pa de nyid kyis phung po lnga thob par ",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

column1: ex10012024-01-2916-35-26,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-01-2916-35-26"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (161a4–161a5)]""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">shes rab gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan chos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> ces <lb n=""161a5""/> bya ba'i 'grel pa</rs>'i tshig dang don gsal bar bshad pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">shag kya'i dge slong shes rab brtson 'grus</rs> kyis <rs type=""person"" ana="""">dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams</rs> kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar ba'o
column7: dge bar gyur cig
column13: </seg>",1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml

column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">ti pang ka ra</rs>s bshad pa dang

ex31012024-07-1212-49-44,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31012024-07-1212-49-44"" status=""unreviewed"">     <note type=""gloss"">gzhan yang ye shes med na rgyu log pas med daM gnyen po spangs nas med gnyi ga yang mi ’thad ye shes kyi (r)gyu ’khrul pa ma yin pa’i phyir dang
column2: gnyen po mi srid pa’i phyir ro
column3: (zh)es phyis gsung ngo
column5: </note>yang na dpyad bzod la gnod pas na ’khrul pas na tha snyad byas so zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon gzhan dag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">gangs pa</rs></note> ’chad do
column7: </seg>",2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml

column1: ex3101_2024-05-16_2,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3101_2024-05-16_2"" status=""reviewed""> de ltar rnam bsams 'bad pas gzhung 'di sbyar
des ni 'jig rten log lta'i rgyun phyogs rnams
yang dag lta ldan dge bcu legs spyad nas
bla med <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya dmar ba</rs></note> byang chub grags pa thob par shog
column3: </seg>

column1: ex44042023-01-2321-29-46,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44042023-01-2321-29-46"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4017""><abbr>byang chub sems dpa'</abbr> dz+nyA na shri</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4767"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><abbr>rigs</abbr> pa'i snying po de kho na nyid bsdus pa gsal byed nyi ma'i 'od</rs> ces bya ba <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr>

ex44042023-01-2321-30-55,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44042023-01-2321-30-55"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4767"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><choice><sic>rig</sic><corr>rigs</corr> </choice> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>snying po</abbr> de kho na nyid bsdus pa <abbr>gsal byed</abbr> nyi ma'i 'od</rs> ces bya ba ¦ </seg>",2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml

column2: <abbr><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3772"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rnam 'grel</rs> lung</abbr> brgya ldan pa <lb n=""1b3""/> gang de'i don ¦ <abbr>nyung ngu'i</abbr> <abbr>tshig gis gsal</abbr> bar ston mdzad <abbr>pa'i</abbr>
column3: <abbr> gsal byed</abbr> 'od stong ldan <choice><sic>'di</sic><corr>'dir</corr></choice> <abbr>rnam par</abbr> dbye
column4: </seg>",2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml

column1: ex44042023-01-2321-37-44,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44042023-01-2321-37-44"" status=""reviewed"">

<abbr>gzung yul</abbr> <abbr>yin</abbr> <abbr>snang yul</abbr> <abbr>ma yin</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> mu <abbr>dbang po'i</abbr> <abbr>mngon sum gyi</abbr> <abbr>bzung don</abbr> <abbr>lta bu</abbr> zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> <abbr>'dod do</abbr>¦
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><abbr>kha cig</abbr></rs> <abbr>mi srid par</abbr> <abbr>bzhed de</abbr> ¦</seg>
",2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml

mi 'thad de

column1: ex44042023-02-2308-02-07,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44042023-02-2308-02-07"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

de'ang <abbr>rgyu tshogs</abbr> pa las <abbr>bras bu</abbr> 'byung <abbr>rung gi</abbr> rtags <abbr>yin par</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5554"">lha</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5549"">shAg</rs> 'chad pas dgag <abbr>rtags</abbr> pa ba <abbr>yin par</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhas pa kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> gsungs mod ¦</seg>
",2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml
ex44042023-02-2308-08-03,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44042023-02-2308-08-03"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

dang po grub mtha' dang sbyar ba ni ¦<quote source=""db:5564""><!--this is not a literal citation--><rs type=""school"">bye brag tu smra ba</rs> ni ¦ <abbr>gzugs sogs</abbr> thug phrad du snang pa'i don dngos <abbr>bzhugs</abbr>¦ phyi don mthong pa tshad ma ¦ phyi don <abbr>rtogs</abbr> pa <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> smra bas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras <lb n=""15b3""/> rdzas tha dad dus <abbr>mnyam par</abbr> 'dod ¦

<rs type=""school"">mdo sde pa</rs>s ¦ don lkog na mo <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ don dang 'dra bar skyes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> shes pa tshad ma ¦ don <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>btags</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> smra bas <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras rdzas tha dad dus <choice><sic>mnyaM par</sic><corr>tha dad par</corr> </choice> 'dod do

<rs type=""school"">rnaM bden pa</rs>s ¦ bzung ba'i rnaM pa <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ 'dzin pa'i rnaM pa tshad ma ¦ rang rig <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> <lb n=""15b4""/> 'dod pas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras bde sdug myong ba ltar dus dang <abbr>ngo bo</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> du 'dod do

<rs type=""school"">rnaM brdzun pa</rs>s bzung <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rnaM pa sgro <abbr>btags</abbr> <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ 'dzin pa'i rnaM pa tshad ma ¦ rang rig <abbr>btags</abbr> pa ba <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> 'dod pas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad <abbr>'bras skra </abbr>shad snang pa ltar <abbr>gcig</abbr> pa bkag <abbr>pa'i</abbr> tha dad du <abbr>'dod do</abbr></quote> ces <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> <abbr>las gsungs so</abbr> ¦</seg>",2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml
ex44042023-02-0311-17-56,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44042023-02-0311-17-56"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4767"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">

<rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3770"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma mdo</rs> <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:5553"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">sde bdun</rs> 'grel pa <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">'grel bshad</rs> bcas <pb n=""16a""/><lb n=""16a1""/>pa'i snying po rigs pa'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa gsal byed nyi ma'i 'od </rs> ces bya ba ni ¦

don du gnyer ba'i slob ma 'gas bskul ba'i ngor ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4017"">shAkya'i dge slong dz+nya Na shri</rs>s ¦ drag po'i lo sa ga zla ba'i dkar phyogs la ¦ <rs type=""place"" ref=""db:6173"">dpal ldan gsang phu'i chos gra</rs>r sbyar ba mchog tu dge <abbr>legs</abbr> su gyur <abbr>cig</abbr>
column3: </seg>",2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml

ex44052023-01-3114-45-40,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-45-40"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><abbr>thun mong</abbr> dang de <abbr>min par</abbr> snang yang <abbr>gcig</abbr> du zhen pas <abbr>gcig</abbr> yin zhe na ¦

<abbr>thun mong</abbr> min bar snang <abbr>ba'i</abbr> se gol gyi sgra <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang 'dzin rtog <abbr>pa'i</abbr> snang yul dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦<lb n=""2b7""/> <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ don daM par don byed nus <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ tshad ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> gang rung min <abbr>ba'i</abbr> rtog tshad kyi <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr> </rs>dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA ba</rs>'o ¦</seg>
",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml
ex44052023-02-0310-54-47,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-02-0310-54-47"" status=""reviewed""><!--unclear whether ""sgros"" is Indian or Tibetan -->

lkog gyur <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang 'dzin <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> gyis bzung don du byas nas <abbr>rtogs</abbr> par mi 'thad <choice><orig>{°}par</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> thal ¦ rang 'dzin <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> la rang 'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> nus pas stong ba <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> dang <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog</rs> go</abbr>
column2: </seg>",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml

column1: ex44052023-01-3114-46-20,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-46-20"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

tshad ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> gang rung min <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <lb n=""2b8""/> rtog tshad kyis rtogs par mi 'thad  <choice><orig>{°}par</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> thal ¦ rang 'dzin gyi blo la rang 'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> nus pas stong <abbr>pa'i</abbr> spyi mtshan <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tsA ba</rs>'o
</seg>
",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml
ex44052023-01-3114-27-10,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-27-10"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

rang gzung don gyi dngos 'bras min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <lb n=""4b2""/>de'i nus pa nye ba la mi ltos <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""4018""><!--chu mig pa-->chu <abbr>mig</abbr></rs><abbr> go</abbr> ¦</seg>
",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml
ex44052023-02-0110-17-09,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-02-0110-17-09"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><!--TODO unclear whether sgros is Indian or Tibetan-->

tshe snga phyi la <abbr>dmigs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> mngon <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ khyod tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>rtogs</abbr> byed <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ khyod <abbr>med</abbr> dgag <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ ma khyab na ¦<lb n=""4b4""/><abbr>med</abbr> dgag yin na tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>med</abbr> dgag yin tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>byed du</abbr> 'gal <abbr>ba'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog </rs> gi</abbr> don du mngon ces <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> so</abbr></seg>
",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml

ex44052023-01-3114-30-48,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-30-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas pa'i <abbr>gzugs</abbr> zhes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>bag chags</abbr> sad pa <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod par mi <abbr>rigs</abbr> te ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> bag <abbr>chags</abbr> sad pa des <choice><orig>khyod {°} byas</orig><reg>khyod byas</reg></choice> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr> na ¦ brda la byang <lb n=""6a6""/> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> skyes bu <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> zhes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming las <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi don mi 'dzin <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa de <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> bag chags sad pa des ma byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba las byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba de <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod par mi <abbr>rigs</abbr> te ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba des khyod byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr> na ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> <lb n=""6a7""/> mthong ba las byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba des khyod ma byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5566"">yongs 'dzin</rs> gsung ¦</seg>

column1: ",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml

ex44052023-03-17-8-49,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-17-8-49"" status=""reviewed""><abbr>gal te</abbr> <abbr>med</abbr> pa dang <choice><sic>khyad</sic><corr>khyod</corr></choice> yod kha dog <abbr>med</abbr> na khyod reg bya <abbr>med</abbr> de <abbr>med</abbr> na kha dog 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ kha dog 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> du gyur <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'dir rtog bskyed pas de'i gzung <abbr>don no</abbr> zhe na ¦

da lta'i buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang mngon gyi rgyud rgyur song <abbr>ba'i</abbr> yul dang blo °°° <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ da lta'i buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang mngon gyi gzung don du thal ¦ de brgyud nas bskyed <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <pb n=""7b""/><lb n=""7b1""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr></rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> so
column3: </seg>",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml

column1: ex44052023-01-3114-47-20,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-47-20"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">yang na nyin par buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong mtshan mo buM pa la reg tshe 'di buM dmar po'i snyaM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'di rtog <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang gi gzung don nye ba la <choice><orig>ltos ××pa</orig><reg>ltos pa</reg></choice> ma yin par thal ¦ rang <abbr>gi gzung</abbr> don nye ba <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr>  te ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de gzung don no zhe na ¦

buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi gzung don du <abbr>med par thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod la rang <lb n=""7b2""/>'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod byed min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi dngos kyi spyod yul min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦
dbang po'i <abbr>sogs</abbr> phyi ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog khyod kyi gzung don yin te ¦ des khyod rgyud nas bskyed pa'i phyir zhe na ¦
'das pa yang <abbr>sogs</abbr> sngar dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> ¦
column2: nyin par buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong mtshan mo buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> reg bya la reg tshe 'di buM pa dmar po'o snyaM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'di rtog <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦<lb n=""7b3""/>buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang po'i <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi gzung don du <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi <choice><orig>{°°°}dngos</orig><reg>dngos</reg></choice> kyi spyod yul min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5551"">dz+nya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr> </rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tswa ba</rs>'o
column3: </seg>

column1: ",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml

ex44052023-03-1315-16-58,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-1315-16-58"" status=""unreviewed""><!--meaning unclear; seems to be a reference to ""becoming a translator and a Buddha"" and not to a specific translator--><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3770"">kun btus </rs>su
column2: _mnyan bya'i sgra smos pa chos can
column3: _dgos pa yod de
column4: _sgra spyi rdzas gzhan gnyan bya min par dam bcas pa'i don la nyan shes dbang po'i mngon sum <lb n=""76b9""/>gyis mi gnod par bstan pa'i phyir
column5: _lo [\[]tsa [;]tsA [\]]ba dang bcom par thal lo
column7: </seg>",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml

column1: ex44052023-03-1416-24-46,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-1416-24-46"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5554"">lha</rs><abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog </rs> gi</abbr> dgongs pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">snga rabs pa</rs>s <choice><sic>blangs</sic><corr>khas blangs</corr></choice> pa dang <abbr>mi mthun</abbr> yang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><!--could be a ref to Dharmottara's commentary-->'grel pa</rs> nyid la zhib tu spyad<!--for dpyad--> pas <abbr>nges so</abbr>
column3: </seg>

ex44052023-03-1416-27-18,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-1416-27-18"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564""><abbr>rigs</abbr> gter</rs> du ¦
<quote source=""db:5564"" n=""Chap. X, Lhasa p. 295""><!--TODO correct reference--><lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve""><abbr>phan tshun</abbr> spangs pa <choice><sic>dngas</sic><corr>dngos</corr></choice>la ni
<l xml:space=""preserve""><abbr>rtags</abbr> dang <abbr>rtags</abbr> can grub pa <abbr>med</abbr>
</lg></quote>
ces te ngag las so
column3: </seg>

ex44052023-03-1410-33-58,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-1410-33-58"" status=""reviewed"">'di ni mtshon pa ste ¦ khyab par byed pa dang 'gal bas khyab <abbr>pa'i</abbr> sbyor ba yang <abbr>yod de</abbr> ¦ 'di na ba mo'i reg <lb n=""89b2""/>pa yang <abbr>med</abbr> de ¦ lcags gong 'bar ba mthong <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> <abbr>ces so</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr></rs> ji <abbr>bzhin</abbr> te ¦ <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4017"">kho bo</rs>s</abbr> <abbr>rtogs so</abbr>
column3: </seg>",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml

column1: ex44052023-01-3114-38-58,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-38-58"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4768""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774""> tshad <abbr>rnam par</abbr> nges pa</rs>'i <choice><orig>TIk+k(k)a×blo</orig><reg>TIk+ka blo</reg></choice> gsal gyi mgul </rs>zhes bya ba snyig dus gyi 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal du gyur pa ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4017"">dza na shri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ref=""db:4432"">gsang phu ne'u thog</rs> du sbyar ba dge<choice><sic>lags</sic><corr>legs</corr></choice> 'phel ¦</seg> ma g+ha la b+ha ",2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml

ex11152024-09-0412-06-12,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex11152024-09-0412-06-12"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4544"">rten cing 'brel par 'byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> rab tu byed pa
column2: 'khor 'das kyi chos <abbr>thams cad</abbr> blta' ba'i me long</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column3: lung rigs <lb n=""26a8""/> kyi gzhung 'grel mang du thos shing legs par sbyangs pas tshul <abbr>bzhin</abbr> du rtogs shing
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3854"">rigs par smra ba'i btsun pa blo gros seng ghe</rs>s
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6812"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsod</rs><pb n=""16b""/><lb n=""26b1""/> nams 'bum gyi don du
column6: nye bar sbyar pas 'di re shig yongs su rdzogs s+ho
column8: <note type=""gloss""><abbr>zhus so</abbr></note></seg> ",1_011_15_sPar phu_rten brel me long.xml

column1: ex3042023-11-241,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3042023-11-241"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4462"">'phags pa yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa <lb n=""[118b3]""/> rnam par bshad pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi brjed byang tsam du brjod pa rdzogs so

column1: ex9042024-09-1712-48-21,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex9042024-09-1712-48-21"" status=""unreviewed"">

bsgyur ba ni shan sbyar ba las ‹'›thob ste
column2: <foreign xml:lang=""sa-Latn-x-wylie"">a rya</foreign> na 'phags pa'o
column4: <foreign xml:lang=""sa-Latn-x-wylie"">(s)a rba</foreign> na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> do
column6: <foreign xml:lang=""sa-Latn-x-wylie"">shra ma Ne ra</foreign> na dge tshul <lb n=""2a5""/> lo
column8: <foreign xml:lang=""sa-Latn-x-wylie"">ka ri ka</foreign> na tshig le'ur byas pa'o

ex56252023-09-251,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex56252023-09-251"" status=""unreviewed""><pb n=""4b""/><lb n=""4b1""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db5024"">tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">dpal na ro pa chen po</rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa'i <abbr>rjes su</abbr> 'brang nas mang du thos pa <lb n=""4b2""/>°°°°°° <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5680"">gtsang me tog mdang can gyi dgon pa</rs>r sbyar ba 'di rdzogs s+ho
