column2: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex5022023-07-1011-29-41,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1011-29-41""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s chos bzhi dang ldan pa la brten dgos par gsungs te
column3: mkhas pas lta ba khyad du mi gsod pa
column4: <lb n=""3b7""/> btsun pas tshul khrims khyad du mi gsod pa
column6: tshe 'di don du mi gnyer ba
column7: byang chub don gnyer ba'o
column9: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex502_2024-08-3013-38-05,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502_2024-08-3013-38-05"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">rje btsun sgam po pa</rs>'i <lb n=""3b8""/> zhal nas
column3: chos gsum dang ldan par gsungs te
column5: <quote>shes rab chen pos gzhan gyis lam sna 'khrid pa
column6: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa
column8: tshe 'di la ltos pa ma mchis pa'o
column10: </quote><!--Source=sGam po pa gsung 'bum'-->

column1: </seg>
",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex502_2024-08-3013-39-04,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502_2024-08-3013-39-04"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">bla ma rin po che</rs> yis
column3: <quote>gsol ba 'debs pa'i bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni <pb n=""4a""/><lb n=""4a1""/>gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid
column5: skad cig nyid la 'char ba gang
column7: bla ma rin chen lta bu'i sku
column9: rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud
column11: </quote><!--Source=dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus--></seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex502-19072023-05-24,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-24"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: <quote><abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> <pb n=""5a""/><lb n=""5a1""/> dngos bzhugs tsam na bla ma dkon mchog bzhi pa yin
column3: sangs rgyas 'das nas 'khor dag yod tsam na bla ma de sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa yin
column4: da lta sangs rgyas las lhag pa yin gsung ste
column5: de la rgyu mtshan gsum sangs rgyas thams cad <lb n=""5a2""/>kyi 'phrin las bsdus pa yin pas na bla ma de sangs rgyas las lhag
column6: snyigs ma lnga'i dus su skyob pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag
column7: byang chub kyi lam dngos su ston pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag go
column8: de ltar yin pa yang
column9: tshogs chen po yis <lb n=""5a3""/>lung ston dpal la phyag 'tshal lo
column11: sems can nyam thag gnas nas 'don la
column13: dngos su ston cing dri ma bral la bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo
column15: </quote> zhes <abbr>gsungs so</abbr>
column17: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex502-2023-05-342,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-2023-05-342"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4182"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge bshes stod lung pa</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: nga la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed cig byas na
column3: khyed kyis rgas su khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed na dang khyod dga' ste
column5: bskyed la bzhag gi sems pa srid de ma skyed na yang ma skyes <lb n=""5a6""/>su la gnod lta ba yin gsung skad de de mad pa yin gsung
column7: de bas na bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes gsha' ma gcig skyes na gnas skabs dang mthar <abbr>thug gis</abbr> yon tan gong ma kun 'byung ba'o
column9: de la sgrub pa'i bsnyen bkur ni
column10: nyon mongs pa <lb n=""5a7""/> dang nyes spyod spongs pa dang
column11: dge ba la brtson pa gnyis yin te
column13: de ltar ma byas na bla ma'i bka' bcag pa yin gsung ngo
column15: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex502-19072023-05-39,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-39"" status=""reviewed"">de ltar yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">mgon po byams pa</rs>'i zhal nas
<quote><lg>
<l>bkur sti rnyed pa dag dang rim gro dang
<l> sgrub pa'i sgo nas bshes gnyen bsten par bya
</lg></quote>
<lb n=""5a8""/>zhes gsungs so
column3: </seg>

column1: de ltar bla ma la gus pa'i phan yon la gnyis te
column2: _grangs su chad pa dang
column3: _ma chad pa'o

column1: grangs su chad pa la bdun
column2: _bla ma la bsten cing gus na 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba gzhan gyi skur ba 'debs pa mi 'byung ba dang*
column3: _sngar byas pa'i sdig pa ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

column1: ex5022024-08-3013-21-41,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022024-08-3013-21-41"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">dpal nA ro pa</rs>s <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5641"">tI lo pa</rs>'i phyag phyir lo bcu gnyis 'brangs nas
column2: dka' ba bcu gnyis <lb n=""5b3""/>spyad pas dngos grub thob pa bzhin du
column4: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub rnams ma bsgrubs kyang thob bo
column6: <abbr>grangs su</abbr> ma chad pa ni
column7: <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi <abbr>yon tan</abbr> mtha' med pa bla ma la brten te 'byung bas bgreng bar mi lang ba'o
column9: </seg>",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

column1: ex5022024-08-3008,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022024-08-3008"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">nA ro pa</rs>s <quote>ri rab gser gyi ngos <lb n=""6a3""/>la bya gnas pa
column3: rang gi rang bzhin dor nas gser du snang zhes so
column5: </quote></seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex502-11252023-05-22,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-11252023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">rje sgam po pa</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column2: <quote> 'chi ba sgom pa ni dang por gal che ste
column3: chos la 'jug pa'i <lb n=""9b6""/>  rgyu yin
column5: bar du gal che ste brtson 'grus kyi lcag yin
column6: tha mar gal che ste chos kyi sku gsal 'debs yin

column1: </quote> ces <abbr>gsungs so</abbr>
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex5022023-07-1912-16-00,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-16-00"" status=""reviewed"">khyad par la 'dod lugs mang yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i <lb n=""23a6""/>bzhed kyis smon pa ni 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba yin la 'jug pa ni rgyu la dam 'cha' ba'o
column3: de'i go ba ni / smon pa 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba ni
column4: 'bras bu gzhan don du <lb n=""23a7""/>byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rgyu bya chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la bslab par bya'o zhes dam 'cha' ba'o
column5: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex5022023-07-1912-20-07,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-20-07"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">kho bo</rs>s ni gzhung bltas na 'di ltar go ste
column2: gzhan don du byang chub thob <lb n=""23a8""/> par 'dod pa ni smon pa yin la
column3: gzhan don du byang chub thob par 'dod pa 'i don du bslab pa la slom par 'dod pa 'jug pa yin
column4: de yang bslab pa la slob par 'dod pa rkyang pa ni ma yin te
column5: byang chub ni ched du bya ba'i dmigs pa yin la
column6: bslab pa ni dngos kyi dmigs pa yin pas
column7: <pb n=""23b""/><lb n=""23b1""/> gnyis ka thob pa dang slob par 'dod pa'o
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3743"">slob dpon zhi ba lha</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i bzhed pa yang de ltar yin par go
column11: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex5022023-07-1912-29-59,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-29-59"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""> rten gyi gang zag <lb n=""24b7""/> ni chos drug dang ldan te
column2: theg pa chen po'i chos la dad cing mos pa dang
column3: thob shing shes pa dang
column4: rigs dang ldan pa dang
column5: bla ma la gus pa dang
column6: smon pa brten pa dang
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i lugs kyi so so thar pa rigs bdun gang rung gcig dang ldan pa'o

column1: </seg>",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex502-12422023-05-22,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-12422023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s de'i steng du snying rje dang bsnan pas chos bzhi ldan 'dod de
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3744"">lam sgron</rs> las

column1: <quote>  <lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">sdom pa'i cho ga la mkhas dang
column2: bdag nyid gang zhig sdom la gnas
column3: sdom pa 'bogs bzod snying rjer ldan
column4: bla ma bzang por shes par bya

column1: </lg></quote>
zhes gsungs so
column3: </seg>",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

column1: ex5022023-07-1913-00-24,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-00-24"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re
column2: snum khur dang
column3: dbyugs pa'i rigs pas so so thar pa'i thun mong ba bzhi yang
column4: de bzhi don gyi go bar 'gyur te
column5: rnyed dang bkur sti la chags pas
column6: bdag la bstod cing <lb n=""29b7""/> gzhan la smod pa dang
column7: ser snas bdag gi nor gzhan la ma byin pa dang
column8: khros pas gzhan la tshogs pa dang
column9: rmongs pas chos ltar bcos par smra na yang ltung ba 'gyur na
column10: rim pa bzhin du chags pas mi tshangs par spyod pa dang
column11: gzhan gyi nor brkus <lb n=""29b8""/>pa dang
column12: gzhan gyi srog gcod pa dang
column13: brdzun du smra ba rnams lta smos su yang med do
column15: zhes gsungs pa de ni rigs so <choice><corr>gsungs so</corr><sic>gsungs ngo</sic></choice>
column17: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex5022023-07-1913-04-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-04-36"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> kun rdzob shes pa'i shes rab dang
column2: don dam shes pa'i shes rab bo
column4: tha mi dad pa shes pa'i shes rab la yang 'dod do
column6: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex502-2023-05-34,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-2023-05-34"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s ni
<quote>   <lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">lnga po thabs yin la
column2: shes rab dang gnyis su 'dod do
column4: de yang shes rab pha rol phyin spangs pa'i
column6: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin la sogs
column8: dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad dag
column10: rgyal ba rnams kyi thabs su bshad

column1: </lg></quote>
zhes gsungs so
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

ex5022023-07-1913-24-02,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-24-02"" status=""reviewed"">   <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
column2: sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims kyi dngos gzhi yin zhes zer ro
column4: </seg>

column1: nyams su ji ltar blang ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml
ex502-19072023-05-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-36"" status=""reviewed"">  de yang thabs shes rab zung du 'grel dgos pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s
column3: thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab dang
column4: shes rab dang <lb n=""35b4""/>bral thabs dag kyang
column5: gang phyir 'ching pa zhes gsungs pa
column6: de bas gnyis ka spang mi bya
column7: zhes pa ste
column8: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml
ex5022023-07-1912-45-04,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-45-04"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5644""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5640"">grub chen sa ra ha</rs>s mdzad pa'i do ha</rs> las
<quote><lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang
column3: des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin no
column5: 'on te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgoms na yang
column7: <lb n=""35b6""/>'khor ba 'di las thar pa thob mi 'gyur
column9: gang yang gnyis po sbyor bar nus pa des
column11: 'khor bar mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas

column1: </lg></quote>
zhes pa'o
column3: </seg>",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

column1: ex502-11552023-05-22,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-11552023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">thub pa'i bstan la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul</rs>
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma</rs>'i gsungs dang lung la bstan nas bris
column5: de las byung ba'i dge ba gang thob des
column7: 'gro rnams log pa'i lam du mi 'gro zhing
column9: yang dag laM zhugs sku <lb n=""40a4""/> gsum thob par shog
column11: </seg>",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

column1: ex502-1262023-05-22,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-1262023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">bdag</rs> kyang <rs type=""deity"">thub pa</rs>'i bstan pa rgyas byed cing
column3: yang dag lam zhugs sku gsum thob nas kyang
column5: lhun grub rgyun chad med pa'i 'phrin las kyis
column7: nam mkha' mnyam pa'i 'gro ba sgrol bar shog
column9: </seg>",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

column1: ex5004-12512023-05-23,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5004-12512023-05-23"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul</rs> <lb n=""40a5""/> lam <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">blo sbyong</rs> 'am <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">lam rim</rs> zhes bya ba ni<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> <choice><corr>kyis</corr><sic>kyi</sic></choice><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4332"">gsang phu</rs>r sbyar ba'o
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml

column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">lam rim</rs> 'am <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">bstan rim chen po</rs> bzhugs so
column5: </seg>",1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml

column1: ex4022024-09-1315-30-44,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-30-44"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"">bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che la 'jug pa'i rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par </rs>[118a2]<rs type=""work""> bshad pa</rs>
column3: byang phyogs kyi rgyud kha ba can gyi ljongs su byung ba
column5: bla ma rje btsun dam pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze 'bru spyi bos len pa<anchor xml:id=""a69""/>
column7: lung dang rigs pa'i gtsug lag dam pa rnams la yongs su sbyangs pa'i ngal ba mi dman zhing mi zhan la mi nyung byas pa
column9: <lb n=""118a3""/> rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can
column11: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> zhes bya ba thub pa'i brtul zhugs la legs par gnas pas rang gi dran pa goms pa spel ba'i brjed byang tsam du nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs
column13: </seg>",1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml

column1: ex4022024-09-1315-23-40,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-23-40"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol rin po che</rs> nas phran <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">klong rdol</rs> drung yig</rs> la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">rje gro lung pa</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">bstan rim chen po</rs> 'di'i par zhig byung na brko rogs gyis gsungs kyang
column3: phran rang nyid sngon bsags kyis sbyin 'bras phra bas gser dngul sogs kyi mthun rkyen [118a6] 'dzoms dka' bas tshe 'dir 'grub pa'i re ba dang bral zhing
column5: </seg>",1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml

column1: ex4022023-10-11102522,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex4022023-10-11102522"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">mi dag pa dang lhag chad phra mo byung ba rnams
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol bla ma</rs>'i nye gnas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132"">drung yig dam chos yar 'phel</rs> gyi rang gi blo gros kyi mig gi dog gnas gang shes thams cad gsar du bcos nas dag par bgyis pa dang
column4: </seg>",1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml

column1: ex4022024-09-1315-25-43,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-25-43"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol bla ma</rs>'i drung yig</rs> 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad nas ngal ba chen pos lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas
column3: bstan bcos 'di nyid la sogs pa'i rnam dkar dge ba'i phung po che chung ji snyed cig byas pa thams cad ma gyur nam [120b3] mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la
column5: byams pa dang snying rje'i rtsa ba can gyis byang chub kyi sems rin po che myur du rgyud la skye ba'i rgyur 'gro bar gyur cig
column7: dge ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi <abbr>dug gsum</abbr> 'phel ba'i rgyu dang [120b4] sdig pa bsags pa'i rgyu la mi 'gro bar shogs shig
column9: </seg>",1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml

column1: ex50062024-07-1216-01-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50062024-07-1216-01-36"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4848"">'da' ka <abbr>ye shes</abbr> kyi 'chi kha ma'i man ngag</rs> <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr>

column1: ex67022024-09-1610-30-07,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex67022024-09-1610-30-07"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">'di ni <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a5""/>bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyis sde snod du ma'i don thugs su chud cing yon tan du ma'i dpal 'byor gyis 'gro ba mang po'i 'dren pa chen por gyur mang po'i 'dren pa chen por gyur pa yongs kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge ba'i <lb edRef=""inst:5152"" n=""73a5""/>bshes gnyen mkhan po nam <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a6""/>mkha' ches</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhan po zhang chos rgyal rin chen</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhan po byams pa'i dpal</rs> lasogs pa slob ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang pos gsol ba btab pa'i ngor
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4068"">shAkya'i dge slong skad gnyis <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a7""/>smra ba blo gros dpal bzang po</rs>s gtso bo che par <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas <lb edRef=""inst:5152"" n=""73a6""/>blo gros</rs> gyi 'grel pa dang bstun gsal bar bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5802"">dge slong ston pa brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>'o
column6: </seg>

column1: ",4_105_02_I_R_M_bang chub lam gyi sgron ma las dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro.xml

ex105022023-10-06-102531,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex105022023-10-06-102531"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><pb n=""[29a2-29a5]""/>bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug pa'i sgo [29a3] thog ma ; gang dang ldan pas nang pa sangs rgyas par ‘jog pa’i khyad chos bla na med ; ci bsam pa’i don rnams myur du ‘grub par byed pa’i thabs kyi <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5409""> mchog dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas de'i bslabs bya la rnams la</rs> [29a4] <rs type=""work"">slob pa'i tshul</rs> phyin ci ma log par dam pa rnams kyi gsung la brten ste legs par bshad pa 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong song ba pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4113"">dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bang</rs> zhes bya bas : <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5722"">dpal byams chen</rs> gyi gnas su legs <lb n=""29a5""/> par sbyar ro
'dis bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya che po 'byung bar gyur cig
column4: dge'o
column6: </seg>",4_105_02_I_R_M_bang chub lam gyi sgron ma las dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro.xml

column2: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr><abbr>gnyis</abbr> med pa'i shes pa'i chos nyid ni dmigs pa <abbr>yin te</abbr> ¦ yul du bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> gis <abbr>rtogs so</abbr>

yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><abbr>kha cig</abbr></rs> na re
column2: 'dir ni mthong laM <abbr>skad cig</abbr> ma <abbr>bcu drug</abbr> du nye bar mtshon par byed pa'i <abbr>phan yon</abbr> <abbr>bcu drug</abbr> bstan pa <abbr>yin te</abbr> laM gyi <abbr>ngo bo</abbr> bstan pa ma <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column4: </seg>

column2: thugs kyi me long yongs <lb n=""[91a7]""/>su dag pa la byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po × snang zhing<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5908""> dben pa'i gnas</rs> la thugs gzhol ba mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3930"">slob dpon dbang phyug rin chen</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs nas
column3: mkhas pa'i skye bo chen po lung dang rigs pa la rtogs pa'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa <rs type=""person"" ana="""">chos kyi ye shes</rs> zhes bya <lb n=""[91a8]""/> ba dang <rs type=""person"" ana="""">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> zhes bya ba'i legs par bshad pa la sgro skur gnyis dang bral bar smra ba
column4: × <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3911"">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu rin chen</rs> gyis legs par sbyar ba

column2: legs bshed rin po che'i tshoms </rs>bzhugs lags so
column4: e ma ho
column6: <lb n=""1a2""/> theg pa chen po'i sa dang lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing × mgo bde bar bshed pa lags s+ho

column1: ex29042023-09-112,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex29042023-09-112""><lb n=""47b7""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4676""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> gyi lus mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan legs par bshad pa rin po che'i tshoms </rs>bsgrigs pa <lb n=""48a1""/> 'di ni
column2: lung gi sbyor ba mang po dang
column3: 'dod lugs sna tshogs dang
column4: dgag sgrub kyi rtsod lan mang po bris na sde snod la ma sbyangs pa'i gang zag gi ngo bar <lb n=""48a2""/> dka' bas
column5: theg pa chen po'i sa lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing rtogs sla ba
column6: tshig gis ma sgrib pa
column7: gsar bu thos pa chung bas bltas kyang blo la 'char bde ba cig <lb n=""48a3""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> dang sbyar nas gzhung gi go ba longs pa la'ang phan par 'gyur zhing
column8: 'jug pa bde bar bris shig zhes
column9: bsnyen bkur
column10: me tog bzang po dang bcas <lb n=""48a4""/> te
column11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'tsho ba'i rig byed la mkhas pa'i go 'phang thob pa
column12: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--who is kun dga' rgyal mtshan-->kun dga' rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis snga mo nas yang yang bskul ba las
column13: btang snyoms la re shig <lb n=""48a5""/> 'gyangs par gyur na'ang
column14: <hi rendition=""#Time"">shing pho rta'i lo</hi>  ljon shing dang  sa gzhi rnaMs lo 'dab dang
column15: <hi rendition=""#Time"">rtswa ljang gi myu gu skyed pa'i dus</hi> su  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5781"">bsod snyoms pa rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal <lb n=""48a6""/> bzang po</rs>s yi ger bkod pa 'dis kyang  thub pa'i bstan pa dang
column16: sems can la phan bde 'byung par gyur cig
column17: <rs type=""work"">mngon rtogs rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> <abbr>thaMs cad</abbr> la sbyar ba'i bshad pa byas na'ang <lb n=""48a7""/> ha cang rgyas pas go dka' ba'i char gyur dgos nas  lus rnam bzhag dang sbyar ba yin cing
column18: 'di tsam zhig legs par go na  <rs type=""work"">'grel pa TI ka</rs> dang bcas pa bltas pas <lb n=""48b1""/> shes par 'gyur ba lags so
column22: × maNG ga laM sid d+hi × shu b+haM
column28: </seg>",1_029_04 bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa.xml

column3: dus phyis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""5611"">jo bo 'bum pa <!--brTan skyong, Sthirapāla--></rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang zhing <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">mang du thos pa'i dge slong shes rab 'bar</rs> gyis mdo'i don legs par gtan la phab nas yang zhus te sbyar ba
column7: rdzogs s+ho

column1: ex2012023-07-1008-32-58,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex2012023-07-1008-32-58"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""22a3""/> yul <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5645""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5546"">chos skor bsaM yas</rs> kyi lung phran mchims phu'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du mang du thos pa'i <note type=""gloss"">khu lha sdings pa la</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5827"">dge slong ¦ bshes gnyen lha sdings pa</rs>'i gsung gi bdud rtsi <note type=""gloss"">(lhung pos)?</note> la ngoms ngoms su 'thungs pa <rs type=""deity"">bde bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byaMs pa <note type=""gloss"">rtsod pa myed pa rnaMs la</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5828"">blo gros kyi snang pa rab tu rgyas pa khyung po 'dul ba 'dzin pa</rs>'i spyan sngar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> mchod nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4451""><note type=""gloss"">lho brag rong pa</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4451""/>bla ma 'od</rs> kyis yig mkhan byas nas bris so
column3: </seg>

ex54012024-09-1216-56-432,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex54012024-09-1216-56-432"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4942""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i 'grel bshad rgyan gyi me tog </rs>ces bya ba shar phyogs dzA ga ta la'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">paN+Di ta chen po dA na shi la</rs>'i man ngag brgyud pa la brten te dben par gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'byed pa la brtson pa zab pa dang
column2: _rgya che ba gang yin pa de la mos pa thob pa shAkya'i bstan pa la mang du thos pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">btsun pa rigs pa'i ral gri</rs>s sbyar ba 'di legs par rdzogs so
column6: _!_</seg>",2_054_01_Ral gri_rNam nges tika_sakyalibrary-com.xml

column1: ex54012024-09-1216-56-43,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex54012024-09-1216-56-43"" status=""unreviewed""><!--Vol. 62 todo add folio number-->:
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5797"">shakya'i btsun pa dbang bkras</rs> kyis bris pa e ma to
column3: </seg>",2_054_01_Ral gri_rNam nges tika_sakyalibrary-com.xml

column1: ex1092023-02-1414-36-11,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1092023-02-1414-36-11"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3746"">theg pa chen po mdo sde rgyan</rs> gyi don <lb n=""1a2""/> mtha' dag <abbr>gsuM</abbr> du gnas te
column2: skabs <choice><orig>sgrub{°}</orig><reg>sgrub</reg></choice> pa dang
column3: spro ba bskyed pa dang
column4: chos brjod pa'o

column1: </seg>
",1_001_09_D_rNgog_mdo sde rgyan don bsdus.xml
ex1092023-02-1414-28-48,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1092023-02-1414-28-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""> phan mdzad kun gyi bgrod pa cig pa'i laM
column3: <rs type=""deity"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">ma phaM</rs> rgyal sras daM pa legs bzhag de
column5: blo chen <choice><sic>brtan</sic><corr>bstan</corr></choice> pa'ï sgron ma <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3758"">dbyig <choice><orig>‹g›nyen</orig><reg>gnyen</reg></choice></rs> gis
column7: blo <choice><orig>myi{°}g</orig><reg>myig</reg></choice> ldan pa rnaMs la gsal bar <choice><sic>mdzod</sic><corr>mdzad</corr></choice>
column9: </seg>",1_001_09_D_rNgog_mdo sde rgyan don bsdus.xml

column1: ex1092023-02-1414-20-02,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1092023-02-1414-20-02"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""> de las bsod <choice><sic>rnaMs</sic><corr>nams</corr></choice><choice><orig>(thob)</orig><reg>thob</reg></choice> des sa steng 'dir
column3: 'gro ba'i <lb n=""24b11""/> <choice><sic>bugs</sic><corr>dbugs</corr></choice> 'byin byaMs chen gshags pa na
column5: mnyes byas chos sgor mngon du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag</rs> bzhugs nas
column7: chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba'i mun sel shog
column11: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_09_D_rNgog_mdo sde rgyan don bsdus.xml
ex1092023-02-1414-17-43,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1092023-02-1414-17-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4437""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3746"">mdo sde rgyan</rs> gyi don bsdus</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_001_09_D_rNgog_mdo sde rgyan don bsdus.xml
ex6012024-09-1112-55-38,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-55-38"" status=""unreviewed"">
column2: 'dir 'grel pa 'khan <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shes rab blo gros</rs></note>na re
column3: spangs pa chos<lb n=""2b5""/>gsum dang ldan pa de gang zag brgyad las khyad par du byas pa ste
column4: so so'i skye bo dang
column5: bsam brtan dang po nas srid rtse'i bar kyi   phyi rol pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dang
column6: 'phags pa rgyun du zhugs pa dang
column7: lan cig phyir 'ong pa dang
column8: bya chub sems pa dang
column9: phyir mi 'ong pa dang
column10: dgra' bcom pa dang
column11: rang rgyal ba rnams las so
column12: </seg>      ",1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml

column1: ex602024-09-1112-54-04,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex602024-09-1112-54-04"" status=""unreviewed"">gsung par rigs pas
column2: <note type=""gloss"">gzhung 'og ma ma sbyar kyang logs su thob byed pas skyon .... tha dad de bsaM pa phun suM tshogs pa ni thar pa'i  .... gyi dge rtsa bsod naMs bya pa 'dod pa'i  blo yin la ... dang 'bras bu dkon mchog dang bden pa la ...  pa yin no zhes slob dpon .....</note> gzhung 'og ma nas ni phan yon ston par
column3: 'grel par 'chad pa ltar nyid legs par sems ste
column4: mod sde <note type=""gloss"">du ma</note> nas kyang dal 'byor snyid dka' ba ni chos mang po la 'chad pa'i phyir ro
column5: </seg>

column1: ",1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml
ex6012024-09-1112-56-03,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-56-03"" status=""unreviewed"">skyabs su 'gro' ba ni ngag gis 'khor lo yin no
column3: zhes mdo 'ga' nas 'byung la kha cig na re dper na rkyel ma zhu <lb n=""16b3""/>bar 'dod pa'i mi la ga gi brda' ma phrad na zhu' bar 'dod pa'i bsam pa' tsam gyis zhus pa'i go mi chod pa bzhin du
column4: brjod pas khyab po zhes <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'bre'</rs></note>zer ro
column5: </seg>",1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml

column1: ex6012024-09-1112-56-20,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-56-20"" status=""unreviewed"">
column2: de ltar mchod pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas sdig pa bshags pa ni
column3: 'phags pa chos bzhi'i pa'i mdo las 'byung pa bzhin stobs rnam pa bzhi' ste <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rngag lo zhes nas rdud gcig...</rs></note> sun 'byin pa dang
column4: sten dang <lb n=""16b4""/>gnyen pa dang
column5: sor chud pa'i stobs so
column6: </seg>",1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml

column1: ex6012024-09-1112-56-41,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-56-41"" status=""unreviewed"">
column2: <note type=""gloss"">zangs kar</note> kha cig na re rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i ltung pa tshan tshan du bsdebs te
column3: dpe chung du byas nas rtogs par sla'o
column5: zhes zer ba ni mi 'thad de
column6: </seg>",1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml

column1: ex6012024-09-1112-57-05,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-57-05"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""20a3""/>sbyor ba dang dngos bzhi sa 'tshams
<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsa</rs>s</note>mdzad pa ltar legs par sems so
column2: </seg>",1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml

column1: ex6012024-09-1112-54-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-54-36"" status=""unreviewed"">
<note type=""gloss"">bzhi pa gzhan lugs dgag pa ni</note>
column2: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">zhang tshes</rs> </note> so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i ngo bo bzhan la gnod ba bzha'i dang bcas pa las ldog pa <lb n=""23b6""/>tsam snyen gnas yan chang rten du yang dgos shing
column3: theg pa gang dang yang mi 'gal ba de ni thun mong pa spyi yin la
column4: so so 'i khyad par ni rgyun chags pa dang
column5: gzhan rjes su bsrung pa dang
column6: slar gso' bar rung pa dang
column7: de dag las ldog pa'i sgo nas tha dad pa'i phyir ro

column1: </seg>
",1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml

ex81012023-09-131,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex81012023-09-131"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5268"">chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rgyan</rs> ces bya ba × × × ×  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhan po</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma</rs>'i gsung gi lhag ma dang ; **** <lb n=""208a6""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">blo gsal 'ga</rs>s bskul pa dang ; rang gzhan gyi don du <hi rendition=""#Time"">shing pho rta'i lo</hi> la ; <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5865"">btsun pa 'khon ston</rs> gyis; <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5695"">dpal e'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs s+hyo
column3: </seg>

column1: ",3_081_01 mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rgyan ces bya.xml

ex81012023-09-13-143,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex81012023-09-13-143"" status=""unreviewed""> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5695"">dpal e'i chos gra chen po</rs>r blo dman <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""5269"">dbul po byang chub mgon</rs> gyis bris
column3: bris pa'i dge bas <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> thob par shog
column5: dge'o
column7: </seg>

column1: ",3_081_01 mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rgyan ces bya.xml

ex19082023-03-0908-24-527,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-24-527"" status=""unreviewed"">bsdus don gyis <lb n=""3a4""/><abbr>'bras bu</abbr> bshad yin ¦ nas ni ces pa mtshams sbyor gyi tshig ste bya ba gzhan 'dren par byed pa yin la / de yang phyag gi yul klu sgrub de yis mdzad pa'i dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa bya ces sbyor ro
column3: ci 'dra cig byed ce na ¦ khyad par bzhi ldan ste ¦ tshig mtshams 'byor zhing don gsal bas slu ba dang ¦ sdeb sbyor gyi gtsug lag dang mthun zhing khyad par<lb n=""3a5""/> gyi gzhi ngag don khags pa dang ¦ dbu ma'i don ¦ chos rnaMs la bden par rtog pa'i rlung gis ma dkrugs pa dang / tshig gi <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> gnyer ba dang don gyi mtshams sbyor lasogs bshad dgos pa mi 'chad pa ma yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ gzhung mthong pa tsam gyis don go bas bshad mi dgos pa mi 'chad pa dang ¦ rtsa ba mkhan po'i dgongs pa mi 'chad pa ma <lb n=""3a6""/> yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ de las gzhan skabs su ma bab pa 'chad pa ma yin te skabs su bab pa nyid 'chad pa dang / brjod bya'i gtso bo la mi sbyor ba ma yin skabs kyi brjod bya ngos bzung nas ston pas ¦ rab tu gsal ba cig bya'o ces pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> gi'o
column5: </seg>

column1: ",1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

ex19082023-03-0908-24-528,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-24-528"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> 'them sbyor sngar bzhin la khyad par gyi chos ni ¦ ci 'dra cig byed ce na gsal ba<lb n=""3a7""/>cig bya'o ces sbyar ste de yang tshig gsal ba slu zhing bsdeb legs ngag gis sbyar ba don gsal ba rtog ges rlang gis ma dkrugs pa'o ces pa ni legs bshad do
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

ex19082023-03-0908-48-24,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-48-24"" status=""unreviewed"">bstan bya bzhir grangs nges pa'i rgyu mtshan ni ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">'ga' zhig</rs> na re bstan bcos la mdzad pa po'i khyad par lasogs yon tan mang po yod pa'i phyir dgos 'brel bzhir grangs nges pa med do zhe na
column2: </seg>",1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

column1: ex19082023-03-0908-37-39,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-37-39"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar 'gyur ba des gong gi tu ga'i ga dang zhabs kyu mi mngon par ta rkyang par 'gyur la de 'og gi ya sta dang sbrel bas rgya ces par 'gyur te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> gi'o
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

ex19082023-03-0909-02-13,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0909-02-13"" status=""unreviewed"">gal te 'jig rten grags pa'i tshad ma de nyid dbu ma thal 'gyur ba khyod kyis kyang gtan la dbab dgos te / rang rgyud pa kho bo cag gis kyang tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad 'jig rten la grags pa 'di' <lb n=""25b3""/>bstan bcos su brjod pa yin no snyam na ¦</seg>
de ltar yin na ¦ de bstan bcos su brjod pa'i dgos pa bsnyad dgos so
column3: de'i dgos pa ni rgyang 'phan pa'i rtog ge ba dag gis tshad ma'i mtshan nyid phyin ci log bzung don la mi 'khrul ba la brjod pas
column5: de'i rjes su 'jug pa po'i gang zag gi phan bde blag par byas pas kho bo cag gis de rjes su gzung pa'i phyir tshad

column1: ",1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml
ex1908202302281313,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1908202302281313"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4610""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3724""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba</rs>'i bshad pa nges don rnaM par gzigs pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di la tshig gi <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> bshad pa dang ¦ gzhung ngag don du 'chad pa dang ¦ khyad par gyi <lb n=""32b4""/> gzhi bsdus te 'them sbyor du bshad pa dang ¦ ngag don gyis mtshams sbyar te gzhung rtags sbyor gyi khongs su bsdus te bshad pa dang
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">rtsa ba mdo</rs> dang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5826"">dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5530"">de 'chad byed kyi Ti ka</rs> rnams dgongs pa cig tu ston pas thub pa'i bstan pa'i yan lag tu 'brel par 'chad pas
column4: 'chad pa po gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa 'di ni thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor <lb n=""32b5""/> lo rim gsuM bskor nas lnga brgya phrag bdun pas lhag pa na
column5: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4326"">ma ga da rdo rje'i gdan pa</rs>s byang phyogs su dpag tshad brgya bsgrod pa'i gnas su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang phyogs su dar par 'gyur ro  zhes lung bstan pa ltar grub pa na lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid khong du chud nas smra ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">shag kya'i dge slong shes rab 'buM</rs> gyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5572"">brag raM gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar <lb n=""32b6""/> ba'o
column7: </seg>      ",1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-0309-22-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-0309-22-52"" status=""reviewed""><pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/> phyi <lb n=""1a2""/>la <lb n=""1a3""/>142<lb n=""1a4""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4476"">yuM bar ma nyi khri'i rnaM bshad</rs></seg>
",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

ex5032023-05-0309-24-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-0309-24-52"" status=""reviewed"">'jig rten na nyi ma ltar kun du gsal ba'i shes rab rmad du byung ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba chen po</rs>'i gsung sgros las
column2: dam pa'i bshes gnyen chos la mnga' ba rnams gyis lung dang rigs pa'i tshul ji ltar phye ba'i bshad sbyar mang po la brten nas
column3: de dag gi lam gyi ra ba las ma 'das par
column4: blo dman pa 'ga' tsam rjes su gzung bas 'gro ba drang ba'i sa <lb n=""1b6""/> bon gdab pa dang
column5: <rs type=""deity"">thub pa</rs>'i bstan pa rin po ce spel ba la gces spras gyi dad pas rang gi brjed byang tsam du rnam par bshad pa dgod par bya'o
column7: </seg>

column1: ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

ex5032023-05-2516-43-46,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-43-46"" status=""unreviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">bzang po</rs> nyid kyi</note> mchod brjod du <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon rtogs</rs> nyid kyi de bkod pa ni <quote source=""db:3706"" n=""D3786, 1b2"">nyan thos</quote> zhes bya ba lasogs pa ste
column2: <note type=""gloss"">rnam dpyad rigs pa las bshad thabs lnga gsungs pa las</note> ngag 'di'i dgos pa'i don brgyad <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">shang ka ra nan ta</rs>s <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5832""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5831"">gtan tshigs thigs pa</rs>'i tI ka</rs>nas bshad yod <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">nga</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5616"">kha che</rs> nas 'ongs pa'i skyes chos yin te gsung ba</note>dang
column3: spyi don<note type=""gloss"">nyan rang phyogs gcig tu byas pa'i</note> 'phags pa'i gang zag gsum gyi dgos pa sgrub cing de gsum nyid <note type=""gloss"">'khor dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid</note> skyed pa'i yon tan gnyis kyis bstod pa dang
column4: de la phyag bya ba ste
column5: gnyis dang
column6: <note type=""gloss"">gang zag gang gis gdams ngag gi 'bras bu gang bsgrub pa zhes bshad nas</note>de dag so so'i tshig rnam par <choice><reg>phye bas</reg><orig>°e bas</orig></choice> <lb n=""1b8""/> rgyal bar bshad pa ni gzhan du blta'o
column8: </seg>",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2516-1,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-1""><note type=""gloss"">gang zag gsum po de dag gang las byung zhe na yon tan gnyis bshad do
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa</rs>'i zhal nas go mi chen po gsung skad nas mkhyen pa gsum gi dbye ba la sogs pa <choice><reg>rnaMs</reg><orig>°s</orig></choice> 'dir 'chad phyis 'og du skabs su bab gsung nas lus phung 'chad zhes</note>nyan pa po skal ldan spyan drang ba ni <quote>rgyal sras gang dag</quote> nas te
column4: ‹rgyal sras gang dag khyad par gyi gzhi'o
column6: skye bo nas khyad par te gzhan don phyir yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'o
column8: dgra dang skal bas ma pham ma rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi gdung mtshan ldan gdung 'tshob pas sras brjod pa bzhin 'tshob pa'i sras las nyan thos kyi dbang gis skye ba'i skye ba po yin pas skye bo ma lus ma smid pa smin pa mi 'dun pa 'dun pa ma grol ba grol bar gsum las tha ma bzung ba bsgral phyir ro
column10: byang chub ni byang chub chen po'o
column11: ›  'gro ba mtha' dag drang ba'i ched du byang chub dam pa don du gnyer <note type=""gloss"">ba dor na sems bskyed</note> pa'i blo ldan rnams <note type=""gloss"">gang yin pa zhes bsnyegs o

column1: slob dpon la ma ltos par mthong lam du</note>dang
column2: rang nyid byang chub gyi sgo mngon par rtogs nas <note type=""gloss"">rang rgyal 'phags par 'gyur ba gang dag sangs rgyas pas dman nyan thos pas mchog pas de dag dang mnyam med</note>slar <note type=""gloss"">'o na gtan du ba'i zhe na mthar thug gtan du ba med pas</note>yang thun mong ma yin pa'i lam de nyid mthar 'phyin par (byed) pa 'am
column3: rang gi byang chub thob nas slar yang lam dam par 'jug par byed pa rang rgyal rnams <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas 'di gsungs la 'jug mod kyi dnogs la gsungs nas gang yin ces</note> dang
column4: <note type=""gloss"">thub pas gsungs pa'i rjes su 'jug gi rang gi shes rab kyi</note>mi slob pa dang slob pa'i lam <lb n=""1b9""/> kyis 'bras bu nyon mong pa dang phug sdug bsngal gnon cing 'dor bas 'gro gnyan thos rnams te
column5: lam gsum (la) gnas pa rigs can gsum po yum nyan pa lasogs pa'i skal ldan de dag <abbr>thams cad</abbr> (chos) gyi sbyin pa la rtse gcig pa'i spro bas 'du bar spyan drang ba'o
column7: </seg>",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2516-47-09,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-47-09"" status=""unreviewed"">'das ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas skad kyi byings shed yin nam paN+Di ta kun la rjes su ma byung gsung ste spyir bkas bcas la bya ba min yang 'di bsnyil lam bkas bcad las 'jig _rten _pa'i _legs _ldan _du brjod pa las khyad par du byed pa'o
column3: </seg>

column2: _de dmigs kyis spyir btang zhes pa'i tshul gyis bsal ba ni gang zag gcig nas te bsgo bya sgo byed rtag pa can ni med pas shes pa'i rgyun tsam bag chags rnams kyis gang bas ci rigs pa'i 'gro ba _<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs> ba'i zhal nas phu su rna gang ba
column3: _gang ga ti 'gro ba la len pa ste gang zhing 'gro ba lan zhes 'ong ba'o zhes len _pa'o
column5: gcig ni _grangs _snga mar _chud _pa _las _so

ex5032023-05-2517-18-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-18-52"">[- 20 -]   img. 51    las zad pas 'pho ba'i tshul ni sems can gang dag nas te ngan song nas bton nas mi dang lha brdzus skyes lus rdzogs pa thob cing 'dren pa dang 'phrad de dang bas 'dud cing mchod par sbyor ba'o
column3: dal ba'i yang gnod pa bsal ba ni de nas de'i tshe stong gsum nas de ngal sos pa'i bar ni rnam smin gyi sgrib pa bsal ba'o
column5: bcus dang nas ni las kyi sgrib pa bsal ba ste
column6: _las kyi mtha' ma dag pa gsum dang
column7: _'tshol ba ma dag pa spangs pa'o
column9: bde legs bsgrub pa ni sems can thams cad kyang nas te bsam pa dam pa dang sbyor ba dam pa dang bde ba dam pa gsum dang ldan pa'o
column11: bsngags pa grub pa ni de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i nas te
column12: _ched du brjod pa ni dgyes pas rang dbang med pa lta bur bskyed nas khegs pa'o zhes bstod pa'i tshig ste zhing 'di dman pa yin yang 'dren pa dag gi mthus 'di lta bu'i chos thob pa gzigs pas so
column14: chos de nyid gang zhe na dul ba la sogs pa ste rim pa bzhin du dbang po phal mgo'o med bsdams pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs skyes pa dran zhi ba dang gso gcer sogs med sbyong yan lag brgyad la sogs pa dang dge slong gi mi dge ba bcu spangs sdom pa la sogs pa dang byams pa pham 'dra la sogs pa sgom pa lnga'o
column16: rdzu _'phrul gyi cho 'phrul las _skus dbang sgyur dregs pa can gyi dregs pa gzhom pa'i ched du ba la zil gyis gnon pa ni de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nas te
column17: _shes bya la mnga' brnyes pas 'di 'chad spyod pas ston gdul bya nus sgra gcan la sogs pas _so
column19: nyi ma bsgribs _pa _med _pa _dang*_zla _ba _zhal _gnyis ni mdzes _pa'i dpe'o
column21: don _ni _stong _gsum _gyi _nas _te
column22: _'jig rten gyi khams zhes spyir bstan pa'o
column24: de bshad pa ri rab dang nas te lha'i gnas ni spyir ro
column26: dbang po ni brgya byin sum cu rtsa sum pa dang bcas pa'o
column32: tshangs _pa _so skye dang _gnas gtsang la ni 'phags pa'i gnas gzugs khams pa'o
column42: de bzhis zil gyis mnan pas rim pa bzhin mdzes pa la sogs pa bzhi'o dang sbyar
column43: _de'ang  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> gyis bshad pa gang zil gyis mnan na tshangs pa dang lha dang bdud dam mu stegs dang mi rnams zil gyis mnan _par _sbyar ro
column47: ri _rab la _sogs _pa gsum ni zil gyis gnon pa'i dpe'o
column49: 'di'ang bshad pa la gus pa bskyed pa'i ched du'o
column51: zhum zhum pa rnams kyi pa spong bas dang bar mdzad pa ni de nas yang nas te snga ma lta bu nyid kyi yul yin [- 21 -]

column1: img. 52 gyi bdag cag la skal ba med do zhes nas 'bad pa mi byed pas mi nyid kyis bsgrub nus par bstan pa'i phyir sku tha mal pa bstan pa'o
column3: de'ang lha la sogs pa dang gcugs pa bskyed pas so so'i mdun du re re ste sku lta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2517-19-32,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-19-32"">mngon rtogs kyi don nyid la <rs type=""work"">'grel pa</rs>r lus rnam bzhag 'chad pa na skabs dang 'brel ba'i dri ba ni shes rab kyi (D3787, 15b7) nas te
column2: mdo'i don spyir ji ltar blta bar bya ba dris pa'o
column4: 'di'i lan du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">rje btsun</rs> gyi lus rnam bzhag nyid 'god pa ni <quote xml:id=""d2e551"">bshad pa</quote> zhes 'brel ba brtsams nas <quote xml:id=""d2e554"">shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni </quote>zhes bya ba nas <quote xml:id=""d2e557"">yang dag brjod ces bya ba yin no</quote>'i bar ro
column6: (D3787, 16a1–16b2)</seg>",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2517-20-27,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-20-27"">spyi'i dbye ba ni de dag kyang nas te skyes bu zung bzhi ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rje btsun</rs> kyis bka' snga ma'i tha snyad la brten nas bstan pa 'di la 'jug pa'i rgyur nyan thos zhugs gnas bdun dang rang rgyal ba'i ming du btags par zad pas mtshan nyid ni gzhan kho na'o
column2: </seg>_khyad par gyi dbye ba ni des bsdus pa'ang nas te 'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa nas bse ru'i bar nyi shu'o
column4: brgyad pa nyid ni gang gi phyir nas so
column6: bye brag gnyis su dbye ba ni de la gang bcu drug po de rnams pa zhes nas te spyir brjod kyang skad cig bco lnga man chad la zhugs pa dang bcu drug pa la 'bras bur bzhag cing 'bras bu la ni dbang po'i dbye ba'ang ma bzhag par blta'o
column8: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ni gang zag gi tshig la yid rton pas lam la kun tu brtson pa'o
column10: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni shes rab kyis mtshan nyid nges par dpyad nas so
column12: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bshad pa ni shA ri'i bu de la nas te phyir mi ldog pa bkol ba ni mi las 'ongs pa la'ang sa brgyad pa thob pa'i phyir mi ldog pa sngon dbang po rtul po'ang phyis sbyangs pas 'phos nas thob pa srid _pa tsam la dgongs pa'o
column14: sa 'di nyid du ni de mi srid par blta'o
column16: dbang po rtul ba'i don nyid ni shes rab kyi nas so
column18: phyi ma'i gnas kyang gsungs pa ni shA ri'i bu gang nas so
column20: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba bshad pa ni shA ri'i bu de la nas te mchog dang 'bring gnyis po dbang po'i byed [- 56 -]   img. 87 bar pas thob pa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o
column22: de gnyis kyi 'bras bu gcig tu bzhag pa ni shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nas te  ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2516-45-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-36"">tshig bla dag ni a ti wa ta zhes bya ba lhag pa'i tshig ste sgrig ma la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA ba chen po</rs>'i zhal nas sgro ltar glo bur du btags pa'o
column3: </seg>

column1: bgyi ba ni gang la ming de 'jug pa'o
column3: ma mthong ba dang ma dmigs pa ni myong ba dang rtog pas sam de kho na dang mos pa yid la byed pas sam mngon sum dang 'thad pas te gnyis kar yang gnyis ka sbyar ro
column5: 'dis ni yul bden pa'i chos nyid gdams ngag gi gang zag yul rang bzhin de chos thams cad stong pa nyid bkod pas yul can mi dmigs pa'i ye shes bcu drug spyir bzhag par yang sangs rgyas ye shes la sogs pa shes zhes nyid gsung te ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2516-45-342,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-342"">de ltar na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i gcig la nas la la ni ngo bo nyid kyis
column2: _la la ni yul gyis
column3: _la la ni gang zag gis de gnyis 'phangs pa'i sgo nas te
column4: _dngos su brjod pa dang don gyis bstan pa dang rgyud nas rtogs pa'i don gsum dang gnyis dang re re ci rigs par bstan par blta'o
column6: </seg>

column1: sgom lam la gdams pa la bzhi las spyir ston pa na dpe ni rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi nas te lam dang spangs pa dag ngo bo tha dad rang dbang can ma yin pas phan tshun gzhan du bzhag par mi nus kyang mtshan nyid gzhan du grub pa'o
column3: don ni rab 'byor de ltar nas te de dper byas ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2517-21-32,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-21-32"">khyad par bzhi ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">rje btsun</rs> gyi rtsa ba'i sgras zin pa ste yul gyi dmigs gzhi dang chos rnam gnyis dang 'bras bu la nus pa rgyu dang nye bar yongs rton pa'i khyad par bzhi'o
column3: </seg>

column1: rang gi lam nyan thos kyi rnam 'gyur gong ma'i spang bya bzhir gyur pa dang ngang gis bsdus pa chung 'bring bcu gnyis po ni khyad par gyi gzhir brjod kyang don gyis khyad par nyan thos kyi lo ga 'bro bcu las med pas du bzung bas drug ste de gnyis kyang _gzhan med pas so
column3: gzhir brjod pa de gnyis la dri ba bkod nas rtsa ba la 'jug pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i nas te
column4: _gang la rnam rtog gang bzhag pa ni spyi'am so sor ro
column6: ngo bo nyid mdor 'chad pa ni de ltar gdams ngag dang nas te sgom pa'i 'du byas na 'gal bas 'tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag gi'o
column8: thos pa dang bsam pa ni gdams ngag gi don no
column10: rgyu ni thar pa'i cha mthun te phul du phyin pa ni dbang por ma gyur pa'i rab tu son pa'o
column12: bsgoms _pa _las _byung ba ni 'jig rten _pa'i _sgom _pa _smin _pas rtogs _pa'i _chos _su _gtogs pa'o
column14: nges par 'byed pa ni mthong lam mo
column16: de dngos su 'dren pas _cha mthun no
column18: drod kyi sgra don ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i nas te
column19: _gzung ba med pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i krang krong 'di mi bden par shes pa snang ba thob pa las gsal snang gi rtsom pa yin pas gtsub shing las drod phebs pa bzhin no
column21: rtse mo g.yo ba rnams kyi rtse mor 'gyur pa ste log ltas dge rtsa mi chod pa ni de 'phel ba dang ldan pa'o
column23: bzod pa ni brtan par son pa'o
column25: chos kyi mchog ni 'dzin pa med pa la zhugs pa'o
column27: rgyas bshad las dmigs pa la sogs pa bzhi ni so sor bshad pa dang spyi'i bsdu ba gnyis so
column29: dang po la ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2516-45-343,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-343"">  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786""> chos kyi </rs>[- 81 -]    bgos skal la spyod pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos la dbang sgyur bas so
column3: zang zing gi bgos skal la spyod pa ni sred pa spangs pas so
column5: </seg>

column1: chos la mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan pa ni chos nyid las gzhan gyis mi phrogs pas so
column3: mngon sum gyi lus dang ldan pa ni bsam gtan dang snyoms 'jug gam chos sku mngon du byas pa thob pa'o
column5: mchog ni chos de dang ldan pas so
column7: mchog tu gsungs pa ni de ltar bstod pa'o
column9: 'di nye bar bstan pa ni de dang mthun pa'i don legs par smras pas so
column11: dmigs rnam de dag dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi che bas spyi'i skabs bsdu ba ni tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar nas te
column12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyir brjod kyang skabs kyis drod chung ngu'o
column14: gzhan du yang de bzhin du skabs las sbyar ro
column16: phyir mi ldog pa ni de'i sa thob pa dang 'dra ba'o
column18: ma _bral ba ni thob pa las nyams pa spangs pa'o
column20: thams cad kyi rgyu'i khyad par 'di la mtshon pa na 'bras bu gsum char bsgrub pa dngos ni nyan thos kyi sa la nas te gzhung gi che ba bstan pa'i don gzhan brjod pas so
column22: yon tan gyi rten du gyur pas ye shes de dang de dag nyid sar brjod do
column24: mnyan pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to
column26: yang ni mnyan pa ni spyir thos pa'o
column28: gzung ba ni tshig blos zin pa'o
column30: bcang ba ni de ma brjed pa'o
column32: bklag pa ni dam bcas te glegs bam klog pa'o
column34: kun chub pa ni don ma lus pa sems pa dang sgom pa'o
column36: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni sgom pa lan mang du byed pa'o
column38: 'thad pas sgrub pa ni de ci nas te gnyis po'ang zhar ram yan lag tu bstan pas so
column39: _khyad par gzhan yang zhor la ston pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i nas so
column41: 'bring gi dmigs rnam mdor ston pa ni dmigs pa la gdams ngag gi rten la sogs pa ma grub pa rjes su brjod pas skabs 'god pa ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa nas te
column42: _ma 'tshal ba la sogs pa gsum ni lung dang rjes dpag dang mngon sum gyi tshad ma gsum gyis sam
column43: _spyir dang mos pa dang de kho na yid la byed pa gnyis kyis so
column45: de nyid gsal 'debs pa ni bdag gang lags pas nas te dngos po ni chos thams cad do
column47: 'gyod pa ni yul gnas pa tshad ma las 'thob pa na de ma grub bzhin du bzhag na mi _rigs pa byas pas yid la gcags pa'o
column49: de las brtsams te brjod pa'i bag chags las snang ba'i chos thams cad la rang rgyud pa'i dgag sgrub gnyis med pa dngos ni bdag gis chos thams cad nas te 'du ba dang 'god pa ni rgya skad la sgra dod a ya pya ya zhes bya ba skye 'jig gam 'phel 'grib bam sgro skur gyi rnam grangs can du yod de dgag sgrub gnyis so
column51: rnam pa ni de la rigs 'dra dang [- 82 -]      img. 113
column52: mi 'dra ba'i 'du 'god gyi khyad par bzhi med pa ste de lta lags mod kyi zhes dngos dang de ci'i zhes ngo bo med pas de sgrub pa gnyis so
column54: dang po ni gnas pa dang gnas bral zhes rgyun 'dra ba'i sgrub pa bkag pa gnas pa la sogs
column55: _de'i dgag pa bkag pa mi gnas pa ma lags
column56: _mi 'dra ba'i sgrub pa bkag pa gnas pa da pa gnas pa dang
column57: _bral ba ma lags de'i dgag pa bkag pa gnas pa dang
column58: _bral ba ma lags pa dang ma lags pa'o

'gyur rnying pa la gnas pa ma mchis
column2: _thug pa ma mchis
column3: _byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
column4: _gsum gsum las med pa la  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i zhal nas de ci ltar 'khrul lam 'di dag dang _mi 'dra ba'i dgag sgrub bzhi dang bral bas mtshon pa ste

column7: 'thad pas gnas pa'i don bsdu ba ni de ltar na ming de zhes so

column1: rgyas bshad la bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi nas te shes bya la sogs pa bcu la de dag bkag pa'i dmigs rnam gnyis ka sbyar ba'o
column3: de la shes bya ni phung po dang dbang po dang yul dang rnam shes dang reg _pa _dang tshor ba dang khams dang rten 'brel lugs dang lugs ma yin pa'o
column5: spang bya ni 'dod chags _la sogs _pa'o
column7: spyod _pa'i _lam _ni _sbyin_pa _la _sogs _pa'o
column9: byed _pa'i _skyes _bu _ni _bdag _la sogs pa'o
column11: rnal 'byor gyi lam ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la sogs pa'o
column13: 'bras bu mthar ma thug gnas skabs pa ni mig dang mngon shes so
column15: mthar thug pa ni mi 'jigs pa dang stobs la sogs pa'o
column17: de kho na gnyis las kun rdzob pa ni sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'o
column19: don dam pa'i ni dben pa la sogs pa ste 'di dag ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2517-22-23,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-22-23"">  'di _de _bzhin nyid la [- 87 -]   img. 118 sogs pa ni de thams cad kyi de kho na'i dbye ba'o
column3: yang la lar ni shes bya'i 'og tu spang bya nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ci rigs pa dang
column4: _khams gsum dang byed pa'i skyes bu la sogs pa dang
column5: rnam pa'i dbye ba dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa dang
column6: _lam gyi yan lag tu rjes su dran pa bcu dang 'du shes nyi shu la sogs pa dang de kho na'i dbye bar skye ba med pa la sogs pa'am sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa ste
column7: _'di lta bu'i dbye ba bsdus pa dang rgyas pa dang phyogs re dang phal cher dang tshang ba dang mtshon byed tsam la sogs pa ci rigs par gsungs pa ni gdul bya dbang po dang khams dang mos pa du ma pa rjes su gzung ba'i don du chos can gyi dbye ba tha dad par zad la
column8: _'dir mdo la sogs gsal bar gsungs pas phyogs tsam bshad kyi gzhan du'ang de kho na ltar gzung bar bya bas rtogs sla'o
column10: 'on kyang mdo le'u brgyad pa 'dir ni go rim phal cher de dang mi mthun zhing chal chol du gsungs pa mang lags
column11: _spyir yang yum gyi mdo rgyas bsdus 'di dag la 'don pa du ma snang bas
column12: _ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon 'phags pa</rs>s kyang res 'ga' 'gres kyi dum bu mang po sdud pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rje btsun</rs> gyi man ngag gi bstan bcos 'di'i rtsa ba'i mdo gang yin pa rnam par dag pa de gtan la phebs par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du go bar bya'o
column14: </seg>

column1: mtshan ma med pa'i 'thad pa nyid dpes ston pa ni gal te shes rab kyi nas te
column2: _kun tu rgyu 'phreng ba _rgya skad la sre mi ka zhes yod de bzo sbyangs su gtan mi 'thad 'phreng ba can nam ste can no
column4: can ni phyi rol pa'i bsam _gtan pa'o
column6: des bsam gtan bsgrubs nas mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i lta ba yun ring du bsgoms kyang don ma grub pas skyo nas
column7: _mtshan ma med pa'i yul 'di bsgoms pas myur du don grub pa las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu de la dad pa thob pa ste
column8: _gal te 'di'ang mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin na de nyid kyi de dang mtshungs pas 'di la dad pa thob pa'i rgyu mtshan der ci ltar 'gyur
column9: _dad pa thob pa nyid sgrub pa ni 'di lta ste nas te dang ba dang 'dod pa dang yid ches pa dang
column10: _de las thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa thob pa'o
column12: mtshan ma med pa nyid du'ang ma zhen pas spros pa zhi ba la nges pa brtan pa ni de'ang mtshan ma'i nas so
column14: nyi tshe ba bdag med phyogs gcig bzang po ldan pa'am
column15: _yang na mos pa spyod pa nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can sgo nas don la spros pa phyogs re gcod pa la 'jug pas so
column17: mtshan med rtogs pa'i che ba ni de zhugs nas zhes te phyin ci log thams cad gcod nus pa'o
column19: rnam pa 'dis sngar gyi chos rnams mi 'jig pa'i 'thad pa'am spros par sbyar la bzhi las shes pa de nang la sogs pa'i ngo bor ma dmigs pa ni _de ci'i slad du zhes snga ma'i 'thad pa dris pa'i lan du'o
column21: thob pa ni 'bras bu'o
column23: mngon rtogs [- 88 -]   img. 119 ni _rang _bzhin no
column25: nang _gi la _sogs _par ma mthong ba ni _rigs pas dpyad na nang phyi gnyis ka de min de bzhi'i mtshan nyid can du ma grub pas so
column27: dmigs pa'i byed pa la sogs pa bkag pas de nyid sgrub pa ni de ci'i nas te rtogs pa'i byed pa po dang bya ba las dang byed pa ma grub pas so
column29: gsum ma grub pa de'ang nang la sogs pa'i chos dang 'brel ba can du'ang ma grub pas sgrub pa ni de ci'i slad du zhe na 'di ltar des shes pa de nas te nang gi tshor ba la sogs pa ni nang gi gzugs la sogs pa dang 'brel ba can la der bsnyad pa'o
column31: de ltar rtogs pa'i che ba blang dor chad pas gang du'ang mi 'dzin pa grub pa ni gnas kyi rnam grangs nas te gnas kyi rnam grangs ni gtan la dbab bya'i khyad par ro
column33: chos nyid ni rang gi rtogs pa'i nus pa ste rten 'brel gyi che ba de 'dra ba'o
column35: don de nyid bsdu ba ni bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad nas te mi dmigs pa'i khyad par can du rang dang gzhan gyi don thams cad 'grub pa'o
column37: mi dmigs pa'i khyad par de nyid kyang sgrub pa ni de ci'i nas so

column45: lan gyi don ni tshig gi don med pa ste rtogs pa'i chos de dang de'i rten ni gang byang chub la dmigs na de dag 'byung ba shes rab kyi yul _byang chub nam mkha'i zhes pa'i tshul gyis _don dam par bdag gam chos ci'ang ma grub pa'i chos nyid kyis de'i yul can shes rab dang snying rje'i sa bon sad pa can mtshon par dgongs pa'o
column47: de la 'thad pa med par dogs pa de ci'i phyir zhes bsu nas byang chub la ni [- 100-]   img. 131zhes byang chub la dmigs pa'i sems kyi yul la rgyu las skye ba'am rang bzhin gnas pa sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i chos don la grub pa'am tshad mas dmigs pa bkag pa 'thad par gsungs pa'o
column49: ngag don bsdus pa ni 'dis zhes te rten ni dmigs pa'o
column51: skye mched drug gi chos nyid ni dngos su brjod pa ste thog ma med pa nas grub pa bcos bu ma yin pa'o
column53: de'i mtshan nyid kyi rigs ni don gyis 'phags pa ste yul can shes rab dang snying rje'i sa bon sad pa'o
column55: dngos por gyur pa ni bdag gam chos su grub pa'o
column57: rtogs pa'i chos kyi dbye ba so sor bshad pa la drod kyi ni nam mkha'i bya _rjes la sogs pa dpe dgus te

column1: sgom spang gzung rtog dang po dgu'i ni dris pa bzhi pa'i lan rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis nas te
column2: _gnyen po'i mtshan nyid dngos la don dam par gnas bya ma grub pas mi gnas par gnas pa tha snyad pa grub pa'o
column4: chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i dpes bsgrub pa'i don bzhag pa ni rab 'byor 'di lta ste nas so
column6: de'i 'thad pa spyir ni de ci'i nas te stong pa nyid la gnas mi gnas ma grub pas so
column8: de nyid bsgrub pa ni stong yang gnas pa ci 'gal snyam du dogs pa de ci'i zhes bsu nas rab 'byor chos kyi zhes stong par grub pa de la ngo bo med pas khyad par mi 'thad pa dang*
column9: _stong pa nyid ci ste snyam du dogs pa de ci'i zhes bsu nas rab 'byor zhes rang bzhin dpyad na gcig dang du ma la sogs par ma [- 150 -]   img. 181 grub pas so zhes bya ba gnyis so
column11: rten ni yul dngos por grub pa'o
column13: gnas dang ldan pa ni de'i ye shes de kho nar grub pa'o
column15: gnyis pa dgu'i ni gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i gang zag la sogs pa mi dmigs pa bstan pa ni dri ba lnga pa'i lan rab 'byor gang yang nas te
column16: _las dang byed pa dang byed pa po dang spang bya gang yang ma grub pas thob bya dang thob byed med pa'o
column18: sgrub pa ni de ci'i nas te kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang gnyis ka'i dmigs pa shes bya dang

column30: yod med thams cad ma grub pas so

column33: _phung po mi dmigs zhes bya ba la sogs pas de dag so so'i mtshan nyid rigs pas dpyad na rab tu ma grub pa 'thad par gsungs pa'o
column35: 'dzin rtog dang po dgu'i ni rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i gang zag mi dmigs pa las te
column36: 'thad pa ni yod med kyi mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i spros pa dang bral bas so
column38: don ci yin zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pas med ces gsung bar rigs pa las mi dmigs pas dmigs su med ces gsungs pa ci ste
column39: _'di la rtags dang rtags can ci yod ces bsams pa'o
column41: lan ni spyir shes bya'i yod med tshad mas dmigs ma dmigs kyis rnam par 'jog pa yin yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa tshad ma'i skyes bu'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i chos thams cad dang de'i shes bya thams cad kyang de dag nyid kyi ye shes kyis dmigs par bya ba las ma 'das pas de'i ma dmigs pa'i yod pa ma grub pa'i phyir na mi dmigs pas dmigs su med ces gsungs pa 'thad pa'o
column43: de lta ma yin te gang zag gzhan la ltos nas dmigs par ma gyur pa'i yod pa 'gog na ni mi dmigs pas med ces gsung bar 'thad pa'o
column45: gnyis pa dgu'i ni drug las btags pa tsam gyi gang zag nyid dgag pa ni mtha' las 'das pa'i phyir rnam par dag pas rgyun du zhugs pa nas so

column27: bsgrub _lan de nyid 'thad pas pa ni tshe dang lnga pa shA ri'i bu sngon gyi dang por sangs rgyas bkod pa nas _so
column29: de la slob _sbyong byed gtso bo pa'i che ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi nas te gnas pa dang yid la byed pa ni 'dir rnam grangs so
column31: 'di dang ma bral ba ni gzhan don 'ba' zhig la gzhol ba dang ngo*
column33: de la klan ka spang ba la gnyis las yid la byed pa sgra ji lta bar bzung ba'i klan ka dgod pa ni smras pa nas te yid la byed pa zhes bya ba sems kyi 'jug pa mngon zhen la bsams nas te sel ba la zhugs pa nyid byang chub sems dpar rigs par ston pa'o

column38: pa'i tshig tu brjod pas don nyid du bzung ba ni yid la byed pa de kho nar ci'ang yid la mi byed pa sgyu ma lta bu'i yid la byed pa yin pa las

column7: 'tshe ba ni de ma yin pas byas pa'o
column9: tha ma gnyis kyi rnam pa bshad pa las 'gog pa'i ni yid la byed [- 171 -] nas te

column1: sdug bsngal ni rang nyid sdug bsngal gsum dang ldan zhing gzhan gyi de'i rgyur gyur pas so
column3: bdag med pa ni dbang sgyur ba med pas bdag gi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'o
column5: stong pa ni chu shing ltar snying po med pas so
column7: nad ni rkyen du mas sdug kun gnyis ka gso dgos shing lus sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba yin pas nad dang 'dra bas so
column9: de bzhin du 'bras ni zhen pa'i gnod pa dang ldan zhing nyon mongs kyi mi gtsang ba zag pa dang
column10: _skye ba dang rga ba dang 'jig pas rim pa bzhin skyang ba dang smin pa dang rdol bas so
column12: zug rngu ni phyi nang gi gnod pas zug cing bcos dka' ba'o
column14: sdig to ni smad bya dang gnod pas so
column16: gzhan las pa ni rkyen la ltos shing las kyi dbang gis rang dbang med pas so
column18: 'jig pa'i chos can ni rga nad 'chi bas 'joms pas so
column20: mi brtan pa ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad dang ldan pas so
column22: rab tu 'jig pa ni rang gi ngang dang gnod pas kyang 'jig pas so
column24: 'jigs pa ni zhi bde'i gnyen pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pas so
column26: 'tshe ba ni ma tshor bar shin tu gnod pa'i tshogs kyis gtse bas so
column28: 'go nad ni dang gnod pa mang po dang 'dre bas so
column30: bdag med pa ni bdag gi mtshan nyid med pas so

column1: ex5032023-05-2608-06-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2608-06-36"">lha rnams kyi gsum srung ba ni de nas de'i tshe nas te
column2: _rang nyid thub _pa'i _<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> bstan pa la gces par 'dzin pa nyid ston pa dang
column3: _ston pa'i bka' drin rjes su skyong ba dang
column4: _yon tan dam pa dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs su lhung ba yang rigs pas na yum bsgrub pa la tshul bzhin du zhugs pa dag la
column5: _chos kyi srung ma ye shes kyi spyan mnga' ba mthu dang ldan pa rnams kyis

column1: bsrung ba la sogs pa _gsum sngon las dang
