column167: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rdzogs par byed pa'i tshul so sor [- 392 -]      img. 423   from bdr:I1KG5853     bsgrub pa la lnga las
column168: _sbyin pa la bzhi'i dang po la kun slong gi ni gang de ltar shes nas zhes yang dag pa'i lta bas zin pas so
column170: nus pa'i ni de sbyin pa'i nas te pha rol tu phyin pa kun sdud par nus pa'o
column172: byed pa'i khyad par ni de pha rol du phyin pa drug po nas te de las lam ma lus pa rdzogs par byed pas so
column174: 'bras bu'i khyad par ni de 'phags pa'i chos nas te 'di la gnyis las lam de dag nus pa smin pa las rdzu 'phrul gyi sbyor bas chos dang sems can smin par byed pa'i tshul ni de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do'i bar ro
column176: rang nyid srid pa dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa'i thabs la mkhas pa thob pa'i khyad par ni de dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag dang nas so
column178: skabs kyi don bsdu ba ni de ci'i phyir nas so
column180: dpe'i don gang yin pa ni rmi lam ltar mtshan nyid med pa ste
column181: _bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa ni de la mnyam par 'jog pas lhag par spyod pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa bsgrubs pas tshogs nyams su myong ba spel mar sgom pas so
column183: _de rtogs pa smin pa'i gnas skabs 'dir ni gnyis ka ro gcig pa yang dag par 'grub pa'o
column185: de'i shes byed lung ni ji skad du nas so
column187: tshul khrims la brgyad las kun slong gi khyad par ni rab 'byor gzhan yang nas te mtshan nyid med pa rtogs pas so
column189: rang bzhin ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po de'ang nas te mtshan nyid med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bcu bzhi dang ldan pa'o
column191: dbye ba ni de la gnas shing nas te rgyu las dbye ba ni brda dang chos nyid kyis thob pa'o
column193: ngo bo nyid las ni ming mthun pa'i phyogs sdom pa dang gnyen po rang don dang gzhan do la dmigs pa dge ba sgrub pa dang sems can gyi don byed pa'o
column195: 'bras bu las ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob nas 'gro ba 'dren pa sgrub pa spyad par bya ba dang
column196: _rang gi su po zhi ba tsam sgrub pa mi spyad par bya ba'o
column198: mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa ni de tshul khrims de lta bu nas te rang don du srid pa dang zhi ba'i bde ba gang yang don du mi gnyer ba'o
column200: de'i 'thad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyis thob bya thob byed la sogs pa ma grub par rtogs pas so
column203: _byed pa ni rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nas te rang dang gzhan gyi don mtha' dag sgrub pa'o
column205: de'i mi dmigs pa'i khyad par dpes bsgrub pa la gnyis las spyir ni de 'gro ba lnga'i nas so
column206: _khyad par du ni rab 'byor 'di lta ste nas so
column208: skabs kyi don bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de lta na nas so
column210: bzod pa la lnga las kun slong ni rab 'byor gzhan yang nas te snga ma lta bu nyid do
column212: rang bzhin la gnyis las dbye ba ni rab 'byor gyis zhes zhus pa dang lan gyis so
column214: [- 393 -]      img. 424   from bdr:I1KG5853     so so'i mtshan nyid ni de la nyams su len pa'i nas te dang po ni ngag dang lus kyis gnod pa sna tshogs byed pa la gnod sems thag sring ba dang*
column215: _rang gi las kyi nyes par lta ba dang*
column216: _slar brtse ba rgyas par byed pa'o
column218: gnyis pa ni yang yul de dag la bdag dang chos ci'ang ma grub pas sgyu ma lta bu gsog pa ni yang du yul de dag la bdag dang chos ci yang ma grub pas sgyu ma lta bu gsog nyid du rtog pa'o
column220: byed pa la gsum las bstan pa ni de bzod pa'i nas te spang ba dang ye shes 'dren pa'o
column222: bshad pa ni rab 'byor gyis zhes zhus pa dang lan gyis de 'di rdzogs pa mtshan nyid pa ni sngar sa brgyad pa la dang por 'thob pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zad pa dang
column223: _rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba'i khyad par can no
column225: thun mong yin pa'i khyad par ni gsol pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang nas te 'di ni sa der nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam shes pa bskyed pa'i khyad par du blta'o
column227: 'bras bu'i khyad par la gnyis las gnas skabs kyi ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' nas te lam gyi rigs ma lus pa shes pa rdzogs pa ni sa der 'thob pas de las rang dang gzhan gyi don rgya chen po 'grub pa'o
column229: 'dir ni de dag pas kyang ches yongs su smin pa la blta bar bya'o
column231: mthar thug ni de sems can yongs su nas so
column233: skabs bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar na nas so
column235: brtson 'grus la bzhi las kun slong ni yang dag pa'i lta bas zin pa rab 'byor gzhan yang nas so
column237: rang bzhin la gsum las dbye ba ni rab 'byor gyis nas so
column239: lus kyi ni de brtson 'grus nas so
column241: sems kyi'ang de sems kyi nas te dkar po'i chos mtha' dag sgrub par byed pa'o
column243: 'bras bu ni de la spyod cing nas te ye shes dang bag chags spangs pa dang sku dang mtshan sa kun snang ni kun tu 'od dam bzhi ni rim par 'thob par brjod kyang lhan cig ldan pa nyid du blta'o
column245: 'phrin las ni de dag gi rjes la 'thob pa ste
column246: _chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang de'i ltas kyi cho 'phrul _nga de dag gis gdul bya'i bya ba mtha' dag sgrub pa'i gsum mo
column248: brtson 'grus la lhur bya ba bskyed pa ni rab 'byor de ltar phan pa nas so
column250: bsam gtan la drug las kun slong ni rab 'byor tshad med kyi khyad par gzhan yang nas so
column252: rang bzhin ni rab 'byor gyis nas te ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms 'jug ma lus pa la dbang sgyur ba'o
column254: mi rtog pa'i ni gsum las bstan pa ni ting nge 'dzin de la nas te mi dmigs shing ro mi myang ba'o
column256: bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te bsul ma grub pas so
column258: mjug bsdu ba ni de ci'i phyir nas so
column260: byed pa la bzhi las mdor bstan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi nas so
column262: rgyas par bshad pa ni rab 'byor gyis nas te mi dmigs pa'i lam dam pa la bslabs gnas bya ma grub par shes pa pas so
column264: [- 394 -]      img. 425   from bdr:I1KG5853     skyon med pa nyid bsgrub pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nas te brjod bya rjod byed kyi chos thams cad la dmigs pa dang mi dmigs par lta ba la skyon dang skyon med par gsungs pa'o
column266: de'i 'thad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te brjod bya'i mtshan nyid gcig dang du ma la sogs par ma grub pas de la ltos pa'i rjod byed kyang ming don bcas ma grub pas so
column268: rab 'byor 'di ni nas te skyon med par 'jug pa thob pa'i che ba ste rang dang gzhan gyi don khyad par can 'grub pa'o
column270: skabs bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar nas so
column272: rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di ni 'og ma'i skabs dgod par 'grigs te 'on kyang mdo sbyor mdzad pas snga ma'i zhabs su sbyar bar zad do
column274: gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can du skad cig la rtogs pa mdor bstan pa ni gnyis su med pa'i nas brtsams te rmi lam dang ni zhes rtsa ba bzhi'o
column276: 'di ni sa bcu pa'i gnas skabs de 'dir gnyis su 'dzin pa'i bag chags phra mo'i gnyen po thob pas so
column278: de ltar na skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs pa 'di bzhi ni bslab pa dang sgom pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa bzhir gyur pa'i sa bzhi'i gnas skabs yin pas na
column281: sa bzhi po la yang dag rten
column283: mtshan med rtsol ba dang bcas par
column285: gnas pa 'bras bu dang po yin
column287: de nyid mngon 'du byed med dang
column289: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam smin ma yin pa rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs su rtogs pa la sogs pa shin tu gsal bar gsungs pa'o
column291: des na <rs type=""person"" ana="""">slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bzang po</rs>'i zhabs kyis <rs type=""work"">'grel</rs> chen du 'di bzhi rgyu 'bras rim can du skye ba dang*
column292: _ngo bo gcig la cig car mtshan nyid bzhir brtag pa'i tshul gnyis bkod pa las
column293: _snga ma ni gzhung ji lta ba'i bshad pa yin la
column294: _phyi ma ni rang dgar zad do zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">bdag</rs> gi bla ma bdag nyid chen po</rs> gsung ngo*

column1: 'di rnam par dbye ba la gsum las de'i mngon rtogs nyid la gsum gyi dang po gnyis med pa'i mtshan nyid ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis nas te
column2: gnyis med pa'i tshul la 'jug pa'i tshul thabs zhus pa sngon du btang nas so
column4: 'di'i lan la gsum las dpe nyid las gnyis med pa'i don bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas so
column6: rmi lam dang de mthong ba yul dang yul can no
column8: 'khrul ba'i snang bar zad pas yul can phyin ci log de bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas so
column10: ye shes kyi yul du ma grub pas kyang bsgrub pa ni dgra bcom pa ni nas so
column12: de ltar chos thams cad kyang de kho nar gnyis med pa'i mtshan nyid du grub par shes par bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o
column14: gnyis med pa'i mtshan nyid can de nyid bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te yang dag pa ma yin pa ni [- 395 -]   img. 426 btags par zad pas so
column16: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rgyu rkyen las snang bar zad pas so
column18: mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa ni gzod ma nas spros pa zhi bar yongs su grub pas so
column20: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir nas ni de gsum nyid bshad pa ste
column21: _dngos po ni btags pa rdzas su grub pa'o
column23: yongs su grub pa ni gzhan dbang bden par gnas pa'o
column25: yang dag pa ni yongs su grub pa bden par gnas pa'o
column27: de ci'i phyir nas mi 'gyur ro'i bar ni ldog pas bsgrub pa'o
column29: de rtogs pa'i byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi nas te 'di la gsum las mngon zhen thams cad 'dor ba ni chags pa med do yan chad do
column31: yon tan ma lus pa 'dren pa ni de shes rab kyi nas so
column33: de dag so so'i 'thad pa'ang 'bras bu la ma zhen pa ci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar des sa de zhes so
column35: yum nyid la'ang ma zhen pas lam thams cad sdud pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nas so
column37: de nyid kyang bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te gnyis med pa'i de kho na rab tu grub pas so
column39: de la rtsod pa spang ba la gsum las de lta na chos kyi bye brag ci'ang mi rung ba'i rgol ba ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ltar nas so
column41: don dam par de dag med par 'dod pa'i lan ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas te yod par thal ba ni ye shes dam pa'i spyod yul du yod dam khyod nyid soms dang
column42: _chos nyid la dbye ba yod na don dam par thal ba'o
column44: rgyu mtshan btsal ba ni slar smras pa'o
column46: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal ba rab 'byor de bas nas ni don gyi de kho na bsdu ba'o
column48: dam don med pa de nyid bsgrub pa ni rab 'byor nga sngon nas te sku nyams su ma dmigs pa 'di la mngon sum du byas bdar ba nyid kyis so
column50: skabs kyi don bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar nas te rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni gnyis med pa rtogs pa'o
column52: srid pa gsum na mi snang ba ni theg pa gsum ci rigs par yongs su drangs nas byang chub chen por btsud pa'o

column7: sku bsdus par ni shes bya ste
column9: sku gsum dag gis rang gzhan gyi
column11: don 'di rten dang bcas par bstan
column13: zhes sku'i grangs nges pa sgrub pa gsungs pa la sogs pa'i lung mang po dang yang 'gal la
column14: _lus rnam par gzhag pa'i chos sku zhes bya ba'ang 'bras bu sangs rgyas [- 398 -]     kyi sa'i spyi'i mngon rtogs su gsungs kyi

column19: _rkyen phyis pas zhes gsungs pa ste
column20: ta dang tal zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgra mi mngon par byas pa'o

column1: tha snyad pa nyid kyi don yin pa dgag pa ni gzhan du nas te ngo bo nyid ces bya ba rang bzhin du gnas pa'i don du mi 'thad cing
column2: _spyod pa zhes bya ba rgyu 'bras su 'gyur bas 'dus ma byas par yang mi rung bas so
column4: 'o na ka ya zhes bya ba lus gyi don du ji ltar rung snyam na
column5: _de la sku zhes gsungs pa ste rgyu'i gnas skabs kyis ming du btags par zad pas so
column7: yon tan so so'i bshad pa ni phal cher bshad zin pas na de la byang chub kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
column9: sngar rgyas par ma gsungs pa dag 'dir 'chad pa na rnam thar brgyad la gsum las dbye ba ni rnam par thar pa nas te
column10: _sprul pa'i lam dang mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i lam gnyis po thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa dang*
column11: _zhi bar gnas pa'i lam gyi sde tshan gsum du bshad pa'o
column13: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bshad pa ni de la zad pa dang nas te mtha' yas pa'i don spyir ni rgyun chad pa dang yul so sor nges pa dang bya ba dang bral ba gsum bkag pa'o
column15: nam mkha' la ni dus dang yul yongs su chad pa snga ma gnyis med pa nyid du sbyar ba'o
column17: mtha' yas nyid ces bya ba de'i dngos por gyur pa'i rkyen du bshad pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas nyid ni nas so
column19: skye mched ces bya ba gnas kyi don du bshad _pa ni 'di ni rgyu mtshan nas te rgyu mtshan ni dmigs pa'o
column21: de nyid rten yang yin pas na nam mkha' mtha' yas la ting nge 'dzin 'di gnas pa zhes bshad pa ste lha'i gnas pa bsam gtan yin pa bzhin no
column23: nam mkhar snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ni de rnam shes yin la de'i mtha' yas nyid la sogs pa'ang snga ma bzhin no
column25: cung zad med pa ni rnam shes de yang yan lag dang bcas pa bkag pa'o
column27: tha ma ni de'ang bkag pa la dmigs pa 'du shes rags pa dang bral zhing phra ba tsam dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin yid dang de'i yul chos tsam gyi skye mched du bgrang ba'o
column29: de dang bsam gtan gyi khyad par la gsum las
column30: _dmigs dang yan lag 'da' ba'i tshul bstan pa ni 'di thams cad nas te snga ma snga ma'i dmigs pa dang
column31: _yan lag spang bya dang phyi ma phyi ma gnyen po yin pas de dag spong bas so
column33: rtog sogs pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i 'dod khams spong ba'i yan lag lnga la sogs pa'o
column35: de gnyis [- 399-]   img. 430   bshad pa ni 'di rnams nas te
column36: _dmigs pa las 'da' ba 'thob pa ni mtshan nyid de dang ldan pa'o
column38: bsam gtan dang mi 'dra bar thams cad yan lag gnyis ldan du mtshungs pa ni yan lag las nas so
column40: yan lag 'dra ba nyid la zhi rags kyi khyad par dpes bsgrub pa ni ji ltar nas te
column41: _reg na bde ba la sogs pa ni kha dog la sogs pa'i yon tan kun mtshon pa'o
column43: gya nom pa la sogs pa gsum ni phyi ma gsum dang rim bzhin sbyar ro
column45: bshad pa lhag ma zhes bya ba ni gzugs chung ngu kha dog sdug pa dang mi sdug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba tsam du zad do
column47: zad par la drug las dbye ba ni zad par gyi skye mched nas grangs dang ming gnyis te snga mas dmigs pa la dbang sgyur zhing 'dis khyab par spro bas na rgyas pa dang chub pa dang mtha' dag la sogs pa'i ming can no
column49: so so'i mtshan nyid ni de la zad par nas te
column50: _bsam gtan la brten nas dmigs pa spro bas na rten zhi rags kyi rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan dang po gnyis kyis mtshon par byed pa na nye bar gnas pa'i sgrib pa ni 'dod par gtogs pa'i spang bya'o
column52: mtha' gcig tu ma bzung ba ni de la gnas par mi byed pa'o
column54: de nyid rgyu mtshan du byed pa ni dmigs pa de tsam la gtod pa'o
column56: dmigs pa gzhan la spro ba ni sa'o zhes nas so
column58: yang dang yang du yid la byed pas ni de'i ting nge 'dzin 'byor pa mtshan nyid du bstan pa'o
column60: skye ba'i tshul la gnyis las goms pa'i nus pa thob pa la ngang gis skye tshul ni sngar sgom pa na ste chu klung la sogs pa mthong ba na sems gtad pa tsam gyis 'bad pa ma byas kyang 'byung ba'o
column62: sa'i yang 'di dag gi rjes su 'brangs te blta'o
column64: rnam par shes pa'i ni thig le lta bu la sems gtad pa las sems nyid du snang ba rgyas par byed pas so
column66: goms par ma byas pa la sbyangs pas skye ba'i tshul ni gang zhig sngar nas te
column67: _chu dang zhing gtsang ba snod bkang ba'am
column68: _me shin tu 'bar zhing 'khrugs pa la sogs pa mdun du byas pa la mtshan mar bzung zhing rgyas par bsgom pa'o
column70: 'pho ba dang mi 'pho ba ni gdeg par rung ba dang mi rung ba'o
column72: dkyil 'khor byas pa ni khebs par bkram pa'o
column74: gang yang rung bas yongs su bcad pa ni ri mor bkod pa'o
column76: yongs su bcad pa 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mtshan mar bzung bas dmigs pa spro ba'i rten no
column78: goms pa'i rtags la gsum las 'bad pa dang ngang gis 'thob pa so sor bshad pa gnyis ni byas pa'am nas te
column79: _skye bo yan chad ni dbye ba spyir bstan pa'o
column81: so sor bshad pa ni de la zad par chu'i nas te

column84: ma byas na ni zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma gtan ma byung na ting nge 'dzin nyes chags par go bar byas la gzhi nas sbyang dgos pa'o
column86: gnyis pa ni gsal zhing mdzes pa dang brtan la rgya che bar snang ba'o
column88: 'gal ba la sogs pa ni me dang bral ba'i cha ste de dag la'ang me cung zad dang 'brel bar snang ba'o
column90: ge sar dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma gzhan du byas pa ni sngon po nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang 'dres par snang ba'o
column92: dkyil 'khor las 'phags pa ni rgya cher 'phel ba'o
column94: dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba ni thig le las 'phel ba'o
column96: mtha' la sogs pa ni steng 'og la sogs pa'i mu la nye ba dag tu'o
column98: gnyis ka'i don bsdu ba ni de lta na 'dir nas te shes par bya'o yan chad ni spyir ro
column100: de nyid gsal bar 'chad pa ni mtshan ma rnam pa nas te mthong ba tsam la mi brtag par don spyi'i rnam pa las spro ba goms bar bya ba'o
column102: yan lag dang bcas pa ni rtags la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o
column104: goms pa'i byed pa'i khyad par ni zad par sa la nas te sa la sogs pa la ci 'dod du dbang sgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul phyogs la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par byed pa 'thob pa'o
column106: mes me len pa ni me las me spel ba'o
column108: zad par gyi sgra'i don ni rgyun mi 'chad par nas te sa la sogs pa dus dang yul kun tu khyab par spro bas so
column110: zil gnon la gsum las dbye ba bstan pa ni zil gyis gnon pa'i nas te snga ma dag gis dmigs pa sprul zhing khyab par byas pa 'dis zil gyis gnon cing de'i gzhan dbang du 'gyur ba'i nyes pa sel bas so
column112: mtshan nyid bshad pa ni de la sngon po nas te mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni zil gyis non pa la'ang non par ma non pa la'ang ma non par shes pas so
column114: sgra'i don ni dmigs pa zil gyis nas so
column116: nyon mongs pa med pa la gnyis las mtshan nyid bshad pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa nas te gnas pa grub pa ni bya ba ste 'phrin las la rnam par spyod pa'o
column118: de byed pa po gang gis zhe na
column121: sgra don ni gzhan gyi rgyud la nas te
column122: _mi skyed pas ni skyes pa sel ba'ang mtshon pa'o
column123: _khyad par bshad pa ni de la nyan thos nas te rang la dmigs nas skye ba sel ba'am de'i rkyen mi byed pa tsam dang*
column124: _thams cad kyi skye ba 'gog cing skyes pa'ang sel bas lhag par brtse ba'o
column126: 'di dag gdul bya skal ldan la ltos pa ste skal med la'ang 'gyur na ni ha cang thal bas so
column128: smon nas mkhyen pa'i yang mtshan nyid ni smon nas mkhyen pa ste shes bya shes pa dang dgos pa sgrub pa smon pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin 'byor pa'o
column130: sgra'i don ni khams sum na gnas pa'i nas so

column136: mi g.yeng ba dang the tshom thams cad sel nus pa'i khyad par lnga'o
column138: so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam grangs ni de'i don mtshan gzhi la blta'o
column140: mtshan nyid kyang snga ma de nyid kyi ste don gzhan la dgongs ni de'i ldem po'i ngag gi dbye ba'o
column142: nges pa'i tshig ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang bshad pa'i mtshan can gyi sgra so so'o

column1: ex5032023-05-2517-15-15,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-15-15"">snga ma gnyis kyang bsdu [- 416 -]  ba ni rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nas so
column3: snyan par smra ba ni rab 'byor ci ltar nas te pha rol tu phyin pa drug po nyid bshad pas so
column5: dge ba'i chos gzhan mtha' dag ston pa'ang de yin mod pha rol tu phyin pa drug kho nar ci zad ces dogs pa de ci'i phyir zhes bya bas bsu nas de ni 'di ltar zhes de nyid kyis thams cad bsdus par gsungs pa'o
column7: don spyod pa'ang rab 'byor ci ltar nas snga ma ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gzhan sbyor bas so
column9: don mthun yang de bzhin du de dag nyid la rang gnas pas so
column11: lta ba phun sum tshogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rtogs pa'i la gnyis las
column12: sgra dang don la mkhas pas gnyis po'i de kho na ston pa nyid la'ang gnyis kyi dang po don bstan pa ni rab 'byor gzhan yang nas te sgra la mkhas pa spyir ni yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'o
column14: so sor ni gcig nas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po kun la mkhas pa ste
column15: _bzod ma nas ma skyes pa ston pa la sogs pa la'o
column17: de dag gis nyes pa sel cing yon tan sgrub pa'i byed pa ston pa la mkhas pa ni yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin la sogs pa shes pa'o
column19: gcig tu bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa ni skye ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa las yi ge thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsdus pa'o
column21: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gcig 'dus pa'ang thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin a nyid du sgom pa'o
column23: de nyid de kho na'i mtshan nyid kyi cha las gsal bar bsgrub pa ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po de'ang nas te snga ma ltar shes legs par bsgoms pas brjod pa thams cad las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa thob pa'o
column25: dpes bsgrub pa ni rab 'byor 'di lta ste nas te 'dis don dang sgra la mkhas pas sgra'i yul las 'das pa'i de kho na rtogs pa ltar ro
column27: de la klan ka brgyud pa spang ba ni gnyis las stong pa nyid kyis ston pa de ma grub pa spang ba ni dri ba dang lan gnyis kyis so
column29: dri ba la gsum las don brjod pa ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis nas te
column30: _bstan bya'i yul dang ston pa'i chos dang de'i don yang ma grub pas lam dang 'bras bu thob nas de ltar ston pa de mi rung ba'o
column32: yul can dang yul ma grub pa'i 'thad pas bsgrub pa ni de la ni sems can nas 'gres gnyis so
column34: don bsdu ba ni de ci'i nas te chos thams cad dus gsum du stong pas yul du byas pa dmigs par 'gyur ba ltar ci'ang mi dmigs pa las so
column36: mi dmigs bzhin du ston na ni phyin ci log tu 'gyur bar gsal lo zhes bsams pa'o
column38: lan la lnga las don dam par ston pa med pa nyid 'dod pa ni bcom ldan 'das [- 417-]      img. 448   from bdr:I1KG5853     kyis nas te
column39: _gang zag dang chos thams cad stong pas ston pa'i gzhi zhing dang ston pa po _dang bstan bya yul yang stong pas so
column41: mi dmigs bzhin du ston pa tha snyad pa dpes sgrub pa na don brjod pa ni rab 'byor de la nas te stong yang de ltar ma shes pa dag gi 'khrul ba bsal ba'i phyir tha snyad tsam du ston gyi de kho nar ni snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang med la sgrib pa med pa'i shes rab kyis brjod du med pa las gzhan du byas nas brjod bya rjod byed gnyis grub pa'ang med pa'o
column43: dpe 'god pa ni rab 'byor de lta ste nas te sprul pas sems can lam dang 'bras bu sna tshogs la bkod kyang gang yang grub pa med pa bzhin no
column45: don bsgrub pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas te tha snyad dang don dam pa'i tshul la ltos nas phyin ci log par 'gro ba dang ma bcings ma grol ba'i don gnyis grub pa'o
column47: don dam pa'i tshul de nyid gsal bar mdzad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas so
column49: mi dmigs pa'i khyad par de 'thad pas bsgrub pa la gsum las 'thad pa dngos ni de ci'i phyir zhes dris nas de ni 'di ltar zhes gdod ma nas spros pa'i dra ba las 'das par brjod pa'o
column51: des grub pa'i don ni rab 'byor de ltar na nas te mi dmigs pa la gnas pa brtan pa las dngos po med pa dang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po gnas par bya bar ma grub pas ci la'ang mi gnas par gnas pa'o
column53: ston pa grub pa'i skabs spyir bsdu ba ni
column54: _rab 'byor de ltar nas te 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyis rtogs pa'i de kho na'i tshul las ma 'das pas de thams cad kyis rjes su gnang bar grub pa'o
column56: chos dang chos nyid tha dad pas mi dmigs pa'i yul ma grub par rtsod pa spang ba ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis zhes dri ba bkod nas te
column57: _ma 'das pa'i tshul de ltar de bzhin nyid spros pa med pa yin na gzugs la sogs pa ji ltar dmigs pa las tha dad pas 'di dag mi dmigs par ma grub par bsam pa'o
column59: lan gyi don ni gzugs la sogs pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i de bzhin nyid du grub pas tha dad med pa'o
column61: bstan bya don byar gnyis po nyid ma grub pa'i klan ka spang ba la gsum las
column62: _dri ba ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gal te nas snga ma rjes su brjod nas te
column63: _tha dad ma lags na de lta na chos dbyings ltar 'dus ma byas su gyur pas nyon byang go dbye ba dge mi dge'i 'bras bu mi 'thad par bsams pa'o
column65: 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ni kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam byang gnyis ka'o
column67: dkar nag ni 'dres mar spyad pa'o
column69: mi gnag cing dkar ba ni rnam par byang ba 'dres ma med pa'o
column71: lan spyir bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas te de dag so sor ma 'chol ba yang dag pa'i kun rdzob nyid [- 418 -]      img. 449   from bdr:I1KG5853     las 'dod pa'o
column73: don dam par ma grub pa'i 'thad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te rtog pa dang brda dang tha snyad gyi sgra'i yul las 'das pas so
column75: de nyid rgyas par bsgrub pa ni 'di ltar ming nas te ming dang gzugs bden pa ni phung po lnga de kho nar phung po ma grub par bden pas so
column77: de nyid ni skye ba ni med pa nas dus gsum du stong pa nyid kyi bar te 'dus ma byas pa dang
column78: _de nyid kyis 'jig pa med pa dang
column79: rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang mtha' dbus dang bral ba'o
column81: so sor bsgrub pa la drug las kun rdzob byis pas kyang rtogs pas 'bras bu 'chol bar thal ba spang ba'i dri ba ste gsol ba nas te 'khrul ba tsam las 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa grub na byis pa rnams _kyang rnam par _dag _pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur bas dag pa sgrub pa la 'thad pa don med du 'gyur ba'o
column83: lan ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas te de dag ni 'khrul ba dang ma 'khrul ba'i spyod yul la shes sam shes na 'dod na ste rmongs pas ma dag pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa nyid du rnam par gzhag par zad pa'o
column87: rnam par dgod pa ni de dang ldan par gzhag pa'o
column89: sgom pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'o
column91: des na rab 'byor 'phags pa de dag la rmongs pa bsal ba rnams la dag pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pas ma 'chol bar grub pa'o
column93: 'phags pa'i 'bras bu de'ang tha snyad par zad kyi don dam par ma grub pa la gsum las spyir bstan pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags zhes zhus nas te de ltar lam dang 'bras bu thob byed dang des thob bya mchis sam ste yod na ni don dam pa nyid du 'gyur bar bsams pa'o
column95: lan ni don dam par ma grub bzhin du kun rdzob pa nyid la rgyu 'bras kyi nges pa de _dag rnam par gnas pa zad pa'o
column97: ris su bcad pa ni don dam par tha dad pa'o
column99: bye brag tu bsgrub _pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gal te nas zhus lan gnyis kyis te
column100: _theg pa gsum gyi spang bya dang gnyen po'i rim pa dag kyang 'dus ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid la ma grub pa'o
column102: skabs gyi don bsdu ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du nas te
column103: de lta bu'i don dam pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa las mngon zhen thams cad spong bas rang dang gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs par sgrub pa'o
column105: de nyid dpes bsgrub pa la gnyis las bstan pa ni 'di lta ste nas te 'bras bu la chags pa ni rang nyid de don du gnyer ba'o
column107: nyams su myong ba ni thob pa la longs spyod pa'o
column109: sbyin pa gtong ba ni gzhan don du 'jug par yang snang ba'o
column111: bshad pa ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi nas te chos kyi mtshan nyid ni sprul pa lta bu de nyid du 'di'i lan ni spang bar bya ba [- 419 -]      img. 450   from bdr:I1KG5853     dang shes par bya ba dang bsnyen par bya ba dang thob par bya ba sprul pa lta bur grub pa'i 'gres bzhis gsungs so
column113: dpe ma grub pa spang ba la dri ba ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das sprul pa nas te de la tha snyad du'ang lam sgom pa med pas dper mi rung bar bsams pa'o
column115: lan ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas te dngos por ma grub kyang de ltar snang ba tsam gyis tha snyad grub pa'i dper 'thad par dgongs pa'o
column117: chos mthun pa bsgrub pas rgyas par gsal 'debs pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags zhes zhus pa dang lan gnyis kyis mi bden bzhin du snang bar mtshungs pa bsgrubs pa'o
column119: shes ngor grub pas ci phan dam don du ma grub na de la 'bad pa don med par thal ba'i klan ka spang ba la bdun las dri ba dgod pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ltar nas te ci'ang ma grub pa de la sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par byang ba'i lam gyis grol bar byed pa'i 'bad pa don med pas so
column121: lan las dgrol bar bya ba'i sems can ma grub pa spang ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas te
column122: _don dam par de dag ma grub par 'dod pas sgyu ma lta bu nyid la 'thad kyi
column123: _don dam par grub na ni rang bzhin gzhan du 'gyur bar mi rung bas slar mi 'thad par dgongs pa'o
column125: de grol bar 'bras bu'ang de ltar 'thad pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gal te nas zhus pa dang lan gnyis kyis te 'tshal ba la sogs pa gsum ni sbyor ba dang mthong lam dang sgom lam gyis so
column127: gang gi don du ni sems can 'khor ba las bsgral ba'o
column129: de ni sprul pa lta bu nyid la rmongs pa bsal te de ltar shes par byed pa las 'thad pa'o
column131: bcings pa spang bya'ang de ltar grub pa ni bzhi las dri ba ni rab 'byor gyis nas te ci la gnas na zhes bya ba ni mi bden pa la byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu'i byed pa las ldog par bya ba kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid mi rung bar bsams pa'o
column133: de'i lan mdor bstan pa ni bcon ldan 'das kyis nas te ming las don sgo 'dogs pa'i rnam rtog 'khrul ba las kun tu 'khor zhing bcings pa grub pas de las gyen du bskyod du yod pa'o
column135: de nyid bshad pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ming ni nas te gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ming nyid kyi dbye ba'o
column137: de'ang de kho nar ma grub pas na bden par mngon par zhen pa dgag pa ni rab 'byor ming thams cad nas so
column139: rtag pa rtogs pas bzhagaskabs la sbyar ba bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar nas so
column141: ming gi yul mtshan ma'i dbye ba ni rab 'byor mtshan ma nas te gzung ba dang thams cad mtshon pa gzugs
column143: _'dzin par snang bas phye ba'i chos thams cad do
column145: [- 420 -]      img. 451   from bdr:I1KG5853     gang yang rung ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug la sogs pa skabs kyi don bsdu ba ni de'i phyir nas te dang por 'god
column146: rgyun du zhog mtshan ma med pa la 'jug kyang gnyis su mi rtog pas so
column148: de dag sgrub cing spong ba'i byed pa'ang 'thad pa la gnyis las bshad pa ni gsol ba gal te nas te rtags pa phyin ci log lags na ming tsam du zad na sa nas sar 'phar ba'i dge legs sgrub pas 'ching ba gcod cing grol ba thob par mi rung bar zhus pa dang
column149: _dngos po'i mtshan ma mtshan nyid dang dngos po mtshan gzhi gang yang ma grub par ming tsam du rtogs pa nyid las des 'thad pa'i lan gnyis so
column151: de gnyis bsdu ba ni rab 'byor gal te chung ngu nas te
column152: _ldog pa dang rjes 'gro gnyis kyis mtshan ma med pa gnyis la byed pa 'thad pa'o
column154: mtshan ma med pa ni yul gyi spros pa zhi ba'o
column156: dran pa dang yid la byed pa med pa ni mos pa dang de kho na yid la byed pas blo'i 'jug pa zhi ba'o
column158: de dag gi rten nam ngo bo nyid chos thams cad kyang ma grub pa spang ba ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nas zhus pa dang lan gnyis kyis te mtshan ma med pa nyid la de rtogs pa'i yul de dag tha snyad du grub pa'o
column160: mtshan med de la slob pa'i byed pa nyid bsgrub pa la bzhi las spyir bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa rab 'byor rnam grangs nas te mtshan ma med pas drangs pa des khyab pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la mkhas pas rang don dang gzhan don gyi dge legs thams cad 'phel ba ni dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo yan chad do
column162: de nyid rgyas par bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te de gsum gyis chos kun bsdus pa nyid dang
column163: _so so'i mtshan nyid dang de la slob pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na la bslabs pa 'grub pa gsum du blta'o
column165: spyir bstan pa'i don de rnam par dbye ba ni rab 'byor gyis nas te rnam pa gang gi tshul du zhes bya ba ni de gsum la slob pas gzugs la sogs pa ji ltar rtogs _par 'gyur ba'i tshul zhus pa'o
column167: lan las phung po rtogs pa'i tshul ni gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang
column168: _khyad par gyi chos skye dgag dang
column169: _de dag gi chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa gsum gsum gsungs pa ste
column170: _ngo bo nyid ni dpe lnga'i sgo nas phyin ci log gi yul 'ba' zhig tu blta ba'o
column171: _khyad par gyi chos ni don dam _par _dpe mi 'dra bas don khyad par med pa ston zhes te dpe rnams kyi thad ka'i don yang cung mi 'dra'o sems so
column173: 'gro 'ong med kyang tha snyad du skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos su grub pa'o
column175: chos nyid ni skye 'gag dang 'gro 'ong dang bcings grol dang 'phel 'grib dang bral ba ye shes dam pa'i spyod yul gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'o
column177: skye mched kyi ni nang dang phyi'i skye mched bcu gnyis stong par ro
column178: _khams kyi'ang khams bco brgyad dang [- 421-]      img. 452   from bdr:I1KG5853     khams drug stong par ro
column180: rten 'brel kyi ni rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis la skye 'gag la sogs pa'i mtha' rnam pa bcu dang bral ba'o
column182: bden pa'i ni chos dang chos nyid shes pa gnyis te
column183: _dang po'ang sdug mtshan gzhi _bden dang mtshan nyid dang de'i _'phags gnyis las grol ba ye shes dang ye shes _kyi rnam pa bzhis rtogs pa'o
column185: chos nyid ni de lta bu'i spros pa dang bral ba de bzhin nyid do
column187: de la don dam pa'i gnas pa dang 'gal ba spang ba la gnyis las
column188: _'gal ba spang ba dngos ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis zhes de ltar chos sna tshogs rtogs pa'i yul grub na don dam par spros pa thams cad bral ba nyid mi 'thad par zhu ba sngon du btang nas te
column189: _lan ni de thams cad spros pa med pa nyid la tha snyad tsam gyis rnam par gzhag pas 'gal ba med pa'i don bstan pa dang
column190: _ldog pa dang rjes 'gros bsgrub pa dang
column193: de ltar slob pa'i che ba ni rab 'byor gyis nas te chos thams cad tshul gcig pa rtogs pas thams cad kyi de kho na la bslabs par 'gyur ba'o
column195: de nyid la'ang spros bral yin na bslab pa med pa'am yod na phyin ci log tu spros bral bkag par thal ba spong ba na
column196: _dri ba la gnyis las de gnyis so sor brjod pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gal te nas te chos kyi dbyings la ni bslab pa'i yul dang byed pa la sogs pa mi 'thad pas so
column198: de'ang shes bya la sogs pa spyi dang
column200: _zag pa med pa'i lam gyi dbye ba'i 'gres gnyis kyis ni dang po ste byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi yan chad do
column202: nyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das gal te nas te de dag la bslab pa yod par zhen bgyi na'i pa na'ang phyin ci log tu mi spro ba ni spro bya ma yin pa'o
column206: de'i don bsdu ba ni bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du zhes so
column208: gnyis ka bsgrub pa ni bcom ldan 'das de ci'i nas te gsal lo
column210: 'di'i lan ni de skad ces nas te de kho nar mi dmigs pa nyid las tha snyad du grub pas thal ba spong ba'o
column212: de la mi dmigs pa nyid kyi rgyu ni chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do yan chad de chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa'i chos med pas so
column214: yod par rtog na phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba'i ldog pas snga ma de nyid bsgrub pa ni rab 'byor gal te yang nas so
column216: med par shes pas sgyu ma lta bu'i don la ma rmongs pa nyid grub pa'i rjes 'gros sgrub pa dngos ni chos thams cad ni nas so
column218: sbyor lam la 'god pa la'ang pa la'ang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa tshad med bzhi dang
column219: _sbyor ba la rang don pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
column220: _gnyis don dge ba bcu la sogs pa ste
column221: _sems can gyi don ji lta ba la [- 422-]      img. 453   from bdr:I1KG5853     sogs pa _gsum _gyi la drug ste spyir rgya dpe la spyir bstan gsum la mdo sbyor byas shing bye brag tu bstan pa gsum des phyed par bsam nas mdo sbyor med do
column223: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA ba</rs>'i bye brag tu bstan pa gsum la'ang go sla ba'i ched du mdzad de mchan du byas kyang legs pa la zhes bstan pa gsum dang bye brag tu bshad pa gsum gyis so

column1: dang po la gnyis las dpe dgod pa la gsum ste
column2: _sgyu ma'i rnam pa ni rab 'byor 'di lta ste nas so
column4: 'di la'ang bdun las longs spyod pa po'i rnam pa ni sems can gyi gzugs rnams so
column6: spyad bya ni don ston pa'i dpe'o
column8: skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'i gnas dang stan la sogs pa'i longs spyod nyid dang
column9: _klu la sogs pa'i dga' rtsed do
column11: bsgrub bya'i lam ni sbyin pa la sogs pa sgom pa'o
column13: de dag gi 'bras bu 'jig rten pa ni rgyal rigs la sogs pa'o
column15: 'jig rten las 'das pa dman pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'o
column17: mchog _la _slob _par _gtogs _pa ni _byang _chub _mkhan po dang mchan bu ni rnal 'byor sbyang ba cher byas ma byas kyi sems dpa'o
column19: ma slob pa ni sangs rgyas rnams so
column21: de la 'khrul ba'i blo ni de la sems can byis pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste brdzun pa'i snang ba kye ma ya mtshan gyi tshig la bden par 'dzin pa'o
column23: ji lta ba shes pa'i khyad par ni de la skyes bu nas te mkhas shing gsal ba ni dbang po'i gzugs can blo'i khyad par ro
column25: yid rno ba dang dpyod pa dam pa ni gzugs med yid kyi blo'o
column27: de dag gis yul de brdzun pa dag snga ma dag gi blo de'ang 'khrul bar rtogs pa'o
column29: dmigs pa med pa'i brtse bas 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i don ni rab 'byor de bzhin du nas te chos kyi dbyings rtogs kyang thabs kyis sems can gang yang gi shes bya spang bya blang bya'i chos mi 'dor ba zung du 'brel ba'i lam gyis so
column31: gnyis pa ni de dag kyang nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rang dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par spyod pa ste
column33: _gzhan 'dzud pa dang
column34: _btsud pa gzengs bstod cing 'khrid pa dang
column35: _gzhan nyid zhugs pa'ang spro ba skyed pas so
column37: gsum pa ni gnyis don cha mnyam bdag _kyang dge ba rab tu byung ba'i dang dge bsnyen gyi dang bsnyen gnas kyi dang bcu'i nas te snga ma ltar dge ba bcu nas dpe byad bzang po'i bar rdzogs par spyod pa'o
column39: bzhi pa la gsum las chos rnams stong pa nyid la brtse bas sems can rjes su 'dzin pa grub pa med pa nyid ni rab 'byor gal te nas te
column40: _sngon dang bar dang phyi ma ni shin tu ma dag pa sems can dang phyogs gcig dag pa byang chub sems dpa' dang shin tu dag pa sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs yin pas de dag tu de bzhin nyid nyes pa dang gnyis ka dang yon tan gyis tha dad du mi 'gyur ba rtogs pas na ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2608-14-18,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2608-14-18"">yang so sor rtog pa'i shes rab gnyen por ston pa ni skad cig de nyid la nas te 'dod pa la [-456-]  bsten pa'i dus de nyid na'ang bdag nyid chen po dag la gnyen po 'di lta bu yod par go bar gyis shig ces yul stong pa nyid las shes rab de sgrub pa'i don gzhan gsungs par blta'o
column3: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid rnam par 'byed pa na gang zag stong pa ni sems can med pa nas te chos thams cad la bkag pa yin pas phung po lnga las so sor sbyar ba ni ci'ang ma yin no
column5: chos stong pa ni sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa ste 'dzin pa dang gzung ba dang rjod byed dang brjod bya 'gog pa'i dpe'o
column7: chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang ba ni chos smra ba la so sor rtog pa de lta bu yod par lta bas so
column9: skyo zhing zhum pa spang ba ni rigs kyi bu gzhan yang nas te 'phags pa de la bdun du ting nge 'dzin sgom pas rang la mi dgongs pa lta bu la yid byung bar mi bya bar bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i rnam 'phrul nyid la sogs par go bar bya'o
column11: bdud kyi las ni de la ma dad na bdud yin par bsam pa'o
column13: phyir bstob pa ni mi gus shing spong bas so
column15: khyad par gyi la gsum las de'i yul la sogs pa'i the tshom gyis zin pa ni de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las nas te ji srid 'gro bar bya ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yul dang rang bzhin la sogs pa mtshon pa'o
column17: tshogs lam nyid du'ang bsam gtan las mngon shes la sogs pa 'thob par gsungs pa las 'di lta bu mi shes par mi rigs so zhes ni mi bsam ste
column18: _sa gong ma pa dag gi rnam 'phrul phal cher 'og ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa'i phyir dang
column19: _rtag tu ngu nyid 'khor dang bcas pa dka' ba'i spyod pa las tshogs chen po bsgrub pas smin par bya ba'i phyir   <rs type=""person"" ana="""">rje btsun</rs> des mi mthong bar byin gyis brlabs pas so
column21: du ba ni sgra gsang mthon pos so
column23: cho nge ni dma' ba'o
column25: </seg>yang na ngu ba ni mchi ma 'byin pa'o
column27: cho nge ni de nyid sgra dang bcas pa'o
column29: mya ngan ni sems kyi gdung ba'o
column31: smre sngags ni kye hud re sdug ces tshig tu smra ba'o
column33: nyin mtshan bdun tsam 'da' ba ni chos la gus pa 'ba' zhig sgom pas so
column35: sgom pa de nyid brtan pa'i khyad par dpes bsgrub pa ni rab 'byor 'di lta ste nas so
column37: de sel ba'i gdams ngag thob pa la bzhi las dang por spro ba bskyed pa ni rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' nas te de ltar chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa bsgoms shing chos 'tshol ba'i brtson 'grus de nyid kyis sems las su rung ba na chos kyi rgyun ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdams ngag 'dzin par nus pa'i phyir
column40: gdung ba ni 'dod pa'am don du gnyer ba'i chun pa ste sdug bsngal ni ma yin no

column1: dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyid bstan pa la gsum las phyogs dang grong khyer gyi bkod pas yul bstan pa ni rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis nas te [- 457 -]   img. 488 brtson 'grus ni go cha'o
column3: spro ba ni dge ba bsgrubs pas so
column5: don du gnyer ba ni sems can gyi don no
column7: 'dod pa ni 'bras bu la'o
column9: rjes su 'brang ba ni de dag bar ma dor mi 'dor bas so
column11: grong khyer gyi mtha' skor ni rwa ba dang 'obs dang ljon shing gi phreng ba gsum mo
column13: tshad ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis gru bzhi pa'o
column15: 'byor pa ni nang gi nor ro
column17: rgyas pa ni phyi'i nor gyis so
column19: bde ba ni dgra la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba med pa'o
column21: lo legs pa ni 'bru rgyas pa'o
column23: skye bo ni rta dang glang po la sogs pa'o
column25: tshong khang gi phreng ba ni bar bar nas rgya rabs su dkrigs pa bar gyi thag dang che chung mnyam pas phan tshun chod par gyur pa
column26: _'gram dag na lam yangs shing bde ba dang bcas pa lnga brgyas grong khyer de mdzes pa byas pa'o
column28: skye bo'i bzhon pa ni glang po la _sogs pa'o
column29: _khyogs _kyi bzhon _pa ni 'do lo la sogs pa'o
column31: rkang _gis 'gro ba ni khur bu ba la sogs pa'o
column33: phyi rwa ni so so'i sgo drung gi rwa ba ste mda' yab kyi ba gam gza' gam du ltos nas brtsigs pas mgo'i phreng ba ltar gnas pa'o
column35: sgra 'jam pa ni mnyan par bde ba'o
column37: snyan pa ni snying la 'bab pa'o
column39: yid du 'ong ba ni bde dang bskyed pa'o
column41: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa ni pi wang dang gling bu dang bar la ro la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rol mo'i khyad par ro
column43: rtse dga' dga' dgur spyod pa ni chung 'bring gsum mam
column44: _thog ma dang bar dang tha ma gsum du'o
column46: chu _rjes su mthun pa ni g.yas skor du 'bab pa'o
column48: me tog gzhan ni dri bzang ba la sogs pa thams cad do
column50: skyed mos tshal ni bza' shing dang rdzing la sogs pa la longs spyod mang po dag gi gnas so
column53: _kha dog sngon po ni lhan cig skyes pa'o
column55: sngon por ston pa ni bcos ma'o
column57: sngon por snang ba ni gnyis ka mdangs gsal ba'o
column58: _kha na ma tho ba med pa'i khyad par ni nga yir bya bas char bgos pa dang de dag la mngon par chags pas bzung ba med pa'o
column60: de'i rgyu mtshan ni 'di ltar yun ring por nas te sangs rgyas kyi tshul ni yum mo
column62: de la dad pa 'ba' zhig gis khyab pa'i thos bsam gyis don legs par rtogs pa dang mos pa brtan po dang ldan pas so
column64: gnas _bstan pa ni de la rigs kyi bu grong khyer nas te gzhi dang _rgyu dang tshad dang mdog dbyibs la sogs pa'i bkod pa dang*
column65: _bde bar gnas par byed pa'i tshogs chas kyi khyad par dang lnga dang ldan pa'o
column67: longs spyad pa la sogs pa gsum ni longs spyod chung 'bring gsum mo
column69: kar ka da na ni in tra ni la dang mthon mthing gi rnam grangs can no
column71: longs spyod kyi khyad par ni de na byang chub sems dpa' nas te
column72: _zang zing ni dga' dgur spyod do [- 458 -]      img. 489   from bdr:I1KG5853     yan chad do
column74: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa ni de'i 'byor pas lus bde ba myong ba'o
column76: dbang du gyur pa ni de las yid bde ba myong ba'o
column78: 'o na 'dod pa la zhen pas nam bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod pas na des nyams par mi 'gyur ram snyam na
column79: _ma yin te 'jig tshogs la zhen pas sbyar ba'i nyon mongs pas ni sdug bsngal skyed pa yin gyi bdag nyid chen po dag chos kyi de kho na rtogs nas nyon mongs pa zil gyis mnan te thabs la mkhas pa sems can gdul ba'i don du sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar 'dod pa la spyod par ston pas ni dge legs dpag tu med pa spel ba kho na'o
column81: des na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni
column83: skye ba kun tu rtag par yang
column85: 'khor los sgyur bar gyur nas su
column87: sems can rnams kyi don byed do
column89: thabs chen dang ni ldan pa la
column91: 'khor ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid dang
column93: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur
column95: de phyir rgyal sras bsam mi khyab
column99: 'khor dag gi'ang grong khyer de na nas so
column101: chos kyi ni yang byang chub sems dpa' nas te dus de srid ni chos kyi longs spyod dag gi mtshams cung zad cung zad dag tu ngal gso ba tsam du zad pa'o
column103: dus gsum du ston pas ni nyin mtshan phal cher thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa yan lag dang bcas pa chos kyi spyod pa bcu la sogs pas 'da' bar byed par ston pa'o
column105: 'khor dag gi yang chos smra ba dang chos la gus pa'i bya ba ni sems can gang dag nas te gdan dang mchod pa'i tshogs gya nom pa dbul ba'o
column107: stan bar tshangs can ni lwa ba'i rigs khyad par can no
column109: snying po can ni nang tshangs can zlum po'o
column111: gzhan yang ras la sogs pa'i bla re mu tig gi 'phreng ba can la
column112: _tshon ris dang gser skud dang rin po che la sogs pa ci mdzes kyi bzo sna tshogs mthar phyin pas phyogs phyogs re rer cha mnyam pas yongs su bzung zhing spus pas bris shing*
column113: _me tog sna tshogs kyis kyang mtha' dang bar dang dbus su chung ngu dang 'bring dang rgyas par bkram pa dang gtor bar byas la 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang chos la gus pa dri ma med pas spos la sogs pa mchod pa ma lus pas kyang mchod par byed do
column115: longs spyod dngos ni de la byang chub sems dpa' nas te
column116: _chos la gus pa ni spyir ro
column118: de nyid yod pa la yid ches pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa la dang ba dang thob par nus pa la 'dod pa'i dad pas phye ba ni chos rnams _la _brten _pa _la sogs _pa'i tshig gsum mo
column120: lung 'bog pa _la sogs pas ni chos bsgrubs pas rdzogs par byed pa thams cad mtshon pa'o
column122: spyod pa'i byed pa ni sems can de dag nas te dman pa'i sa las 'das pa'o
column124: dge ba'i bshes gnyen de bsten par bskul ba ni rigs kyi bu khyod [- 459 -]      img. 490   from bdr:I1KG5853     nas so
column126: de la rab tu dang ba grub pa ni de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus nas te yun ring po nas bsgoms pa'i don grub pa'i thabs thob pa las bde ba dang yid bde ba chung 'bring gsum skyes pa ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i tshig drug go_
column127: de nas skyes bu dam pa de myur du mthong bas skom pa dpes sgrub pa ni 'di lta ste nas te
column128: _thos pa dang de'i 'bras bu sbyin pa'i dgos pa'i sgo nas so
column130: dge ba'i bshes gnyen des bzung ba'i phan yon gyi sgo thob pa ni lnga las de ma thag tu chos thos pa ni de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu sa phyogs nas te dpag tshad lnga brgya tsam gyis chod pa de nyid du
column131: _'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag gis bsam pa rnam par dag pa thob pas skal ldan du gyur pa las te bdag nyid chen po de ni rtag tu'ang rjes su 'dzin cing phan 'dogs par mdzad pa las mi g.yel ba kho na'o
column133: de'i don rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ni thos nas kyang nas te tshogs dam pa bsags pa dag gi chos nyan pa 'bras bu che bar 'thad pas so
column135: mi gnas pa'i 'du shes ni stong pa nyid du shes pa'o
column137: ting nge 'dzin 'di thams cad kyang chos thams cad bdag med pa'i yul can te
column138: _dang po bcu gnyis ni nges 'byed bzhi'i rtogs pa chung 'bring gsum gsum gyis phye ba'o
column140: lhag ma lnga bcu ni de dag nyid kyis bsgrubs pa 'jig rten ",1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml

column1: ex5032023-05-2517-15-55,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-15-55"">de dag kun gyi bshad sbyar mchog rnaMs kyi
column3: >dgongs pa rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa la
column5: bde blag 'jug pa'i<anchor xml:id=""a15""/> sgrol byed gzings gyur ba
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bla ma lo ts+tsha chen po</rs>'i gsung sgros rnaMs
column9: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""5""/>

column1: ji bzhin bzung ste <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">rang nyid</rs> dran phyir dang
column3: blo dman <lb n=""134b5""/> 'ga' la cung zad phan 'dod pas
column5: brjed byang 'di byas bsod naMs gang bsags des
column7: 'gro kun rgyal yum laM gyis myur 'dren shog
column9: </seg>

ex5032023-05-0309-26-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-0309-26-52"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4476"">rgyal ba'i yum bar ma le'u brgyad pa nyi khri lnga stong ba mdo' 'grel rnam par bshad pa</rs>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bla ma rje brtsun</rs> gyi gsung la dka' ba mang pos nan tan byas nas <lb n=""134b6""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shakya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas </rs>kyis rjed byang du bkod pa rdzogs s+ho
column4: </seg>

ex64012023-05-1211-22-49,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-22-49"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon klu grub</rs> kyi dongs pa 'grel pa la mi mthun pa du ma yod pa yin te
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon legs ldan 'byed</rs> lasogs pas slob dpon gyi thugs dngos pa rgyud du bkrel la
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon zla ba grags pa</rs> lasogs pas thal du bkrel <lb n=""1.3""/> lo

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon klu grub</rs> kyis 'thal 'gyur du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">zla ba grags pa</rs> la bkral la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">zla grags</rs> kyi thugs dgongs <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes lo tsa ba</rs>s <!--TODO =Nag tsho--> bkrel bas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--TODO =Nagarjuna-->slob dpon</rs> gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis la don rnams pa drug ste
column3: </seg>

column1: ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1215-05-46,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1215-05-46"">des don bsdus nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed person"" ref=""db:"">jo bo</rs>s kyang
column2: <quote source=""db:"" n=""7ab""><!--Satyadvayāvatāra, v.7ab: ma mthong ba nyid de mthong bar / / shin tu zab pa’i mdo las gsungs /.-->ma mthong bar nyid de mthong par
column4: shin rta zab pa'i mdo las gsungs</quote> zhes bshad do
column6: </seg> ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1211-29-45,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-29-45"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes</rs> kyi zhal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis don dam pa'i ngo bo bstan pa yin gsung
column2: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1211-29-47,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-29-47"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas bden pa gnyis ga'i ngo bo ston pa gsung</seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1214-29-53,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-29-53"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas dbang po gsal ba ste rab rib lasogs pas dbang po nyams par ma byas shing yul ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin pa dang
column2: de yang 'jig rten rnams kyis bden par byed pa de yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid <lb n=""4.10""/>du shes par bya ste
column4: de skad du yang <rs type=""work"">'jug pa</rs> las
column5: <quote source=""db:"" n=""6.25"">gnod pa myed pa'i dbang po drug rnams kyis

column1: bzung pa gang zhig 'jig rten gyis rtogs ste
'jig rten nyid las bden </quote>
zhes bshad pas de'i steng du 'jig rten bas bden par byed pa de yang dag kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin no gsung
column3: </seg>

column1: ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1211-39-51,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-39-51"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes</rs> kyi zhal nas yul can shes pa la yang dag log pa ni yod pa kun rdzob myed gsung ba la
column2: de'i rgyu mshan ni 'di yin no bya ba ni mi gsung skad do
column4: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1211-39-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-39-52"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas shes bya yul la yod na yul can shes pa la yang kun rdzob yod pa <lb n=""11.7""/> yin te rgyu mtshan la khyad par myed pa'i phyir dang
column2: gzhan yang
column3: <quote source=""db:"" n=""6.28a"">gti mug rang bzhin sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste</quote> zhes pa lasogs pa shes pa'i steng du kun rdzob kyi sgra'i don bshad pa byas nas
column4: yul can shes pa'i steng na yang dag dang log pa yod la kun rdzob myed zer ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no gsung
column6: </seg>

column1: ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1214-45-12,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-45-12"" status=""unreviewed""> de ltar 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob dang kun rdzob tsam po'i sgo nas phye ba de yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes pa</rs>'i rang dga' ma yin te <rs type=""work"">'jug pa</rs> las /
<quote source=""db:"" n=""6.28"">gti mug rang bzhin srib phyir kun rdzob ste
des gang bcos ma bden pa (for bar) snang de ni
column2: kun rdzob bden zhes thub pas de gsung te

column1: bcos mar gyur pa'i dngos ni kun rdzob tsam du'o</quote> zhes bshad do //</seg> ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1211-40-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-40-52"" status=""unreviewed"">yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin la
column2: nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pa las gzhan nyon mongs pa can ma <lb n=""12.3""/> yin pa'i ma rig pa de rab rib dang dmyigs ser lasogs pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad ni
column3: log pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin te zhes spyi thod du bstan kyang chog gsung ngo
column5: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1214-43-55,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-43-55"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar yin bas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column2: <quote source=""db:"" n=""SDA 4cd""><!--Satyadvayāvatāra, v. 4cd (Ejima 1983, p. 362): / cir yang ma grub chos nyid de / / gnyis dang gsum sog ga la ’gyur / / 4 / /.-->ci yang ma grub chos nyid la / gnyis dang gsum rtsogs ga la yod</quote> zhes bshad pa yin no
column4: </seg>

column1: ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1214-43-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-43-52"" status=""unreviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes lo tsa ba</rs>'i zhal nas mtshan gzhi dang mtshan <lb n=""12.9""/> nyid dngos po la yod pa bzhin du mtshon bya ba lang bya ba de yang bda'i rgyu mtshan mi 'dra ba myed pa dgag pa bya ba de rngos po la yod pa bzhed la /</seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1211-43-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-43-52"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slang pha ba</rs>s <!--TODO =khyung--> mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid rngos po la yod kyi mtshon bya ni rngos po la myed ste brtags par bzhed pa yin no
column3: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1212-06-26,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-06-26"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes</rs> kyi chos can mthun snang myed pa'i rigs pa gdu gdu ba ni chos can bya ba shes par 'dod pas khyad par du byas pa yin ba la rgol ba dngos por smra ba lasogs pa chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang rang bzhin myed par shes par 'dod pa yod kyang
column2: dbu ma bas snang ba rten 'brel 'di brdzun pa sgyu ma lta bu dang <lb n=""8.9""/> rang bzhin myed par rtogs zin pas shes 'dod myed pas chos can mthun snang myed do
column4: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1212-10-26,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-10-26"" status=""unreviewed"">de skad byas pa las <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">rang rgyud pa</rs> na re chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di tshad mas grub kyang don dam du thal ba'i nyes pa myed ste
column2: tha snyad pa'i tshad mas grub kyang chos can kyang snang ba rten 'brel 'di cig dang du <lb n=""9.2""/> bral lasogs pa rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zer na
column3: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1212-15-57,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-15-57"" status=""unreviewed"">'o na thal 'gyur gnyis po 'di la thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid yod dam myed
column2: khyad par so so'i mtshan nyid gang yin zer na

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">rngog</rs> gi zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan <lb n=""9.8""/> nyid myed pa yin gsung
column2: <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slang ba</rs>'i</abbr> zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid ni
column3: tshul ci rigs su khas blangs pa yin gsung
column4: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1212-15-59,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-15-59"" status=""unreviewed"">khyad par so so'i mtshan nyid la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams</rs> kyi zhal nas khyab pa dngos po la gnas shing phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa de yin no zer ba la
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">rngog</rs> gi zhal nas sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur bya ba bzlog pa rang rgyud dang 'brel ba yin <lb n=""9.9""/> pa la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams</rs> kyi de bzlog pa dang ma 'brel bas <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>bsgrub pa'i thabs 'gyur<?oxy_comment_end?> gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos po la gnas pa phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa skabs su bab pa'i dam bca la tshad ma'i bsal ba byung ba la bzhed do
column4: </seg>

column1: ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1212-18-59,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-18-59"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slang pa ba</rs>'i zhal nas <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>gyi mtshan nyid ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">sngon gyi bshad pa mkhan po rnams</rs> kyi des chog pa yin te
column2: bsgrub pa'i thal <lb n=""9.10""/><?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?> gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>du 'dug pa tsam gyis bzlog pa rang rgyud 'phen pa'i nges pa myed ste
column3: bzlog pa dang 'brel bya ba de bzlog pa 'phen pa'i nus pa yod byas pa yin myi
column4: gyi nus pa yod pa tsam gyis bzlog pa 'phen pa'i * myed pa ste
column5: dper na sa bon skya bo la my gu skyed ming nus pa yod kyang nus pa yod pa tsam gyis ci'i kyang mas kyang my gu skyed pa'i nges pa myed pa bzhin no gsung

column1: gnyis pa <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>sun 'byin pa'i thal <?oxy_comment_end?><lb n=""10.1""/> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>'gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos la gnas rung mi gnas rung phyogs khas blangs su 'dug pa yin no zer ro
column3: </seg>

column1: ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

ex64012023-05-1212-20-59,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-20-59"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">pa tshab</rs> kyi zhal nas bsgrub pa'i thabs thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum rgol bas zhe bas 'dod pa yin la
column2: sun 'byin pa'i thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid thal 'gyur de'i gtan tshigs khas blangs sam khas blangs kyi mthar thug pa yin no gsung
column4: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1212-26-07,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-26-07"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">kha cig</rs> na re khyed thal 'gyur ba la yongs cos sgrub pa'i dam bca myed pas de sgrub par byed pas gtan tshigs lasogs pa tshad mas grub pa mi dgos pa bden khongs su gzhug gi
column2: rnam dpyad dgag pa'i dam bca yod dam myed
column3: yod na de sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshgis brjod dgos la
column4: de ni de 'gal ba rjod pa'i thal 'gyur lasogs <lb n=""13.8""/> pa brjod pa dgos pa ci yod zhe na zer ro
column6: </seg>",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column1: ex64012023-05-1215-00-57,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1215-00-57"" status=""unreviewed"">yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">jo bo</rs>s gsungs pa bzhin du ye shes phyed chad bya ba yin te shes bya cir yang ma grub pa la ye shes kyis ci <lb n=""16.8""/> yang mi rtog pa ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni yod la
column2: ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba dang bcas pa ni myed pa yin no bya ba gsung
column3: </seg> ",3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

column5: <?oxy_comment_start comment=""*""?><?oxy_comment_end?> gnyen 'od zer seng ge</rs>s shog gu yang phul nas snar ********** <lb n=""61b6""/> kyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733"">dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho

column5: ya gyal rtags kyi rjes 'gro'i [\[p.92-9\]43b9]khyab pa de ni rtags chos can de dang bsgrub bya'i chos yod tu mtshungs pa nyid la yang yod par nges pa'o

column1: ex87012023-10-04-131522,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87012023-10-04-131522"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""151b7""/>bdag nyid chen po'i gzhung don ji bzhin 'chad pas gzhan gyi the tshom gcod
column3: rang rgyud thal 'gyur gtan tshigs rnam par dag pas nus pa shin du che
column5: tshig don legs par 'phrod cing snga phyi 'brel pas 'jug ngogs shin du bde'
column7: de ltar chos gsum tshang ba legs par bshad pa bstan pa'i 'od zer yin
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">mi 'pham mgon</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">klu las (em: la) dbang bsgyur</rs> dang
column11: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3771"">phyogs <lb n=""151b8""/> las rgyal</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773""><rs type=""work"">rnam 'grel</rs> mdzad pa</rs> ste
column13: kun kyi legs bshad 'dzin pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">chu mig pa</rs>s
column15: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">chen po'i pho brang dge ba'i gnas</rs> su sbyar
column17: legs bshad bstan pa'i 'od zer kun du 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad kyang
column19: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mun pa stug po rab bcom ste
column21: ji ltar ji snyed shes bya'i don kun <pb n=""152a""/><lb n=""152a1""/> blo yi mig gis legs mthong nas
column23: spangs dang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin byang chub chen po'i go 'phang thob par shog
column25: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs can</rs> 'dir 'ongs gzhung [*] lugs 'di 'chad 'di yi don
column27: legs par bshad dang ma bshad log <lb n=""152a2""/> par bshad pa'i don
column29: thams cad len 'chad 'dor la 'gal zlos med phyir 'di
column31: blo ldan legs bshad don gnyer kun gyis blang bar rigs
column33: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">dpal ldan grags pa</rs>'i gzhung don blta bar 'dod pa gzhan gyi blo
column35: sprin tshogs stug pos bsgribs pa'i mkha' la nyi ma blta ba bzhin
column36: <lb n=""152a3""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">bdag</rs> gi blo gros dri ma med pa nam mkh'yangs pa'i dbus
column38: rnam par nges don (nyi ma)'i dkyil 'khor skyon med rab tu gsal

column1: ",3_087_01_Chu_PVin commentary.xml

ex87012023-03-0911-03-47,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87012023-03-0911-03-47"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4023"">rgya shes rab dbang phyug</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4022"">'jang shag kya dpal</rs> <lb n=""152a4""/> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4020"">rkyel grags pa seng ge</rs> las sogs pa chen po rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs te mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin pa'i don dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">slob dpon chos mchog </rs>gis mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5594"">ti ka 'thad ldan</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5597""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5551"">kha che dz+nya na shri</rs>'i ti ka</rs> lasogs pa mthong ba'i don
column4: bsams <lb n=""152a5""/> pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis legs par gtan la phab pa'i don ston par byed pa
column5: blo la zin pa tsam gyis mkhas pa'i mchog du 'gyur zhing mkhas pa rtag tu mi nyams par byed pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5290"">ti ka chen po</rs> 'di
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">shag kya'i dge slong gtsang chu mig pa seng ge dpal</rs> gyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag <lb n=""152a6""/> khang</rs> du brtsams te <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5595""><choice><orig>ya°</orig><reg>yar</reg></choice> lungs</rs> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5596"">khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o
column8: rdzogs s+ho

column1: ex38042023-09-18-114223,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex38042023-09-18-114223"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><pb n=""[52b6""/> sngon chad shes bya'i gnas la <pb n=""[52b7]""/> sbyangs pa dang
column3: lhag pa'i lha'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang
column5: bshes [g]nyen dam pas rjes_su bzung ba'i mthus
column7: shes bya phal cher 'bad pa chung dus shes
column9: <rs type=""work"">bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i legs</rs> <pb n=""[53a1]""/> <rs type=""work"">bshad khyad par gsum ldan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column10: dang por <rs type=""person"" ana="""">'jam pa'i dbyangs dkon mchog rin chen<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> </rs>gyis <note type=""gloss"">bka' drin gyis</note> legs par bskyangs shing: bar du <rs type=""person"" ana="""">mkhas pa'i dbang po gzhon_nu rgyal mchog</rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa'i gsung gi smin <pb n=""[53a2]""/> [p]ar byas te: mthar rnam dpyod kyis <abbr>blo gros</abbr> rtsa bshad kyi lung 'grel pa dang bcas <abbr>rnam par</abbr> dpyad pa la [b]rten nas: dgag bsgrub [sgrub] kyi [b]slab pa'i gnas la <abbr>blo gros</abbr> kyi snang ba rgyas pa: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">shes rab rgya mtsho</rs>s  <rs type=""place"">mnga' ris</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana="""">pa'i sde snod 'dzin pa</rs> <pb n=""[52a3]""/> <rs type=""person"" ana="""">chen po dkon mchog bzang po<anchor xml:id=""a2""/></rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pas bskul ba'i ngor: <hi rendition=""#Time"">lcags mo phag_gi lo</hi>: <hi rendition=""#Time"">smal po'i zla ba'i bzang po'i tshes</hi> <anchor xml:id=""a3""/>la: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal snar thang gi chos sde</rs>r rdzogs par sbyar ba'o
column12: dge'o
column14: </seg>

column1: ex46052024-09-1216-47-23,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex46052024-09-1216-47-23"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba chen po</rs>  ni rtags kyi 'brel pa'i rtsa ba ** gshis la rten pa dang khas blangs la rten pa ** stobs don sgrub du myur pa dang tha snyad du bsgrub pa <lb n=""22a1""/> 2 phyi ma * rtags yin la khas blangs la rten pa ni yid ches su bzhed do gzhung gi thig 'chad pa la gnyis thun mong gi mtshan nyid dang po'i lugs rnam par bzhag pa'i dnag po ni bdag gaM nas yin te bar ma rang tshig smra ba'i rgol ba bdag dang gzhan bstan bcos <lb n=""22a2""/> mkhan chen na_s tshad mar khas len pas te yid ches su bzung bya yin te khyod bstan bya'i don gyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i sgo nas ngag 'jug par 'dod</seg>",2_046_05_rnam nges grel.xml

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs> ltar na <quote xml:id=""d2e1624"">tad yā tha</quote> zhes pa ni 'di lta ste bya ba yin la
column2: <quote xml:id=""d2e1627"">gha te gha te</quote> bya ba ni song 1 song 1 bya ba yin pas tshogs laM sbyor laM du song 1 bya ba yin la
column4: <quote xml:id=""d2e1630"">pa ra gha te </quote>zhes bya ba ni <lb n=""6a5""/> pha rol du song 1 bya ba yin pas mthong laM du song 1 bya ba yin la
column5: <quote xml:id=""d2e1636"">pa ra gha te</quote> zhes bya ba ni yang dag par song 1 bya ba yin pas
column6: sgoMs laM du song 1 bya ba yin la

column1: ex3032023-07-1009-26-08,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex3032023-07-1009-26-08"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4459""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bla ma rje btsun <lb n=""24b4""/> dam pa <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4332"">gsang phu</rs> lo tsha<anchor xml:id=""a51""/> ba chen po</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog blo ldan shes rab</rs></note> la bstod pa'i tshig le'ur<anchor xml:id=""a52""/> byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa</rs>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shAkya'i<anchor xml:id=""a53""/> dge slong <note type=""gloss"">gro lung pa chen po</note> blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyis sbyar ba <lb n=""24b5""/> rdzogs s+ho

column1: ",1_003_03_Gro_rngog lo rnam thar.xml

ex3032023-07-1009-32-56,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex3032023-07-1009-32-56"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">bdag nyid chen po thugs legs par sbyangs pa'i me long yongs su dag <lb n=""24b6""/> par<anchor xml:id=""a55""/> legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis rnam par sbyar ba'i gtsug lag gi tshogs mtha' yas pa kun du snang bas <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs ri 'i khrod</rs> na gnas <lb n=""24b7""/> pa'i blo'i mig<anchor xml:id=""a56""/> yongs su dag pa'i skye bo rnams la kun du<anchor xml:id=""a57""/> ston par mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4459""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">skad 2 smra ba chen po blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyi rnam par thar pa</rs>
column2: <anchor xml:id=""a58""/> de nyid <lb n=""24b8""/> kyi sras kyi thu bo sdom brtson  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">sde snod 'dzin pa chen po <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">gro lung pa</rs></note>blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> shes<anchor xml:id=""a59""/> bya bas rnam par spel ba yod do zhes<anchor xml:id=""a60""/> lung rin po che'i tshogs <lb n=""25a1""/>kyis rnam par phyug pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4136""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> dge ba'i bshes gnyen<note type=""gloss""> chag </note>nyi ma</rs>'i gsung las <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5838"">dge slong 'phags pa</rs>s gsal bar thos nas
column3: <anchor xml:id=""a61""/> gtam gyi skyes rmad <lb n=""25a2""/> du byung ba de<anchor xml:id=""a62""/> lta bu rna ba'i snod du nye bar lhung na ci ma rung snyam du bsams nas
column4: <anchor xml:id=""a63""/> ring du 'gro ba'i pho nya dag la nye bar 'gugs pa'i spying yig rnam <lb n=""25a3""/> par springs pa'i don
column5: <anchor xml:id=""a64""/> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4387"">dpal rte'u ra'i gtsug lag khang</rs> na gnas pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams</rs> kyis bsgrubs pa 'di <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5838"">bdag</rs> gi sug tu <lb n=""25a4""/> thengs<anchor xml:id=""a65""/> nas
column6: <anchor xml:id=""a66""/> lcags pho<anchor xml:id=""a67""/> rta'i<anchor xml:id=""a68""/> lo zla ba gcig pa la shin du<anchor xml:id=""a69""/> dag par byas pa'o
column8: dge'o
column10: </seg>",1_003_03_Gro_rngog lo rnam thar.xml

column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5550"">shan ti pa</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na</note> dang po la lnga ste
column3: 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i rtags dgod pa dang
column4: don las don dang 'dra ba skye ba dang ¦ don yang ming <lb n=""2a5""/> 'brel pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa dang ¦ ming 'dzin <note type=""gloss"">ming snang pa tsaM gyi spyi rigs</note> pa la don dang 'brel <note type=""gloss"">par snang</note> pas khyab pa<note type=""gloss"">s rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ming snang yang <abbr>gsum</abbr> gyis </note>ming don <note type=""gloss"">dang</note> ma 'brel bas don las skye bas <note type=""gloss"">skye basskyes pa la</note><!--TODO check arrow-->ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang
column5: shugs la grub pa <choice><orig>yul la{°}</orig><reg>yul la</reg></choice> ltos pa'i sbyor ba dang ¦ dngos su bstan pa yul can la ltos pa'i sbyor ba <abbr>gnyis kyis</abbr> skabs kyi don bsdu ba dang
column6: sgra don bdag cig kyang don las skye ba la ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang
column7: zhar la rnaM rtog srid pa'i yul yid kyi rnaM shes yin pa'o</seg>

<note type=""gloss"">'di rtag pa rang rgyud du byed kyang rgyas thal gyur du byas so</note>'dod pa ma gnod pa'i thal 'gyur bstan pa dang
column2: brjod pa snang pa brda dran pa la ltos pas 'bras bu'i rtsa ba'i thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang
column3: 'dod pa la gnod <pb n=""2b""/><lb n=""2b1""/> thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang
column4: de'i 'dod pa la gnod pa'i thal ba dang
column5: bzlog pa'i rtags kyis rtsa ba'i sgrub bya sgrub pa'o

column1: exX052023-01-3015-21-54,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX052023-01-3015-21-54"" status=""reviewed""> lnga pa <rs type=""school"">nyan thos sde pa</rs> dang <rs type=""school"">sems tsam pa</rs> rgyu 'bras kyi 'brel pa 'dod pa 'gog pa ni <quote source=""db:4214"" n=""v. 7"">rgyu dang 'bras bu'i </quote>zhes pas <pb n=""2a""/><lb n=""2a1""/> de gnyis dus mnyam du 'gog la
column2: <quote source=""db:4214"" n=""v. 8"">rim gyis <!--SP 8 D: rim las; SPĀ D: rim gyis--></quote> zhes pas snga phyi gnyis gcig la gnas pa'i 'brel ba 'gog ste
column3: 'di ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bod</rs> kyang <lb n=""2a2""/> 'dod do
column5: </seg>",X_005_Ral gri_brel brtag rgyan me tog_corrected.xml

column1: exX52023-01-3015-25-48,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX52023-01-3015-25-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""> bshad <lb n=""4a2""/> pa de dag phal cher ni <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5567"">rang 'grel</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5534"">slob dpon dul lha</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5568"">'grel bshad</rs> bzhin <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">bdag</rs> gis bris so

column1: exX52023-01-3015-35-34,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX52023-01-3015-35-34"" status=""reviewed""> don 'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">bram ze shaM kar <lb n=""4a3""/> nan ta</rs>

<quote source=""db:5569"" n=""D22a5-6"">'brel pa bkag pas bdag med gnyis bsgrubs par bshad de 'brel pa med na byed pa po'i bdag dang bzung 'dzin med <lb n=""4a4""/> pas chos kyi bdag med bshad</quote><!--not a literal citation of SPA. D reads: de'i phyir 'brel pa med pa na gang zag gi bdag med pa sgrub po//de bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid tsam la gnas pa gzhan gyi dbang nyid dang gzhan dang sbyor ba dang / ltos pa nyid la sogs pa med pa na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa ni chos kyi bdag med pa yin no//--> ces zer ro
column3: </seg>

snying po len pa'i thabs kyi mchog gyur pa
byang chub sems gnyis spyod tshul lung rigs la
brten nas <lb n=""81a4""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4221"">kyi ston 'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> kyis bshad
dge ba 'di yis 'gro kun sems bskyed de
byang chub spyod pa'i tshul la legs zhugs pas
tshogs gnyis rgyu chen rgya mtsho'i mthar son nas
column3: sku gsum nor bu'i dpal la spyod par shog
column5: </seg>",3_066_04_skyi ston grags pa rgyal mtshan_BCA comm_etext.xml

column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3977""> byang chub <lb n=""81a5""/> sems dpa' chen po 'phyims nam mkha' grags</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""P1060""?><?oxy_comment_end?> yab sras kyi byin bslab ° zhugs pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4221"">skyi ston 'jam pa'i dbyangs grags pa rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis 'grel pa<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhan po </rs>lnga dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">gtsang pa</rs> lasogs pa'i legs bshad rnams blangs
column3: nyes bshad rnams dor nas
column4: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733"">dpal ldan <abbr>sa skya</abbr>'i gtsug lag chen po</rs>r sbyar ba'o
column6: </seg>
