column1: ex1301_20072023-06-281,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_20072023-06-281"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">

tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ṭi ka legs bshad bsdus pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> gtsang nag pa</rs>s mdzad pa <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr>

i <unclear>dra sa</unclear> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4551"">SHakya b+hikSHu ku ma ra SHrI</rs> pustaM <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">pra ma Na bi ni <choice><reg>SH+ca</reg><orig>(SH+ca/s+tsa)</orig></choice> ya sya</rs> TI ka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">A tsarya virya sing ha sya</rs> kA ra:
column3: <note type=""editorial"">Skt: idam? śākyabhikṣu-kumāra-śrī pustaṃ pramāṇaviniścayasya ṭīkā ācārya-vīryasiṃhasya kārāḥ. Kumāraśrī (=Tib. gzhon nu dpal) could possibly be 'Gos lo tsA ba bZhon nu dpal.</note></seg>",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

column1: ex1301_10152023-06-283,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10152023-06-283"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus <choice><reg>pa</reg><orig>pa'</orig></choice></rs> zhes bya ba
column2: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex1301_1282023-4,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-4"" status=""reviewed"">rgyal mtshungs <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma rnams</rs> la phyag 'tshal lo
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex13012023-07-2008-36-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13012023-07-2008-36-52"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""deity"">ston pa</rs>'i gsung don nges byed rigs pa'i tshul
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">rnam nges</rs> mdzad pa</rs> de 'dir rgyal gyur cig
column5: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml
ex1301_10202023-06-285,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10202023-06-285"" status=""reviewed"">de dag rjes <lb n=""1b4""/> zhugs dpyad la ltos myed par
column3: rnam 'jig sdud dang gzhung don gsal byed pas
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">ston de</rs>'i dgongs pa bde blag nges 'gyur ba'i
column7: <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">legs bshad bsdus pa'i ti ka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">bdag </rs>gis bya
column9: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex1301_10252023-06-286,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10252023-06-286"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rnam par nges <choice><reg>pa</reg><orig>pa'</orig></choice></rs> ni lus lta bu'i bstan bcos bar ma ste
column2: gzhung cung zad bsdus pas tshad ma nyid kyi lus tshang par gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro
column4: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex1301_10292023-06-287,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10292023-06-287"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">gzhung 'di </rs> ni rtsom pa la 'jug pa klad kyi don dang
column2: brtsam par bya ba skabs kyi don dang
column3: mthar phyin pa 'jug gi don gsum gyis nges par bya ba las
column4: </seg>",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

column1: ex1301_1282023-06-288,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-288"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:mtshan_nyid"">de la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa dag </rs>mtshan nyid kyi skyon mtshon bya la ltos te mi srid pa dang ma khyab khyab ches gsum las myed par sems pa de dag ni khyab mnyam pa'i don ldog gzhan pa dang rang ldog rdzas su ma grub pa skyon du bsgrub pas <lb n=""11a2""/> gnod par lta'o
column3: </seg>",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

column1: ex87032023-06-2912-23-02,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-06-2912-23-02"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:snang_la_ma_nges_pa"">de la snang la ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid ni

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4265"">kha cig</rs><note type=""editorial"">An annotation in the manuscript of mTshur ston's Tshad ma shes rab sgron ma identifies the proponent as ""rtag pa,"" which we understand to refer to sTag. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 21, n. 30</note> snang yang nges pa 'dren mi nus pa zhes zer ba ni 'dir blo rnams yul cig la ltos nas <lb n=""22b8""/> tha dad par 'jog pa yin no
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex1301_1282023-06-06,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-06"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rab pa pa</rs>'i 'dod pa rjes su brjod pa dang
column2: sgrub bya sgrub byed kyi don nyid ngos gzung pa dang
column3: de rang gi gzhung lugs smra ba rnams la sbyar ba'o

column1: </seg>
",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex1301_1223023-06-289,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1223023-06-289"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">chen po dag </rs>ni sgrub pa 'brel pa gnyis la rten pas dbye ba'i tshul ci 'dra ba myed pas sam
column2: mi dmigs pa'i sgrub bya med dgag la dbye' ba myed pa sam
column3: dbye bsdu' byas kyang gsum gyi grangs <pb n=""110a""/><lb n=""110a1""/> nges la gnod pa myed te mngon sum bzhir phye bas tshad ma'i grangs nges la mi gnod pa bzhin no zhes zer ro
column5: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex1301_12292023-06-2810,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_12292023-06-2810"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3839"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kho bo cag</rs> rtags mi 'khrul pa'i spyi khyab de nyid la 'brel par brjod pa'i yang phyir ro
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml
ex1301_1282023-06-2822,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2822"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni thal 'gyur dang bzlog pa'i rang rgyud la rtogs pa cig pa'i tshul drug las
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""1""/>re shig thal ba'i phyogs chos khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: <choice><corr>du ba</corr><sic>du ma</sic></choice> 'gog pa'i rgyu <lb n=""160b3""/> mi dmyigs pa'i thal ba dang me bsgrub pa'i 'bras rtags kyi rang rgyud kyi dbang du byas te la la me myed du log pas smra na gnyis ka tshang la me tshad mas grub na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""2""/> thal ba'i bsal pa dang bzlog pa'i rtags gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: la la du ba mthong na gnyis ka la tshang la ma mthong <lb n=""160b4""/> na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""3""/>
thal ba dang bzlog pa'i khyab pa gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: thal ba'i khyab pa me myed du <choice><corr>med</corr><sic>me</sic> </choice>kho na la yod par bsgrub na du yod la me myed <choice><corr>med</corr><sic>me myed</sic></choice> pas du yod la mye <choice><corr>yod</corr><sic>myed</sic></choice> pa rang rgyud kyi khyab pa grub cing<anchor xml:id=""a36""/>
column3: rang rgyud kyi khyab pa {<hi rendition=""#i #u"">du yod</hi> (Ms om.)} <mentioned>me yod kho na la yod pa</mentioned> grub na yang <mentioned>me myed la myed pa</mentioned>s 160b5 <mentioned>me myed la du ba myed pa</mentioned> thal ba'i khyab pa grub pas<anchor xml:id=""a37""/> tshang par gcig pa'i phyir dang
column4: <mentioned>la la tsan dan gyi me myed pas du med du thal ba</mentioned>r brjod na thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyis ka'i khyab pa sha pa'i mer zhig pas ma tshang par gcig pa'i phyir ro

column1: de la phyogs chos dang shes 'dod ma tshang pa ni me mthong pa'i tshang bang du bkod na 'byung zhing <lb n=""160b6""/> bsal ba dang gtan tshigs ma tshang pa ni du ba ma mthong pa'i rgya mtshor bkod na 'byung la
khyab pa gnyis ma tshang pa ni me mthong yang tsan dan gyi me myed par rtogs pa'i la la bkod 'byung pas ma tshang pa'i skyon drug ni gzhi gsum la 'byung pa yin no

la la du ba mthong yang me myed du rtog pas me myed la du med du thal ba<lb n=""160b7""/> brjod na tshang pa'i yon tan drug gzhi cig la 'du bas thal ba yon tan drug ldan gyis rang rgyud chos drug ldan 'phel ba nyid do zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa</rs>'i rnam pa gzhag pa'o
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex1301_1282023-06-2823,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2823"" status=""reviewed"">de la yang khas blangs <lb n=""182b3""/> dang rang tshig gis bsal pa gnyis kyi khyad par ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa dag</rs> yid ches pa'i gang zag gzhan gyi tshig dang rgol ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba la 'jog go
column3: </seg>

column1: ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

ex1301_1282023-06-0633,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-0633"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""><!--These are predecessors of dharmakirti-->snga rabs pa'i lugs</rs> 'chad pa na yid ches pa'i gang zag dang de'i tshig don gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu'i rtags kyis bzlog pa sel pa gsum <lb n=""183b6""/> <quote xml:id=""d2e14307"">bdag gam</quote> zhes dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14310"">de'i</quote> zhes dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14313"">rang gi</quote> (P294b43) zhes pa ste
column2: bdag dang gzhan ni rang tshig dang khas blangs kyi gang zag yin pas nus pa yang <quote xml:id=""d2e14316"">gegs sam gnod par byed do</quote> zhes sbyar ro
column4: </seg> ",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

column1: ex1301_1282023-06-28245,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-28245"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">lung <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du tshad ma yid ma yin nam ces pa'i lan du lung tshad ma bsam par bshad zin to ces bya ste
column2: bshad pa <abbr>slob dpon</abbr> <lb n=""184b3""/> gyis yin kyang snga rabs pa pa</rs>s<!--These are predecessors of Dharmakirti--> de ltar 'dod par dgongs pa'o
column4: </seg>",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

column1: ex1301_1282023-06-2825,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2825"" status=""unreviewed"">gzhi' lung gis grub pa la ltos pa dang
column2: mi ltos pa'i dbye' ba <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa'</rs>i lugs brjod pa dang khyad par myed pa rang gi lugs gnyis <quote xml:id=""d2e14495"">gzhung lugs</quote> ces dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14498"">'di la yang</quote> (<?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>P296b1<?oxy_comment_end?>) ces pa'o
column4: </seg>",1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml

column1: ex1301_1232023-06-282,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1232023-06-282"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus <lb n=""210a4""/>pa</rs> zhes bya ba
column3: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3839"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>s sbyar pa'o
column5: rdzogs s+ho
column7: i thi

column1: ex38032023-09-181,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex38032023-09-181"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""[102a4]""/> <rs type=""person"" ana="""">dgra bcom pa chen po sa ga'i lha</rs>s <?oxy_comment_start comment=""Visakhadeva, P7673""?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id=""a1""/> mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"">'dul ba'i bstan bcos me tog phreng rgyud kyi TI ka bla ma'i legs bshad rgya cher bshad pa legs bshad rgya mtsho</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana="""">bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa dka' bzhi pa shes rab seng ge</rs>'i <?oxy_comment_start comment=""sNar thang pa
column2: rGyud smad Shes rab seng ge, P2093""?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id=""a2""/> gsung la [b]rten nas <rs type=""person"" ana="""">mang du thos pa bsaM [102a5] gtan bzang po</rs>s rnam g.yengs spang te <rs type=""person"" ana="""">ston pa </rs>myang ngan las 'das nas <hi rendition=""#Time"">lo sum stong bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa'i dus</hi> su
column3: <hi rendition=""#Time"">gdong ngan gyi lo sa ga'i dkar phyogs tshes brgyad<anchor xml:id=""a3""/> </hi>la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs>r rdzogs par sbyar ba'o
column5: 'di la brten nas sems cad thams cad kyis blang dor gyi gnas rtogs nas

column7: </seg>",2_038_03_ bSam gtan bzang po_me tog phreng rgyud kyi TIk+ka legs bshad rgya mtsho.xml

column1: ex27012023-09-181,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex27012023-09-181"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""[149a3]""/> <rs type=""work"">man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa bcud kyi thig le</rs> zhes bya lung dang rigs pa la rtogs pa'i snang ba rgyas par gyur cing
column2: bslab pa gsum gyi rgyan gyis mdzes pa
column3: rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyi nang na smra ba'i glang po dam par gyur pa <rs type=""person"" ana="""">slob dpon shes rab</rs> zhes bya ba dang
column4: theg pa mchog gi sgor zhugs cing brtul zhugs kyi khur bzung nas <rs type=""place"" ana=""copusmd:namad_reference"" ref=""db:5908"">dben <lb n=""[149a4]""/>pa'i gnas</rs> su sgrub pa'i snying por mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3912"">slob dpon tshul khrims skyabs</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul la reg pa mang du thos pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""copusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3911"">dge slong gzhon nu rin chen</rs> zhes bya bas legs par sbyar ba
column5: rdzogs s+ho
column8: bkra shis so
column12: </seg>",1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml

column1: ex50182024-09-161,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50182024-09-161"" status=""unreviewed"">lung dang mngon par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan zhing
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3975"">kha mo ze'u zhes grags pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chu mig <lb n=""1b3""/>pa chen po de</rs> .
column3: dpal rdza ra'i sa'i char ze'u'i rgyud du 'khrungs
column4: dgung lo bco brgyad la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">dge bshes 'bre shes rab 'bar</rs> la mkhan po zhus nas rab du byon te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">dge bshes khyung <lb n=""1b4""/>rin chen grags</rs> la dbu tshad dang spyod phyogs brlabs shing zhar chos <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4206"">stag</rs><anchor xml:id=""a1""/> gnyis la gsan skad
column5: de nas mkhan po la pha rol du phyin pa lo drug gnan te mdo 'grel dang bcas pa <lb n=""1b5""/>mtha' dag par mkhyen
column6: </seg>",2_050_18_chu mig pa chen poi rnam thar.xml

column1: ",1_001_13_C_NI_rNgog_PVin dka' gnas.xml
ex11320240828_1,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex11320240828_1"" status=""unreviewed"">don gyi de nyid dpyad pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5557"">slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5629"">zhi ba bzang po</rs> la sogs pa na re
column4: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni
column5: shes pa las gzhan ma yin te
column6: rang rig rig par bya ba'i phyir ro
column8: de la phyogs chos ni nyams su myong bas nges so
column10: khyab pa yang rig par bya ba 'gal ba la ni rig par byed pa yang 'gal bas khyab ste
column11: des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin no
column13: 'di ltar sngon po rang gi rang bzhin rig pa nyid kyis rig na de rang gi rang bzhin kho na'o
column15: byed pa gzhan gyis rig na ni rig pa yang gzhan kho na'o
column17: des na rig par bya pa tha dad pa la rig par byed pa tha dad pas khyab pas khyad par nges so zhe'o
column19: </seg> ",1_001_13_C_NI_rNgog_PVin dka' gnas.xml

column1: ex1132023-07-2114-52-30,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1132023-07-2114-52-30"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4445"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i dka' ba'i gnas rnam par bshad pa</rs>
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba shag kya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o
column8: </seg>",1_001_13_C_NI_rNgog_PVin dka' gnas.xml

column1: ex1132023-10-181,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1132023-10-181"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6035"">shag kya'i dge slong 'dar rin chen 'bar</rs> gyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos so
column10: </seg>",1_001_13_C_NI_rNgog_PVin dka' gnas.xml

column1: ex45022024-09-1110-23-42,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022024-09-1110-23-42"" status=""unreviewed"">yul de la rang las nges kyi tshad ma<?oxy_comment_end?>'i mtshan nyid : yul de la tshad ma yin par rang stobs kyi nges shes de ma thag tu 'dren pa'i tshad ma.mtshan gzhi ni : <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">don rig 2 dang rang rig dang ; rjes su dpag pa rang las nges</quote> (RT VIII 64ab)zhes pa dang <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">don byed pa dang goms pa can
column2: rjes su dpag pas nges par byed
column3: </quote> (RT VIII 65ab) zhes <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs <lb n=""3a6""/>gter</rs> las bshad pa dang
column4: rnal 'byor mngon sum yang yin no
column6: </seg>",2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml

column1: ex45022024-09-1110-23-422,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022024-09-1110-23-422"" status=""unreviewed"">yul de la gzhan las nges kyi tshad ma'i mtshan nyid : yul de la tshad ma yin cing yul de la tshad ma yin par rang stobs kyi nges shes de ma thag tu 'dren pa ma yin pa :
mtshan gzhi ni : <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> las : <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">dang po ba dang yid ma gtad
column3: 'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan la nges
column4: </quote> (RT VIII.64cd)zhes so
column6: </seg>",2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml

column1: ex45022023-09-19,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022023-09-19"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (9a5--9a6)]""/>

las dang po pa la nye bar mkho ba <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4773"">tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa rigs pa'i sgo 'byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni          <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5911"">mdar btsun pa rin chen bzang po</rs>s yang dang yang du bskul ba'i ngor dang ¦ gzhan yang shes ldan 'ga' res bskul <abbr>ba'i phyir </abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5910"">shakya'i <lb n=""9a6""/>btsun pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan</rs> gis go bde <abbr>ba'i phyir</abbr> du lung dang ri<abbr>gs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> sgo nas dgag gzhag dang skyon gyi gcod tshul phra mo rnaMs re shig bzhag nas ding sang gi <abbr>rtog ge</abbr> pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyi brda cha‹d› dang mthun par <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5697"">dben gnas brag dkar</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho
column3: </seg>",2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml

column1: ex75022023-09-281,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex75022023-09-281"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: </seg>

column1: ex75022023-09-282,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex75022023-09-282"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (41b4-8)]""/>
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5200"">shes rab (don?) kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nyaMs len snying po rab gsal</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dpal ldan bla ma daM pa</rs>'i gsung la snon 'khrid ma byas par
column3: nyaMs su len bde bar bya ba'i phyir
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--TODO person ID in APIS-->rdo rje 'dzin pa naM mkha['] rin [chen] chos</rs> kyis bka'i bskul ba'i ngor
column5: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5707"">'khyog dgon pa</rs>r <hi rendition=""#Time"">chu pho spre'u'i lo bden bzhi'i chos 'khod skor ba'i dus chen kyi nyin</hi>
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4077"">[b]sod nams dpal bzang</rs> gis sbyar ba'i
column7: yi ge pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5201"">btan(gtan) bsal bdag</rs> gi[s] dgyis
column8: 'di bzhengs dge bas 'gro drug seMs can rnaMs
column9: shes rab yuM kyis dbyings_su skyes nas kyang
column10: seMs can <abbr>thams cad</abbr> bde ba la 'god par shog
column11: dge zhing bkra shis par gyur cig

column3: </seg>

column1: ",4_094_03_lce sgom rdzong pa shes rab rdo rje_Po to baI rnam thar.xml

ex14022023-10-11-105324,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022023-10-11-105324"" status=""reviewed"">phyi<lb n=""1a2""/> tsha<lb n=""1a3""/> 103<lb n=""1a4""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4575""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">mngon rtogs rgyan</rs> gyi 'grel bshad 'thad pa'i <lb n=""1a5""/>'od 'bar</rs></seg>
",1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml
ex1142-10502023-08-22,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1142-10502023-08-22"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4575""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> ces <lb n=""185a3""/>bya ba'i 'grel bshad 'thad pa'i 'od 'bar</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: shes bya'i nam mkha' la blo gros kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing
column3: legs smra'i 'od kyis phas rgol mun pa'i smag rum sel bar byed pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3884"">shAkya'i dge slong rigs par <lb n=""185a4""/>smra ba shes rab 'od zer</rs> gyis sbyar ba rdzogs so
column7: dag cing snyoms pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">shes rab 'bum</rs> gyis bris
column8: dge'o
column12: </seg>

column1: ",1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml
ex87032023-03-0311-43-41,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-43-41"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5292"">tshad ma shes rab sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba
column5: </seg> ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-2810-35-31,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-2810-35-31"" status=""reviewed"">de dag ni gzhan bsal nas nges pa'i blo gzhan sel zhes bya ba yin la
column2: de bzhin du don gzhan bsal nas gnas pa don <lb n=""5b1""/> gyi gzhan sel dang
column3: gzhan bsal nas brjod pa sgra'i gzhan sel zhes bya ba yang gnas so zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5590"">bdag gi bla ma blo gros kyi spyan dang ldan pa dag</rs> gsung ngo
column7:
,3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml
ex83032023-06-2912-18-04,<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex83032023-06-2912-18-04"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4265"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4265"">rtag pa</rs></note> <lb n=""5b4""/><note type=""editorial"">We take ""rtag pa"" to be an alternative way of referring to ""sTag/rTag""</note> na re snang pa'i don la nges shes 'dren mi nus pa yin no zhes zer ro
column9: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-014-22-28,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-014-22-28"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:snang_la_ma_nges_pa"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">kha cig</rs></rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs></note> sgro 'dogs dang mi 'gal ba'i snang pa yin no zhes zer ba</seg>
",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml
ex87032023-03-1613-14-21,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-14-21"" status=""reviewed"">sbyor ba gsuM pa'i tshe thug par 'dod pa yin te
column2: 'di ltar tshul gsuM chos can gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad byar rung ste tshul gsuM tshang pa'i phyir ro zhes bkod na gzhi' rtags tha dad med pa'i phyir sgra mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bkod pa lta bu'i ma grub pa yin no zhes zer ba <note type=""editorial"">The author of this view is identified as Phya pa (id:3831) by Glo bo mkhan chen. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 32, n. 49.</note></seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-07-2417-03-49,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-07-2417-03-49"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni de ma yin las tha dad du 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nam mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin no zhes zer ro
column3: <note type=""editorial"">This view is also mentioned in RTRG VIII 186,14 (mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan yin na…). RTGKh 163,8, RTŚ19 Dza 70b1 (=586) and RTŚ10 Tha 128a5 (=255) identify it as rNgog Lo tsa ba chen po (ID: 3786)'s view.       </note> </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0314-09-36,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-09-36"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<mentioned>gal te mtshon bya sgra blos khyad par du byas na byed chos kyi sgra blo 'phel bas des khyad par du byas pa'i mtshon bya 'ang du mar gyur pa'i phyir mtshan nyid cig gis mtshon bya du ma mtshon par 'gyur ro zhe na
column2: </mentioned>

column1: sgra blo 'phel bas sgra blos zhen rung tsam 'phel bar 'gyur yang
column2: mtshon bya du mar mi 'gyur te <abbr>thams cad</abbr> don ldog de la sgra blos zhen rung nyid las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro
column4: des na zhen yul gyi don ldog cig las med <lb n=""11a7""/> na de la sgra blo mi 'dra ba brgya phrag du mas zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya cig du 'gyur la
column5: zhen yul gyi don ldog du ma yod na de <abbr>thams cad</abbr> la sgra blos gcig nyid kyis zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya du mar 'gyur ba yin te ngag lasogs pa don dgu la go zhes bya ba'i sgra blo cig gis zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya dgur 'gyur ba bzhin no
column7: <note type=""gloss"">mtshan gzhi'i <choice><orig>{°}nyid</orig><reg>nyid</reg></choice> la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs pa</rs> na re dngos po gnas skabs dang skyon yon brtsi ba 2 yod <choice><reg>ces pa 'ang</reg><orig>(ces pa'ang)?</orig></choice> de mi 'thad de spyi'i mtshan nyid dri ba la bye brag gi dbye ba skabs su ma bab pa'i phyir ro
column9: </note>
column11: </seg>

column1: ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml
ex87032023-03-0311-47-21,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-47-21"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi bdag nyid chen po dag</rs> sgrub dang dgag pa'i mtshan nyid rim pa bzhin dgag bya rnam par bcad nas shul du chos gzhan 'phen pa dang mi 'phen pa yin te
column2: dper na bden pas stong pa dang <lb n=""17b1""/> bden pas stong pa'i snang pa lta bu'am bum pa stong pa dang bum pa med pa'i sa phyogs lta bu'o zhes gsung go
column4: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0314-14-17,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-14-17"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs pa</rs> na re</note> gal te tshad ma ni ¦ <quote source=""PV 1.200ab"">yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min
column3: phyir na tshad ma nyid ma yin ¦</quote> <note type=""editorial""> PV I.200ab sadasanniścayaphalāneti syād vā 'pramāṇatā. Also cited in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 26b6. ma yin: PV <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> mi 'gyur </note> zhes 'byung pa'i tshul gyis yod pa dang med par nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin na 'dis ni de lta <lb n=""23a3""/> bu'i nges pa mi skyed pas tshad ma ma yin no zhe na
column4: </seg>

column1: ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml
ex87032023-03-0313-55-44,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0313-55-44"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
dbang po gzugs can la brten pa nyid ji ltar grub ce na

'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4270"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4270"">rgya grags sod</rs></note> na re de ni bum snang gi shes pa chos can rkyen gsuM las gzhan pa'i rkyen gzhan bzhi pa cig la ltos pa yin te rkyen gsuM tshang yang res 'ga' bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'bras bu ldog pa'i rtags la rten pa'i rjes dpag gis sgrub po zhes zer ro
column3: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-1611-09-25,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1611-09-25"" status=""unreviewed"">'o na bcad pa'i yul can yod dam med ce na
'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi dgan po dag</rs> na re <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bcad pa'i yul can med de
column2: don gyi skad cig re re blo'i skad cig re res rtogs pas don dang blo rnying pa phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
column4: </seg>

column1: ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

ex87032023-12-1214-24-38,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-12-1214-24-38"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">rtsang</rs><note type=""editorial"">Cf. <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 61b8-62a2 'di snyam du skad cig snga phyi'i rdzas de lta na yang de dag la ye shes kyis 'gro ba rtogs pa 'am sngon po nyid rtogs pa zhes bya ba yod dam myed
column2: myed na spyi ma rtogs pa'i bye brag rtogs par 'gal la
column3: yod na yang de nyid la ye shes phyi ma bcad pa'i shes pa ji ltar ma yin
column4: gzhan yang rtog pa myed mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur la
column5: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin
column6: des na 'jig rten mkhyen pa ni thams cad du rdzas la tshad ma nyid la ldog pa la bcad pa'i yul can nyid kho na ste
column7: </note></note>  <lb n=""28b6""/> na re rdzas la ltos nas bcad shes ma yin kyang rigs la ltos nas sngar rtogs zin la 'jug pa'i phyir bcad pa'i yul can ji ltar ma yin
column8: gzhan yang rtog pa med mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur la
column9: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin
column10: des na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du rdzas la tshad ma dang rigs la bcad pa'i yul can yin no zhes zer ro
column12: <lb n=""28b7""/></seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-08-0414-24-38,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-08-0414-24-38"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusm:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5600"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusm:named_reference"" ref=""db:5600"">byang</rs></note> na re rdzas la ltos nas kyang bcad pa'i yul can du 'gyur te
column2: rdzas sngar ma rtogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml
ex87032023-03-0314-24-38,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-24-38"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<mentioned>yang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis dus gsum ma mkhyen pa mi 'thad la
column2: mkhyen na yang 'das ma 'ongs gnyis snang nas mkhyen nam mi snang par mkhyen
column3: </mentioned> snga ma ltar mi 'thad de 'gags pa dang ma skyes pa snang par mi rung pa'i phyir ro
column5: phyi ma ltar yang mi 'thad de sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum spyan du mi rung pa'i phyir ro zhe na
column6: <lb n=""28b8""/>'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs></note> 'das ma 'ongs gnyis ye shes da ltar ba la mi snang yang da ltar ba'i dngos po snang pa'i shugs la de'i rgyu' dpal dang 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa yin no zhes zer ro
column8: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0314-26-50,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-26-50"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">rtsang</rs><note type=""editorial""/>Glo bo mkhan chen also ascribes this position to ""slob dpon gTsang nag pa."" See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 131, n. 219</note> 'das ma 'ongs kyi rnam pa snang pa'i stobs kyis de dag gi rang mtshan ma byung pa dang mi 'byung pa'i sgro 'dogs chod pa yin no zhes gsung mod kyi rnam pa de ci rang mtshan gyi rnam pa 'am
column2: sgra don nam med pa'i don gsal bar snang pa yin zhes brtags na 'thad pa ma yin no
column4: 'on kyang dus gsum mkhyen pa <lb n=""28b9""/> lasogs pa'i ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni gdul bya gzhan gyi blo ngor snang pa tsam du zad kyi sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa yod pa ma yin pas dpyad par bya ba ma yin no
column6: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-1610-18-48,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1610-18-48"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> na re <quote source=""db:4445"" n=""216,4-7""><!--TODO ref to the typeset edition-->rtags kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid tshul gsum dang mtshon bya gtan tshigs kyi 'brel pa nges par byed pa la</quote> zer ba yin gyi<!--The first part of the citation, up to ""zer"" corresponds to <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 216,4-7 de la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid tshul gsum dang
column2: de'i mtshon bya'i 'brel pa nges par byed pa ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid la
column3: .--> <note type=""gloss""><choice><orig>° gnyegs </orig><reg><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4267"">gnyags ye shes 'bar</rs> </reg> </choice> ltar<!-- identification upon assumption that ""gnyegs"" stands for ""gnyags ye shes 'bar"" (id:4267)--></note> tshul dang po'i mtshan mtshon gyi 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa ni ma yin te rtags kyi sgra tshul dang po <lb n=""31a1""/> kho na la nye ba'i rgyu <choice><orig>‹mtshan›</orig><reg>mtshan</reg></choice> med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung </rs>na re</note>'di ni mi rigs te
column2: de ltar na khyab pa'i mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa yang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs par 'gyur la 'dod na rtags kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i skabs su rjes su dpag bya'i sgra rtsod gzhi' kho na la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur te de'i tshe chos la'ang 'jug pa'i phyir ro
column4: des na 'dir gtan tshigs ni tshul dang po la bya ste tshul dang po'i mtshan nyid <lb n=""31a2""/> dang mtshon bya'i 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i skabs zhes brjod par bya'o
column6: </seg>

column1: ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

ex87032023-03-2810-42-14,"rgol ba ni su rya A similar objection is cited in the Tshad ma rigs gter. Glo bo mkhan chen identifies the opponent as ""paṇḍita Surya thong po."" See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 151, n. 269. rtsod gzhi' chos can la rjes su dpag bya'i ming gis btags nas bstan pas mi phan te
column2: 'di ltar rjes su dpag bya'i ming de rtsod gzhi' chos can kho na la 'jug na rtags rjes su dpag bya la yod pa tshul dang po zhes brjod pas mthun pa dpe'i chos can dang mi mthun dpe'i chos can gnyis la rtags yod pa la mi go bar 'gyur ba zhig na
column3: rjes su dpag bya ni <lb n=""32a7""/> rtsod gzhi' dang bsgrub bya'i chos dang tshogs don gsuM ka la 'jug pas chos rjes su dpag bya la rtags yod pa dang tshogs don rjes su dpag bya la rtags yod pa yang tshul dang po yin nam snyam pa'i log rtogs skye zhing
column4: de skyes na ma 'khrul pa'i mig gi gzung byas sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa lta bu'i rjes 'gro can la yang rtags chos rjes su dpag bya la yod pa'i tshul dang po dang rjes su 'gro ldog gnyi' ka tshang pas yang dag pa'i rtan tshigs yin nam snyam pa'i log rtogs snga ma ci lta ba bzhin du <lb n=""32a8""/> skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na
column6: </seg>
column8:
,3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml
ex87032023-03-1612-55-52,<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1612-55-52"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag nyid chen po kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> btags pas mi phan pa'i rtsod pa spang pa dang
column2: gdags mi dgos pa'i rtsod pa spang pa dang
column3: de'i lan mtshungs pa'i rtsod pa spang pa gsuM gyis lan 'debs par mdzad de
column4: </seg>

column1: ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml
ex87032023-03-1612-55-525,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1612-55-525"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshul dang po'i tshig gis mthun pa dpe'i chos can la yod par rnon pa la yang yod tsam du rnon na don med cing
column2: mthun dpe' kho na la yod par rnon na rjes 'gro'i tshig gis mthun <lb n=""33a2""/> phyogs tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi la yod par bstan pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur bas mtshungs so zhe na

column1: mi mtshungs ste <rs type=""person"" ana="""">kho bo cag</rs> ni tshul dang po'i tshig gis mthun dpe' kho na la yod par rnon par go dgos yod ces zer ba yin la de dang rjes 'gro' tshig gis mthun phyogs tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi la yod par bstan pa la 'gal ba ci zhig yod de
column2: blo rno ba spyir mi tsam la yod cing bye brag lha sbyin kho na la yod pa mi 'gal ba bzhin no zhes zer ro
column4: </seg>

column1: ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

ex87032023-03-1613-00-02,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-00-02"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> the tsom dang ldan pa yin no zhes zer ba <!--Cf. rNam bshad 217 des na the tshom dang ldan pa'i don ni chos can yin no //--> yang ma yin te
column2: the tsom dngos dang ldan pas ma khyab cing 'jug rung tsam ni de ltar grub zin pa la yang yod pas ha cang khyab ches pa'i phyir ro
column4: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-1613-03-19,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-03-19"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">gzhan dag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note>  mthun yul phyogs mtshan nyid pa'i rnam pa tsam la byas nas de dang bsgrub bya'i chos yod du mthun mi mthun la brjod pa'ang mi rigs te
column2: rigs pas mi 'thad pa dang
column3: gzhung gi dgongs pa <lb n=""34b8""/> ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: </seg>

ex87032023-03-1613-05-07,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-05-07"" status=""unreviewed"">'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> na re <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> du <lb n=""36a3""/> bas la la{} me sgrub pa'i tshe gtan tshigs du ba ni mi mthun phyogs yin te me steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zer ro
column3: <!--Also cited in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 89b6 kha cig me bsgrub pa'i rtags du ba ni mi mthun phyogs yin te me steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: de ni mi rigs te
column2: </seg>

column1: me steng du mi ldan yang du ba mthun phyogs yin pa ci 'gal te la la me bsgrub pa ni tshogs pa gcig par bsgrub pa yin la du ba la yang me tshogs pa gcig par ldan pa'i phyir ro
column3: de lta ma yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro
column5: gzhan yang du ba'i mi mthun phyogs me med yin na me med pa'i phyir du ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0313-59-01,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0313-59-01"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4264"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4264"">gnyags <abbr>ye shes</abbr> 'bar</rs></note> bsgrub bya'i chos me nyid kyang mi mthun phyogs yin te me gzhan gnyis pa zhig steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro
column3: 'on kyang de la rtags zhugs pas ldog pa ma grub par mi 'gyur te
column4: <lb n=""36a6""/> me ma yin gyi gzhi' la du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes rtags khyad par can bkod pas de la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0311-48-37,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-48-37"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">che ba'i che ba dag</rs> rtags kyi tha snyad gnas pa'i rten du mtshan nyid tshul gsuM blos nges par byas pa mi dgos ste
column2: <hi rendition=""#petittitrechapitre"">rnam gcod med pa dang
column3: don gyi chos su mi 'thad pa dang
column4: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro</hi>
column6: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0311-50-04,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-50-04"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed""><!--presumably Tibetan opponent-->
yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">blo gros rnam par dkar ba dag</rs> na re rtags kyi mtshan nyid du tshul gsuM blos nges par byas pa zhig dgos pa yin te
column2: <hi rendition=""#petittitrechapitre"">nges rung la ni bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa dang
column3: tshul gsuM dngos po la ma grub pa dang ma mtshungs pa dang
column4: ha cang thal ba</hi>'i skyon gsum yod pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0314-17-13,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-17-13"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshogs pa'i spyi dang
column2: dpe' <lb n=""45a9""/> la yod pa'i khyad par rtags kyi mtshan gzhi' 'dod pa ni med mod kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">kha cig <!--This view in presented in RT X 291,2, and attributed to ""sTod lung rgya dmar ba la sogs pa dag"" in RTGKh 223,17.--></rs> la'i du ba lasogs pa rtsod gzhis khyad par du byas pa rtags kyi mtshan gzhir 'dod do
column4: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0314-18-48,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-18-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs></note> na re nam mkhar snang tsam chos can rtag ste ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu ste
column2: rtags de chos can <lb n=""51b5""/> du bkod tshod kyi nam mkhar snang tsam dang mi 'gal bas phyogs chos grub cing bsgrub bya rtag pa'i dngos po rten pa'i gzhi' dngos por gyur pa'i nam mkhar don gyis 'phangs pa de 'gog pas chos can 'gog pa'i 'gal ba yin no zhes smra'o
column4: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog</rs></note> na re rgyu 'bras nges par byed pa'i tshad ma ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du ma dmigs pa dang dmigs pa'i mngon suM lnga kho nas yin te
column2: 'di ltar dang <lb n=""52b3""/> po rgyu 'bras gnyis ka ma dmigs pa dang
column3: de nas rgyu dmigs pa dang
column4: de nas 'bras bu dmigs pa dang
column5: de nas rgyu log pas rgyu ma dmigs pa dang
column6: de nas 'bras bu log pas 'bras bu ma dmigs pa'i mngon sum mo zhes zer ro
column8: <!--This view is already mentioned in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 142a8-142b1 (kha cig gzhung las gsungs pa'i mi dmigs pa dang dmyigs pa'i mngon sum lngas de'i mtshan nyid rjes 'gro dang ldog pa nges pa yin no zhes zer ro
column10: ). It is also the view supported in <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 333,3-4 (mngon sum dang myi dmyigs pa rnam pa lngas rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan nyid nges pas de kho na tshad ma yin no

column1: de ni mi 'thad de
column2: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung</rs></note> gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma lngas nges pa yin nam 'on te rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma lngas nges pa yin
column3: dang po ltar na rnga'i sgra dang nyi ma'i 'od zer yang rgyu <lb n=""52b4""/> 'bras su thal te gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog lan brgyar mthong pa'i phyir ro
column5: gnyis pa ltar na tshad ma lnga yis ci zhig bya ste rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma gsuM gyis rjes 'gro dngos su nges pas ldog pa shugs la 'phen pa'i phyir ro
column7: </seg>

column1: ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

ex87032023-03-1613-09-57,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-09-57"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> na re lhan cig mi gnas pa <lb n=""55a2""/> 'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po gnyis la gnas pa'i chos gnod bya gnod byed ces pa'am
column2: rdzas kyi rgyun gcad bya dang gcod byed ces bya ba yin no zhes zer ro
column4: <!--The first part of this definition is also cited in RTRG VII 168,21. It is attributed to Lo <hi rendition=""#sanskritpasitalique"">tså </hi>ba chen po in RTGKh 153,10. Cf. <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 277,7-8 de la 'di'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po gnyis la brten pa'i chos gnod bya gnod byed kyi rang bzhin no

column1: de ni ma yin te </seg>
gnod bya gnod byed tshogs pa 'god na mi srid cing
column2: ya khyal 'god na ma khyab ste rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan nyid bzhin no
column4:
,3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml
ex87032023-03-1610-30-05,<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1610-30-05"" status=""unreviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3809""><abbr>kha cig</abbr> </rs>na re <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung</rs></note> thal ba [la sgrub byed] 'phen pa'i thal ba dang sun 'byin pa'i thal ba gnyis su yod pas
column5: de gnyis la khyab pa'i mtshon bya thun mong ba cig med pas mtshan nyid kyang thun mong pa <abbr>med</abbr> ces pa rigs pa ma yin te
column6: de ltar na spyi'i mtshan nyid thams cad mi rung par 'gyuro
column8: </note> </seg>

column1: ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

ex87032023-03-1611-01-15,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1611-01-15""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4953"">kha cig</rs> na re rtags <lb n=""62b8""/> kyi ngo bo rgol ba'i zhe bas mi 'dod cing tshul gsuM gzhan gyis ci rigs par khas blangs pas dam bca' mi 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i ngag yin no zhes zer ro
column3: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0311-47-58,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-47-58"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi blo gros{} chen po dag</rs> thal ba'i chos gsuM dang bzlog pa'i chos gsuM <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du gnad cig par 'chad de
column2: 'di ltar thal ba'i gtan tshigs khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang pa dang tshang par gnad gcig<hi rendition=""#FootnoteCharacters""><anchor xml:id=""a457""/></hi> ste
column3: pha rol po la la me med par khas len na gnyi' ka tshang la
column4: mi len na gnyis ka ma tshang pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg> ",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column1: ex87032023-03-0311-50-52,"<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-50-52"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed""><!--presumably ref. to Tibetan-->
yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">shing rta chen po'i srol dag</rs> ni 'dod tog gyis lan 'debs par byed te
column2: thal ba de dag gi 'dod pa la tshad mas bsal pa yod pas bzlog pa'i thal ba'i gtan tshigs grub par thal ba ni 'dod pa yin te
column3: <lb n=""64b1""/> mi rtag pa dang tshogs pa khegs pa nyid mi rtag pas stong pa'i phyogs chos yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: de bzhin du dgag bya yod pa dang tshogs pa khegs pa nyid yod pas stong pa'i bsgrub bya yin pas gzhi' sha za'i bum pa rtag pas stong pas stong zhes pa'i dgag pa'i rtags 'phen pa yin no zhes gsung ngo
column7: </seg>",3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml

column9: gsung la brten nas gzhan phan yid kyis sbyar
column11: 'di las byung pa'i dge tshogs mthu' ldan des
